title: Terrible app for a terrible airline

review: The manage trip comes up in the app and is functional EXCEPT it will no longer “print trip” on neither of my iPads. The manage trip on the iPhone does not offer the “print trip” button. The web version of AA doesn’t work at all anymore. Crashes constantly.
title: Won’t print

review:
- Status moved to gold from platinum.  Should have more leniency given Covid. 
- now getting charged almost $100 for a seat I usually get included in reservation 
- keep getting your offers announced to get the credit card and get 50k points which you say buys 2 round trip tickets….. I just got my wife and I two round trip tickets for 140k points.  I’ve never had a points flight cost under 60k for one person.
title: Status

review: This app is great for keeping up to date about you flight status and baggage status, but if something goes wrong and a bag is delayed, you’re in for a long form that you have to fill out requiring information that should be automated and already attached to you profile and trip. The app could really use and update.
title: Great for the basics

review:
Paid for First Class and they didn’t even have ice for beverages. Attendant was poor service.
Why wouldn’t they at least have ice for the customers that paid extra for better service. First time I have flown with American Airlines. When I got to Dallas, I learned that my flight was delayed another hour and missed my commitment! 
Last time I will use American Airlines. 
This is the very first time I have ever complained about a flight experience.
title: Mazatlan to DFW

review: this app was clearly designed by what seems like a new age helen keller, cause if they could see or hear they would be able to tell how garbage this app is. The only use it has is to store your flight information easily, instead of actually being convenient and being helpful to book flights. it is slow and clunky and if you exit the app you have to start all over.
title: This app is flaming garbage

review: I have never written an app review before, but I am compelled in this case. This app truly wastes more of my time than it saves. My flights appear and disappear from my welcome screen, I get error messages more often than not when trying to check into flights. I’ve tried reinstalling it several times, with no improvement to its functionality. The user experience of this app alone is motivating me to fly with United for my business travel.
title: So frustrating

review: App has been fine until we tried to use the passport scanning feature to update or info prior to an international checkin.. It munger the name and even when we corrected it it must have left  some hidden characters causing it to fail and block our online check in .. we have to go wait at the ticket counter now!
title: Passport scanner not working

review:
I would rate it zero stars if I could. This is an incredibly non-intuitive UI.

Why do you let a user in with just the Record Locator and then require a full login in the middle of reviewing the information?

Obtaining mobile boarding passes is a near-disaster. Why not show smaller links of the first leg and subsequent legs on the same page, rather filling the page with only the first leg. Why not have one click that adds mobile boarding passes to both the AA app and to Apple Wallet?

This the only airline app that I routinely have call for mobile app support. Makes me ready to move to another airline that recognizes that the world is mobile and that many users do not use a laptop or desktop for reservations. 

Really, really frustrating!
title: Fix the UI!!!

review: I don’t understand the point of this app. To see/use any of the features you have to log in, but it’s impossible to log in. Anytime I entered my information, it said it was incorrect. I reset my password and it still said it was incorrect. It wouldn’t accept my answers to my security questions either, even though when I logged in on the website to reset my password everything worked. It’s basically a useless app.
title: Impossible to log in

review: Very easy to use and navigate. Status updates are efficient and keep you current on any changes with your flight and bags! Thank you!
title: User Friendly!!

review: … business class “beds” are the worst I have ever experienced! The old ones were better and provided more space. The head space does not go flat … not long enough at 6’1” … really? Flagship? I want the old seats back, you can keep your “flagship”!
title: The new flagship …

review:
It is supposed to be a simple, easy travel from Charolette to Newark.  I spent 12 hours in the airport, flight got delayed multiple times, boarded the flight, deplaned due to simple mechanical issues and then bags didn’t show up after this long journey.  

Everyone did their job at AA but nothing came together.  I wish they spend less money on ads and more on customer service.
title: Bad service, communication and baggage services

review: We missed out flight they had us running back forth to jet blue we ended up being on the phone with jet blue for 6 hrs just to switch the flight missed to a new flight such a horrible experience customer service at American Airlines was terrible at Jax airport omg mr. Gonzalez was so disgusting with his attitude jet blue try there best but bcuz of this out sourcing American Airlines did we were running back and forth just to switch one flight
title: I just want to go home

review: I started my day at 2:30am for a 5am flight from TPA to CLT to DCA. Due to mechanical issues with the plane in CLT my 7:56am flight to DCA was delayed all day. I was not placed on another flight until 1:22pm to Dulles. It was a long tiring day. I have been flying with AA for aLong time and flying is just not what it used to be. I was supposed to go to work in the morning in Arlington Virginia but never made it.
title: Flight delays caused me not to make it to work

review:
Flight attendants on Houston to Dallas this evening were the best group I’ve experienced in several years.. Cudos to you for encouraging their enthusiasm.. 
thanks for a great short trip .. I hope I can get them on international flight soon !!!
title: Great trip

review: Takes an hour or 2 to figure out how to get your boarding passes. This app makes you jump through hoops in order to verify Covid test results. You have to download another separate app, create an account, and fill out the exact same information. Then after you complete everything and get approved on both apps, the app fails and tells you to just see an agent at the airport or visit a kiosk.
title: Horrible

review:
I was refused a request to take an earlier flight and given the excuse that I was required to be on the flight with my checked bag.  Only to sit in the airport for 4 hours and the arrive at my destination to find out my luggage was sent on an earlier flight. 

Terrible customer service to refuse a flight change and then send the luggage on a different flight while the passenger spends unnecessary time in the airport.
title: Terrible flight change policy

review: I usually never write reviews but you guys deserve one today for being reliable and sticking with your promises. Many airlines cancelled their flights out of Dominican Republic BUT you guys pulled thru and I always be loyal and future customer of yours. Thank you again!
title: Thank you!

review: The app is very promising, definitely need to be able to purchase upgrades a lot easier instead of hunting for where I can upgrade my seat or upgrade to first class without having to call or speak to someone. Ease of access is the most important ask of an app. It’s not rocket science.
title: Promising

review: Surprised that the flight attendants did not pass out sanitizing wipes on this flight leg as they did on our first leg.  Other airlines offering bagged snack and water. Not American.  With as packed a flight as this one it would seem that the cost of a bottled water and bag of pretzels would be covered People not following orderly deplaning. Baggage claim took forever.
title: Flight from Charlotte to Boston

review: You would think the flight status would pick up your own flights ? Why not have your reservations come up automatically?
title: Flight status

review:
I have flown exclusively on AA Airlines for almost 20 years a few bumps here and there, but they always have gone out of their way to make it right and that’s the traveling adventure. 

The flight crew, pilots are top notch by and large I would fly anywhere with their pilots, the cabin crew.... first class bar none, always greeted with a smile and a kind word, their service is exemplary. 

I have had a lot of offers for the “better deal to fly on another airline” but why would I betray and old friend like AA Airlines. 

Be flying with you again soon!!!
title: Paul

review: I’m not seeing it. I travel a month on and a month off overseas. That’s flying to the South Pacific 12+ times a year. I stay with one airline, American. The app could be a little faster with real time changes. But, overall the app works great for me.
title: Why low rating?

review:
The app keeps sending me calendar alerts for flights that are anywhere from 9 days to 30 days away😡  I don’t have the entries in my calendar, and the notification says it’s from American, so it must be the app.  I’ve even turned off notifications but the minute I open the app I get six or seven calendar reminder notifications.

I’d rather just go to their web page.
title: Reminders seem random

review: I only downloaded this app so I could get my entire family’s boarding passes in one location.  You have to enter an email address for each person flying. Ummm  my kids don’t have email addresses.  Attempting to use mine for all of them causes an error requesting unique emails.  Then after trying to figure out how to do it on the app, 15 minutes later, I deleted it.  Terrible.
title: Such a waste of time

review: I'm old enough to remember when American Airlines IT department was world class in availability and delivery.   This app is pathetic in stability, transaction context and performance-- don't be surprised when it repeated asks for your user ID credentials after you login.
title: Inept

review: Landing in Charleston SC for a nice long weekend only to discover our suitcase was banged up and my wheel was off!!! Only to be told that I need to submit in writing but no assistance only a mean lady basically telling me too bad and on our rerun flight home AGAIN waited for our luggage for over an hour!!!! WTH bad customer service with some of your peeps!! In Charleston SC and Columbus Ohio!!  Im going back to Southwest Airlines and now I need to give a nickname are you kidding me!!!!!
title: Horrible on ground service!!!!!!!!!

review: The app told me my flight was out of Terminal B at LAX. What it failed to explain was that I have to check my baggage in Terminal 4. Then, depending which AA person you speak to, you either stay in Terminal 4 or go back to Terminal B. They did not care that you are confused and overwhelmed. This app would have helped me avoid all this if it had the correct information from the beginning.
title: Misleading

review:
Instead of giving people more time after a pandemic, AA is taking away earlier earned status. I am a 2.5 million mile flyer, and I asked for my Platinum Pro to be continued through 2022, and I was turned down flat! How will you build back loyalty without deviating from your 1000 page rule book!?!
What a slap in the face! I am now off to other airlines, who will certainly offer cheaper options.
title: American does not value its loyal customers

review: We flew on 5/22 and returned on 6/9 to Bozeman and back to Atlanta. This was our first flight on American and we were so pleased with everything. We will definitely fly with American in the future. Thanks to all of your employees.
title: What a great airline!!

review:
Still doesn’t do most simple things that all other airline apps do.  
Booking a flight is a redirect to web browser.  “Trips” you purchase don’t show automatically in the app.  You must “search” for them and add details for it to show.  Seat up-charge fee does not transfer when changing flight.
title: Still no booking inside the app

review: The AA Apps is awesome, when I travel I don't have to worry about getting lost in an airport. Also, my board pass is on my phone for easy access and plus real-time updates as well as maps with GPS so I'm able to get to my gate every time.
title: Great App

review:
As a business traveler, I pay almost $700 a year for this membership.  It appears American is giving out free memberships for anyone who signs up for a credit card.  There was a line over 20 people waiting to get in at DFW A Terminal.  I couldn’t wait around to find there would be no coffee left or food as a have experienced in the last few months.  

American needs to remember who pays the bills.  It’s not the occasional leisure traveler.
title: Admiral club

review: I find this app extremely reliable and am able to do everything i can do on the website conveniently on my iPad or iPhone. I also use it regularly to watch inflight movies.  Much more advanced than its domestic competitors.
title: Excellent

review: I don’t understand why people complain about this app.  I find it extremely useful and informative.  I guess some people just have to complain about everything.
title: Some people just have to complain

review: The app looks great and clean. But there are some important features missing like you can only check 1 incoming flight, but what about the one before that. Sometimes like during unreliable weather conditions. I want to check if my incoming flights are delayed or not, I'll have to enter the flight number multiple times while United allows you to keep going
title: Beautiful but useless

review: I love the American Airlines app, it gives you free WiFi on the plane and you can watch movies and get things done, although when you watch movies and the screen turns it won’t go back so you must exit the app and rewatch the movie
title: This is great

review: Made my trip easy. Reminders, arrival and gate change updates, electronic boarding pass, terminal map with walking directions. Will not travel without it!
title: So easy. . .

review: Want to check in? Enter your passport number even though you used it to book the ticket. Upload a COVID test? Enter your passport number and address. Complete contract tracing? You guessed it… enter your passport number and address. Think you’re done? No. They slap you with a check in at the airport message after a 15 minute check in wizard. What a joke.
title: Has anyone that worked on the app team used this to travel

review: I flew to Kentucky and our flight was delayed and it gave me real-time updates on every new departure time and gate changes. (There were quite a few). Thanks for this awesome app. May fly AA again just because of this app!
title: Made my life so much easier

review:
We walked literally 200 yards from our plane to Baggage Claim 5, and waited literally 30 minutes before the first bags appeared on the carousel. 

Unacceptable, you are wasting my precious time on a trip that my wife and I are celebrating. It cannot be that difficult to transfer bags from 200 yards away.

This is the first time I’ve flown with American. This will be the last time I fly with American. Will continue to fly with United going forward.
title: Very slow baggage retrieval.

review: If you’re using the app to watch a movie and decide to switch to another app for a moment, the app completely refreshes and you have to start over with commercials and find your place in the movie again. The new app widgets don’t show my upcoming flights at all or they show flights from several months out that aren’t actually my next flight.
title: American isn’t trying very hard

review: I think the app is great but i would love for it to be a feature where you can save your flight tickets to your wallet cause i like to have everything in one app, it’s easier for me, i love that in this app you can check everything but I would love to save it on my wallet as well.
title: I love it but

review: I don’t expect the world from a travel app. Just deliver on the basics and we’re good. The AA app is the least reliable airline app I have used. For example, here is a list of things I could do on the Delta app but not on the AA app: check in for a flight, check status of a flight and... open the app. After the check-in and status fails, the app just crashed repeatedly upon opening so yeah.
title: Least Reliable Airline App

review: It’s horrible! I have booked and paid for 8 flights but I cannot see them in the “your trip” section! If I search the name and the “record locator” it shows up but If I close the app or log out from the website and come back I cannot see them on the “your trip” section. So every single time I need to search for my flights since their app and website cannot save my trip!! American Airlines please learn from Delta!
title: the worst app and website

review:
It’s a good thing this airline chose to use the word “American” in its name because otherwise everyone would have realized it was a trash company with an app supported by liars...oh wait...thanks for taking the reputation of an entire country down with your failing business I guess??

Also your app interrupts my music despite there being no audio in the app, so extra thanks on that, your developers are either morons or underpaid slaves. It’s one or the other, maybe both.
title: “On Time” = “45Min Late”

review: AA app is very user friendly and easy to use. With rewards search, multi city booking it is very close to desktop functionality! Keep up the good work!
title: Very user friendly

review: 2 years ago I thought the app was subpar to other airlines but it has substantially improved.  There are more functions available like tracking bags.
title: Great improvement.

review: My wife booked both our tickets under her Aadvantage account. We were approved for an upgrade but had issues during check-in. I tried to push my upgrades (which I had enough of) with my app/AA Advantage and still was charged for the 500 miler upgrade bc my wife (with status) didn’t have enough.
title: Inability to use 500 mile upgrades

review: 54 minutes for baggage delivery on a relatively quiet Saturday night at SLC Airport, with priority status.  Absolutely unacceptable, and this is not the exception.  It is the norm with American.  Ever since Delta implemented the 25-minute delivery guarantee a few years back, they are very rarely over 25 minutes.  American is rarely under 45.  I’m sick of it and can’t believe American’s leadership has tolerated terrible baggage service for this long.
title: Baggage delivery times are consistently far behind competitors

review: The app is very slow end it does not provide full functionality of the web site.
title: Improvement

review: Was great app until a week ago and now it might as well not be on my phone. Every time I go to log in it says that it can’t contact the server. Log on through website instead....it works fine. Whatever they did in the past week, my app stopped being useful in the middle of connecting from flight to flight. Pretty upsetting considering I travel a lot for work.
title: Was good

review: I really liked this app I could watch movies on it without needing WIFI. This app was also great 👍🏻 because I could check my airplane ✈️ ticket without getting it out, some people say this is a bad app but I think they bonked there head because this app is AWESOME 👏!!!!!!
title: Great app 👍🏻

review:
Among many frustrations, the app hasn’t updated my flight for more than 4 hours. Not able to do so manually. I’ve restarted the phone twice. Every other app on my phone is working fine. 
With no weather reported in any destinations related to my travel, I’ve been delayed for hours with no way to quickly check status from my phone as I do when traveling with other airlines. 
Another reason to avoid American.
title: Worst airline app

review: After scanning my passport, the app gets stuck on the confirmation screen. Clicking “confirm” does nothing. No errors, no progress, nothing. I have tried this multiple times and the app just doesn’t freaking work. Sometimes other places in the app just freeze. E.g. click “check in” next to a flight and nothing happens, but click into the flight then click “check in” and that proceeds. Horribly written.
title: Check in doesn’t work

review: The app really lives up to the quality that you can expect from American Airlines, complete trash. Even budget airlines have apps that offer more functionality and reliability than this one. If you’re considering downloading this app, take a step back, cancel your American Airlines ticket, and book with literally anyone else and download their app. It’ll be less off a hassle to do that than it will be to deal with this garbage.
title: Terrible app for a terrible airline

review: This App notified me the exact minute my flight (from Los Angeles to Dayton Ohio via Chicago) was cancelled (due to weather!) Because of this app, I was able to call American Airlines and find an alternate route before everyone else did.
title: Super App- Got my info before everyone else

review:
Hate the requirement to enter your locator code...name and flight time or flight number should do it. But I absolutely love the app’s gate-to-gate live instruction. You enter your starting and ending gate info and the app maps you there. 
App also provides baggage claim info before you exit your aircraft.
title: Love the gate to gate feature

review: Great user interface and flights are easy to check in, change on the fly and many more things. Recommend to all
title: Well Rounded App

review: On the way out I volunteered to check  my baggage and it did not arrive at my destination! 1st night on trip without my things! I arrived at 7pm didn’t get my bag until following day at 1pm. Then on the way home I was forced to check my carry on even though there was plenty of overhead space for my bag!!!!! Now still waiting for stuff!!!! Annoying!!!!
title: Annoyed

review: AA fly was smooth. Electronic check In makes everything easy, faster, and clean. I gad been flying with AA for last 20 year and I have confidence in their services. Thanks so much to all who work with AA. You are the best!!
title: Getting early!!!

review: Seems difficult to try and view flight status for individual flights.  When the page displays there are not hot links to take you to the next page.  Also - flight status does not include a seat map or upgrade list (United stinks, but the app is great for this stuff).
title: Can’t view flight status

review:
My company often books my flight for me.
Once it’s booked, i use the app, that I’m already logged into so i can add my AA advantage number. While already logged in, the app constantly asks me to LOG IN …
It’s very difficult to edit anything while you’re already logged on because it still ask you to join AAadvantage while you’re logged into AAadvantage , please fix this error
title: App isn’t user friendly

review: I chose to fly first class but they did not give beverage service. I think they should have given a small refund or at least free WiFi to make up for it.
title: First class

review:
I used the app to change my flight, went through all the steps and was charged for my seat selection. 

The night before I couldn’t check in and her to call and speak with a rep. I was told that I only changed the reservation, but the ticket wasn’t re issued (out of my control), a mistake made by AA - I was told it was my mistake and had to pay for my seat again.
title: Be careful changing flights on it.

review: Not sure what’s going on but when I click on the “boarding pass”, the screen turns black. So far, I have not been able to get my boarding pass.  This has happened several time on different flights.
title: Little frustrating

review: My iPhone is not able to update to iOS version required by the AA app (iPhone 6 and I refuse to buy a new phone just so I can have the latest iOS version) and thus I am unable to update the AA app on my phone. This is very frustrating. The pop up says I can download a previous version of the AA app, but it does not let me. Very frustrating!!! Why can’t I still use my current iPhone and use the AA app?!?!?
title: IPhone unable to update

review: Crying child seated behind me on a flight that is 20% of capacity. 3 flight attendants standing toward the back of the plane. I was 5 rows away and one flight attendant loudly asked me to move the other direction. I said I was simply asking if I may change seats. The lady snickers and tells me as long as it’s the other direction and she found that funny.  Disrespectful service at best.
title: Service Disappointment.

review:
We arrived at a walk out terminal. It was raining and high water on the ground coming in. Seems like doing this time when there is less travel the flight could have come in at a jet bridge. 

Thanks
title: Arrival

review: Just downloaded app this week fora flight. While there are a number of good features it’s very glitchy. Can’t access seat maps for any flights and unable to request flight status updates by text or email because of a “networking” error.
title: Good features but lots of error messages

review: They redesigned the app for iPad and it’s a mess. Overlapping text, freezes, like it was built for some other device, and just dropped on an iPad. Can’t believe anybody at the developers even looked at it on an iPad before releasing it.
title: Completely Broken

review: My last two flights with American Airlines were delayed (an issue in itself). The app sent an update to me when they published the delay, but the departure time on my itinerary did not refresh and reflect the new flight times. I am sitting in the terminal, the app says I will arrive in ATL in an hour, and the plane has not arrived. Seems like a quick fix for AA but an important one nonetheless.
title: App Doesn’t Update Departure Times

review: I find the app very useful but after the last update it gets stuck if you have zero bags when checking in. The only way to move forward is to close the app. Please fix this.
title: Bags

review: As of the last update no more airport maps!!! Why, American??? This was one of the best features and allowed for you to check what food is available in your terminal and how far apart gates are when connecting. It was so useful. Also everything is taking forever to load now, like seat changes and flight changes. If it ain’t broke stop trying to “fix” it
title: Horrible update.

review:
Amazing app extremely easy to use.
Best feature that this app is offering is tracking your luggage live.
title: Excellent service one click book a flight

review: When trying to change flights, you can’t hit continue on your selected flight because a pop up window to manage your trip or select seats is in the way. Now I have to call to change my flights because the website also happens to be down.
title: Who made this app??

review: Very disappointed. I’ve been trying to contact someone about a flight you have delayed for hours. The app doesn’t work and the phone number is too busy to answer my calls. Unbelievable. I have no clue how I’m getting home from across the country. It’s not right! I’ve been stuck at the airport all day and I don’t know what to do because you guys won’t help me.
title: Horrible customer service

review: Since the start of Covid, American has really stepped up their game. I’ve flown numerous times, and hands down, sooo much better than before Covid. Thank you!! Especially for the timely arrivals and departures!!
title: Much Improved

review: First time flying online and the app made it the best experience, for ease of finding my gate and helping with the check in progress. TURN ON NOTIFICATIONS!!!!!! It really helps to get the notifications. 😊
title: Helpful !!!!!

review: Very poor service and value for money throughout the American Airlines system especially when I return to Dallas Fort Worth at the end of a trip I always end up waiting for close to an hour for my checked bag. This is simply unacceptable
title: It’s not the app it’s the airline one star

review: The stewardesses were inconsistent applying “social distancing” on the plane.  Waiting on the lave—-the attendant was inconsiderate for the persons waiting.  She cited social distancing as she stood quite close to a co-worker and the flight was at capacity, which also requires social distancing adjustments.  Picking up garbage, the attendance just pointed to the refuse and required the passengers to deposit into their bag.  Just seemed very rude compared to my previous flight and in general.
title: DFW to RIC

review:
I have to write in each and every time i use this app my FF number, my password, my email.

This is basic stuff. Why wont it save on my current iphone 11 pro max or any of my previous iphone 6,7,and 8?

The only answer i come up with is American A doesnt care a fig about the individual. Everything they do is based on volume and the big picture..it appears to me
title: Doesnt keep my login info

review: ‪Want to see your mobile app have the option to have two way messaging option for customer to communicate directly with flight crew. I recently missed a connecting flight, if I had the ability to communicate with flight crew of both flights I might have made it. ‬
title: App upgrade

review:
Every other major airline includes a scheduled boarding time in the app and in the boarding pass that’s added to the Wallet. Except for American. 

Is the issue that American 
1) can not reliably figure out in advance when they expect to be boarding their planes, and so do not want to misplace their customers’ expectations; 
2) do not want to share this with their customers (for reasons?!); or
3) has the information but does not know to add that data to the app? 

Sure there’s the general rule that one should arrive hours ahead of departure time. But this is one of those basic features that many travelers like to know so that they can appropriately budget time before boarding (to grab some food, use the bathroom, etc.)
title: No Boarding Time?

review: The AA app is quite possibly the worst app I’ve ever used. After 1. Trying to create an account in the app and getting error messages that a 10 digit phone number is required despite entering my 10 digit and 2. Proceeding as a guest and be asking for a locater number and trying to entering my name into a quirky field that can’t tell when you’re trying to input a name — I guess I’ll just check in the old fashion way by waiting in a line. Ridiculous AA!
title: Awful experience

review: App said my info mismatched and I had to check in at airport. Triple checked all info. Uninstalled app, tried website, called travel agent, called airline. Wasted over an hour trying to figure out what’s wrong but nothing was wrong (other than the message) and that they just wanted to see my passport at the airport before letting me check in. Horrible app. Horrible service. Not looking forward to flying with them.
title: Couldn’t check in

review: Terminal maps are a lifesaver. With directions, I can see exactly how long it takes to get from one gate to the other and exactly where to go. This is priceless for connecting flights! Thank you AA
title: Terminal maps are so useful

review:
I love American Airlines! I think it’s a wonderful airline and I have always had a great experience flying with them with their aircrafts, staff, food, etc.
I use the app somewhat frequently, but I have been having some trouble with it.
Everything in the app is great. I can do anything on it and it works.
Although, it always freezes on me EVERY time I use the app. Sometimes it’s hardly useable and other times it works. 
I have tried shutting down my phone, restarting the app, everything, and it just freezes.
I don’t know if it is a bug, but I just wanted to let you know.

Thanks!
title: Freezes | Great App and Airline Though

review: Standing in line an hour after our flight should have left because there is no captain and another staff member.. I’ve had horrible experience with this airline .. from check in to flight .. I would recommend delta .. they are 1000 times better .. they don’t have an attitude when your flying with them .. please do not use .. if you do .. good luck , be prepared to wait
title: Horrible

review:
The sole reason for this one star review is that when I go to book a flight, it just says loading airports near me, and continues to say that for eternity. If I try to type in an airport and hit go it will not show up after hitting enter. So essentially I cannot do anything on this app because I can’t book a flight or search flights.

Please fix. Using an iPhone.
title: Won’t allow me to type in an airport

review: I just got off my flight from Dallas to Milwaukee, flight 2581.  I could not believe it they were four people sitting around me who never had the mask covering their nose the entire trip. Masking does no good unless it covers the nose and the mouth. Stewards walked by several times and said nothing. They would save more lives reviewing how the virus spreads than going over emergency procedures. Very disappointed in American Airlines!
title: Not enforcing the mask mandate!

review: This app is similar to the apps for other airlines, with the exception of the Bag Tracking feature. The Delta app will give you updates about the loading and unloading of you checked bags, as well as when it will arrive at baggage claim. Saves the tedium of watching the carousel going around...
title: Where’s my bag?

review: The app is really a thin shell around Safari and the websites aren’t very compatible with iOS devices. When connecting to WiFi you get a message about cookie support. To fix you have to go adjust Safari settings. Then to watch a movie you have to go adjust Safari settings again before it will launch your selected movie in the American app.
title: Poor in-flight entertainment

review: I fly American a couple times a month. 9/10 times the app doesn’t work and says having trouble connecting or unable to connect regardless of where I am. Hire a developer that knows what they’re doing
title: Garbage App

review: This app used to be decent, but has become almost useless. I have a work phone and personal phone and the two phones show different information after refresh and updates. I can’t seem to see my reservations anymore since the last update. And I keep getting a message that the app can’t connect with the American server and refresh my reservations. Very annoying.
title: App not responding on either phone

review: It trim me awhile to finally find a way to watch a movie. Because I purchased wi-fi it took me and the flight attendant some work to get back to “Watch Now”. After that it was all good!’
title: Yelp!

review: I have tried multiple times to book a flight using the app. It does not work. It either hangs up and freezes, or returns to the main screen. Need bug fix.
title: Flight booking option does not work on this app version

review:
This app is gorgeous. Only one or two airlines have apps this nice (Alaska’s is also top-notch).

It even adapts to iOS 13 dark mode and integrates with Passport and Siri.

I also appreciate how the first thing you see when the app launches is your upcoming flight details and a button to open your boarding pass.

Anyone complaining about this app is expecting far too much from it (use the website if you have to!) or they don’t know how to navigate iOS apps.
title: Beautiful app with easy navigation

review: I do really like the app, the down side if you are flying standby and are allowed on the standby flight the app does not update and you miss out on information such as bag claim area, and remaining flight time.
title: Could use improvement

review: Paid extra to get early boarding so I could put bag in luggage bun- they let people from earlier cancelled flight board first and the took the baggage space in main cabin extra - several were carrying two suitcases- not one suitcase and smaller carrying fir beneath seat- then on baggage claim- two carousels- only one in use- waiting 40 minutes and still bags not in site- very frustrated
title: Horrible service on boarding and baggage claim

review: Having worked in IT for years I learned the benefit of thorough testing of programs and systems. I just booked a flight with the app and it never showed up in the app —— nor did I Receive an email notification.  My husband then booked the flight using the website. He noticed 2 charges for fights with AA. This is irritating to me and makes me wonder what other applications with AA have issues.
title: App Has Bugs

review: My flight out of dfw  to Pensacola was a nightmare.  Plane was “in the hanger”, for over 4 hours. We finally boarded, and over another hour waited for a new pilot and crew.  Flight back from Pensacola to dfw was good, but now, we have been waiting for over hour and a half, for our luggage. We now have been told it should just be another 20 minutes. Your company is extremely unorganized and aggravating.
title: Flight

review: It’s a coin flip whenever I try and use this app. When it works, it works well, and other times, you can’t load boarding passes, or do other important functions it should be able to do easily. Needs some work.
title: When it works, it works well.

review:
The App use to work pretty good for me but now it doesn’t work at all. I was trying to book a flight and ended up book through the actual site.
The screen with the little field comes up but that’s it nothing else. I’ve even tried deleting it/restarting my phone, nothing.
title: Fix it plz

review:
I like this app and it works great.
Since a recent update it does no longer allow me to add my trips to my calendar. This is a crucial function for me as it makes it so much easier to block flight times with the flight information in my calendar.
title: Calendar function not available anymore

review: I like the American app. It’s easy to use. It does a lot of helpful things. It provides lots of useful information like gates, baggie claims, flight status, change options.
title: Helpful App.

review: I like the application. Does a good job. Lately when I use a red eye flight, I seem to lose that flight information when the day changes. I can’t find a quick way to find which terminal I am landing and info about my baggage. Fix it please. Overall a great job.
title: Good but

review: Idk why people are having so many troubles with the functionality of the app. I really just use it as a means for my boarding tickets and I always cross check at the terminal for gates just in case. Sounds like more of a people issue than it is an app issue.
title: What’s the issue

review: Had issue. customer service resolved quickly
title: Issues resolved

review: I haven’t been able to log in for a year. Spoke with technical support today and was told the app doesn’t work and all I could do was try a web browser. Kind of makes confirming a reservation and downloading a boarding pass a pain. Oh, the web site also makes me reset my password EVERY time I try to log in. AA doesn’t really seem to care about it’s passengers.
title: AA stopped supporting this app

review: When ask the agent if he could ck my luggage straight through to sxm he said NO. I ask why he said u only going to Mia I said I have reservation he said I don’t know and that u didn’t book it with us so I can’t you will have to get your bag in Mia and check back in. Again I said I have a reservation and he again said NO not with American I tried to show him the reservation and he ignored and said you can do that in Mia
title: Tampa

review:
At security boarding pass would not scan 
Had to go to kiosk to print
After few minutes of freaking out, it finally print
title: Scan fail

review: The app is great except when your running to a gate trying to catch a flight and the cancel flight is  easy to hit and can’t be undone :/  I’m one unhappy camper for that little mishap please move your cancel flight button !!!!! So it doesn’t happen again ...
title: Cancelled flight

review: Our luggage arrived to our destination over an hour before we arrived.  I’m concerned about the safety and security of our luggage and why it did not travel on the same plane as us.  Our flight was 293, which was on the tags of the luggage we checked at the gate, but the luggage we checked in at the curbside check in had 1803 on the luggage tag.
title: Luggage

review: I am Executive Platinum for 4 years. About 2 months ago the app updated and although there are no noticeable differences for the iPhone version, the iPad version is terrible for viewing. The functions all work but you have to turn the pad to Horizontal for most views. Those views are still not good. Does anyone on the team use an iPad? When are you going to update again?
title: App for IPad stinks

review: American Airlines made me feel very special today. I was very sad about traveling on mothers day, but getting upgraded to first class, brought back a little piece of hope to me
title: Mothers day treat

review: I can check the status of flights by flight number which is nice but if you try and enroll in their little program and set up an account it keeps telling you the state or province is populating yet never does. You can’t actually submit unless this is filled in and it won’t let you fill it in. Therefore, you go through and fill all the information in and then have to cancel. Great programming I guess.
title: Doesn’t work

review: Longtime AA flyer with over 3.5M flown miles under my belt. Have used many versions of AA’s mobile app over the years, and this one is one of the best. App is intuitive and easy to use for almost all key passenger functions and interactions, but I’m not a fan of changing reservations via the app. Very clunky.
title: Solid app

review: Incompetent, useless workers. Absolutely no help at all with my lost luggage. Was told by 3 different people that  it was left in Dallas, where my flight connected. It’s been about 2-3 days since I spoke with the last person and apparently now they don’t know where my bag is and they have no way of tracking it. Completely useless and by far the most stressful airline I have ever used.
title: Worst experience

review: Makes up for the crazy flight changes… almost
title: Accurate and timely!

review: I love this app because... it reminds me on the summer when I was in Beirut & turkey. we are not traveling anywhere now. But I just wanted to purchase this app because it gives me long - run memories.
title: Memories!

review: This app is trash. Downloaded it thinking it would make my flights more convenient, but it doesn’t even update the gate when it changes. That, and they claim to have all these movies and tv shows through the app but it NEVER works, and when the you ask the flight attendants they’re just as unhelpful. Removing this app and never downloading it again.
title: Worst App for an Airline

review: Please develop a more noticeable notification for date changes during layovers. Almost missed my flight if I didn’t check my app before it took off
title: Notifications

review: Mechanical problems and delayed flights plus lost baggage and no customer service available in less than 2-3 hour wait. Had to stay over on Dallas for both our outbound and inbound itinerary and lost 2 days of vacation! Was Executive Platinum just 2 years ago and service was great- now it is horrible so feel sorry for all of us travelers without status.
title: What happened to American?

username: travel too much for this app
review: Every time I try to book a flight the app times out and I have to start over. Then the price goes up as there were “only 2 seats left at that price” and the seats I picked are still pending under the timed out purchase. I’ve also written several reviews and none are ever posted. I bet if all of the reviews were shown, the average would not be more than 2 stars.
title: Worst app

review: The app seems buggy and takes forever to change screens. Never fly American but I’m going to soon. A bit apprehensive to say the least. Actually canceled a flight but it never reflected the cancellation on the app. I kept getting prompted to board. Caused a bit of consternation.
title: Buggy

review: Glad to see the ability to read the passport using NFC. Saves me time as a frequent traveler from having to take a picture of the barcode and making sure it is positioned correctly.
title: Reading passport using NFC... mint!

review: The app requires logging in using the built-in browser (Safari), but then throws a blank page after clicking Continue on the passenger info confirmation. I was able to get around this before, but today I can’t. Also, the app icon is no longer visible on my phone’s screen, so I can’t even delete it anymore.
title: Redirects to browser then blank page

review: 2020 has started of great.  I took my first airplane flight.  American Airline was absolutely wonderful.  The pilot and stewardess were great.  I needed assistance for my husband and they were right on it.  Flight #4150 you rocked.  Thanks for such pleasant experience.
title: First time flying

review: Past few updates the app has logged me out,  then check into to my flight and my pre-tsa didn’t populate because of it.  This completely negates the benefit of checking in and going right through security because now I have to wait in line at the counter to fix my boarding pass. And btw customer service on the phon couldn’t help, complete waste of time all around. Only fix is to waste more time
title: Logged me out

review: Your flight the WiFi was garbage and didn’t work on 2 devices don’t advertise you have entertainment and then not provide.
title: WiFi was garbage

review: Even basic stuff like editing passenger info kicks you out to their mobile website. Id rather just use the mobile website if there is more functionality there.
title: Kicks you out to web app for core tasks

review: Once you get connected the app Is easily navigated . Clear information and keeps me updated on flight day.
title: Easy to navigate

review: I ❤️ the notifications and ability to navigate into other key areas. But my WiFi use on the plane has sucked every time (Platinum Level customer)
title: App for the phone great but plane WiFi?

review: I really liked that this app kept me up to speed on any changes my flights have had, such as gate change, delayed flights, ect.
title: Excellent

review: App seems great but right now on the change flights screen if I use any drop down menus the menu at the bottom for seats and such covers the continue button making it impossible to click. Going to have to use the website I guess.
title: Can’t click continue iPhone 13 Pro

review: Using it to keep up with current information, or if bags are delayed. I generally don’t use it for boarding passes.
title: It gets the job done.

review:
Downloaded the app onto both of my devices so that I could make use of the free entertainment in flight. The player is crystal-clear while the advertisements played, but it consistently locked up and wouldn’t play on either device, on either flight. 

It’s an app for a major airline; it shouldn’t require any more that 2 clicks to get what you need.
title: Just doesn’t work

review: Amazing vacation all except the fact American left my suitcase in the US! Are you kidding me, there were 30 people on the plane. Now i am stuck without my stuff for 24 hours.
title: St Marteen

review: I was in the middle of booking flights for 4 people. When it came time to choose seats I opened my texting to ask one of the passengers a question about seating. When I went back to the AA app all my booking work was gone and I had to start over. This time when I searched for flights the flight I had originally picked was now $40 more expensive!! What the actual?!?! What a scam!
title: Worst APP ever

review:
1) I split my pairing and it did add the new locator and record, but kept the original and kept telling me to check in, when I arrived two days prior. 

2) no way to unrequest upgrades. And I got stuck in a loop wanting me to buy miles to use for previously requested upgrades. Eventually had to go online to checkin.
title: Not user friendly

review: I have a lot to say about American Airlines in general, but their app is truly aggravating. It rarely works, and when it does, it’s usually with checking in (thank goodness). But if you want to change your address, update a password, register for a promotion or do anything with miles, you’ll be out of luck. It’ll just spins no spin and spin. Truly one of the worst apps out there.
title: Rarely Functions

review:
AA flight crew and ground personnel, great work and thank you for the professionalism managing through the difficult times this week.

Every step included actions to keep your customers and staff safe.

Thank you!
title: Great customer service

review: It would be nice to upgrade with miles and systemwide upgrades on the app without having to call customer service.
title: Upgrade Functionality

review:
All of a sudden when I open my AA app I can only see an ad for a credit card- and can’t get past that.

I used to see a list of all my upcoming reservations which I could quickly access.

This is terrible!  Please restore the app or provide a quick way to get past the credit card advertising.  It’s bad enough to get bombarded by the flight attendants during a flight with these offers!
title: What happened

review: The app has been in a steady decline for the past year, but now you really broke it. So said to see it repeating the path of the airline: down, down we go.. So said and so undeserved for an airline with such legendary past and name.
title: The app is broken!

review: I don’t feel AA is fair about their Frequent Flyer.  Why should I have to get their Credit card to up my standing. As a business traveler I am restricted to my company policy   I don’t feel it’s fair about their Admiral Club either.  I was told even thou being Executive Platinum I can only do the club if international’s but not domestic, but if I get the card no problem.  How fair is that.  AA is my company preferred airline.  Don’t see the advantages.
title: Mr R

review: Recent upgrades to the AA iPad App have taken the iPad App that was functional and provided easy to use trip information to a iPad App where fonts are oversized, future trips are impossible to easily see, the App is no longer functional, especially for a frequent traveler. Not sure how this happened, but AA’s App team needs to make necessary corrections as the iPad App today is just not a user friendly App with regards to future trips.
title: AA iPad App has gone from good to TERRIBLE

review: This app never works. It constantly says it has no internet connection. I checked the settings to ensure cellular data was turned on and I used internet on all my other apps. This app, however, never works. Why waste your money as a company to develop and promote your app when it doesn’t work. Thanks for wasting my time and phone space American. This is a terrible experience for your customers.
title: Completely useless

review:
I have never been able to log into this app. I used to fly AA a lot, loved their app. Recently, had cause to use AA again, downloaded this app and it will NOT recognize my password. I can log into the web based site but not the app. I called tech support, they said uninstall,
Reinstall and then wait. I had already done that but tried again, still cannot log in! Password on web site is same as app but it does not work!
title: Sad

review: Tried to set up an account and couldn’t because the states wouldn’t populate a list for me to select from and I couldn’t type it in manually. I have to use the app as a guest, which is a bit of a pain since I have to paste my flight number and type my name every time I load the app.
title: Buggy

review: With the current version, I get an error along the lines of having Internet connection issues. Thought it was my phone at first then realized I’m able to check-in for my flights and download mobile passes through Safari on the same device with the same Internet connection.
title: Problems connecting to server?

review: American is by far my favorite airline.  Flights are always consistent and the service has been great for the past two years.
title: Best Airline

review: Travel experience from LA to PHL on AA was mainly great. Flight attendants cared and focused on passengers. Food quite OK. Pilot announcements all good. The challenge was in the on line experience. Accessing and connecting to the website to go on line was very grueling. Finally worked but ouch and wow. Other than that, nice. B+
title: Almost Great

review: Thank you to the Captains and staff for getting my husband and I to and from safely. God bless you all for what you do. You are under appreciated for your work which is a risk everyday. God Bless
title: Grateful Customer

review: Flew first class tonight. Except for the larger seats we didn’t feel like we were treated any different than if we were in row 30.  We flew first class on United and were offered champagne and blankets. I kept my jacket on the whole flight on American. Very disappointed.
title: First class

review: The app is very hit and miss when compared to the United app.  My biggest complaint is you can’t tell if your membership number is loaded.  I have flown a lot with the airline and enjoy being able to upgrade my seat in the app, but it is limited and I have to do this at the kiosk.  United recognizes my status and allows me to easily upgrade based on my points.
title: App issues

review:
There are times when I wish I flew with another company just to avoid using the apps. 
I just had to call the customer service to be able to remove my flight because I wasn’t able to do it in the app and now it won’t let me check in and I had to use the mobile site.. please work on fixing this app
title: App needs a serious upgrade

review: I had the worse experience ever my bag was delayed and top of that it came damaged and to top that off the customer service rep is super rude and no help at !!! southwest was one to help me fix my bag because my bag was broke and my cloths all falling out and all the American Airlines rep did is watch and did not offer to help !!! At the end she offered me a TRASH BAG to put my cloths in !!! Pathetic airlines will never use you guys again
title: Worse airlines ever

review:
To whom it may concern,
My original flight was canceled so when the AA representative rescheduled me for another flight , my mobile boarding pass would not get updated through check in.... there should be an option during rebooking to update boarding pass
Thank you !
title: Mobile Boarding Pass

review:
Missed my flight home tonight from Phoenix so I’m stuck here at the airport overnight.

Was at the gate 15 minutes before departure and door was closed and they would not open it.  Disgusted with American.  This was after my flight to Dallas was cancelled for mechanical issues.

I was supposed to be home at 6:00 tonight, back to see my wife and dogs.  But had to rebook through Phoenix so I could get home at 11:00 instead.  Now, because the door was closed early, I won’t be home until 2:30 TOMORROW!!

Disgusting the way they treat their customers.  Will have to start considering other airlines now after over 15 years of loyalty to American.  Thoroughly disgusted.
title: Closed door early

review:
QqqAZQqqxqxx1ZWell I love the way American Airlines is handeling my trip m daughter  booked for me in January 🦋
My flight was leaving the 31 Monday 
But with everything closed and the orders to stay at indoorsso we going to try an make arrangements for June Thankhihb
title: Trip to see m baby guela

review: This app is great- I can purchase or change tickets in less than 5 minutes- it also gives me information on upgrades, and that my bags are on the way.  Love it!
title: American App

review: This plane was great we love American the people are very kind and helpful and we love it when we get our movie screens so I can watch my fave movies, so over all I think American is the greatest flight you will go on.
title: Nice

review: The current version 5.16.4 does not fit iPad or iPad Pro screens.  Have reset text size to smallest option, deleted application and reinstalled. All flight information displayed is truncated with city names taking up two and three lines of text.  Most information cannot be displayed and is replaced by ellipsis. App is clunky at best and functionally uselessness.  This review may not be applicable to iPhone devices, only iPad and iPad Pro.
title: Current version (5.16.4) does not support iPad

review: Why do you make it so difficult to check in for a flight and prepay for bags? Don’t you want my money? Am I supposed to guess where to enter the card number and exp date? And why do I have to close the app when I’m deep into the app due to no back button in some screens? How do y’all not have a decent app coding team? This app is trash.
title: Poor design, but I have to use it I guess...

review:
When sharing an itinerary on WhatsApp, the send button in the upper right is grayed out and hard to see. It is there and works but hidden.

Once you address I’ll update to 5 stars!
title: Itinerary Sharing on WhatsApp

review: Nothing works..  every time I attempt something it won’t work. It kept not recognizing my password so I tried to do a password recovery then it won’t recognize my security question answers so I went to create a new account the entire form has been completed but now I cannot enter the state of residence because the app says it’s still loading the states for the first time. Who has the time for this crap!?
title: Horrible app

review:
I have used several different methods to test out their app. 

This app is only good for tracking your flight and using the maps of where you leave and where you arrive, nothing more.

They will mark up your flight by as much as $200 by using the app.

I’m a frequent flier and know they use it in this manner.

I am rooting for southwest to take over flights to Hawaii so I can make the switch. Because clearly American only cares about the bottom line.

This app is only good for tracking flights. And forget about using the WiFi on any aircraft because you’ll have to be in first class for that luxury.
title: Do not buy tickets on the app!!!!

review: Yes, the refresh button is there but it doesn’t refresh the boarding pass. I checked in and then changed my seat a little later. Boarding pass still shows the old seat but the app is showing my new seat. AA failed to provide a basic necessity.
title: Doesn’t refresh

review: Easy to use from checking in to getting boarding passes to tracking bags
title: Easy to use

review: Would be great if aa can build native app function when searching for flights and award tickets. Other less used function also require to direct to in app browser and logon to website.
title: Too many redirect to website

review: American app is not intuitive and not functional 50% of the time - does not track bags well, present flight info in a digestible way and fails to allow easy access to changing or managing flight info. Additionally, American Airlines service has declined in recent years.
title: Poor service and app functionality

review: I have a had travel issues with at least 50% of my flights on AA. I have contacted customer service several times with no response from them. Funny that the only way you can reach them is by email, not sure how you call that customer service. Doubt this review will do anything other than getting it off my chest.
title: AA does not take care of their passengers.

review: There’s no point to having an ap if it just redirects you to the website for the majority of functions, especially when you have to log in again. American had long since lost my business for many reasons, I just came back to redeem miles before they expire. The various inconveniences do not convince me to return.
title: Redirects to the website

review: I am desperately trying to track down a flight and everytime I open app and go to search for flights, and go to put in airport codes, it just seems to keep spinning for loading airports. It should not take as long as it is doing. App. will get a 1-Star from me and should it decide to work, and work like it should will leave another review in the future.
title: App Does Not Work

review:
Lax to Charlotte. One time flight with great staff and service.   One male flight attendant kept repeating the mask policy over and over. It was very agitating.  We are not children we understand 

Otherwise the service was great
title: Red Eye

review: American canceled my flight and sent me an email said that I had credit for another flight. The app would not let me access the credit so I stayed on hold for two hours and the line dropped and they never called me back. Now I’m trying to book another flight and the app has me locked out and wants me to call costumer support to get access…
title: Fly United or Delta

review: No matter when I fly American it’s always the best, courtesy professional on time great value no complaints at all, thank you always, clean and safe... God Bless Us All..🙏🏻
title: Thank you always

review: I really enjoyed this app until it auto updated to the latest version which needs iOS 13. My iPhone’s latest edition is iOS 12.5! How do I get rid of this new update so my app is at least useable again? I get the option to download an older version but it just repeats the pop up when I select download. It is an endless loop of uselessness.
title: Auto Updated to unusable version

review: I’ve been traveling with American Airlines for decades. I wouldn’t trade them for any other airline. The staff is super friendly and respectful. The pilots are very responsible with their customers. Keep up the great work xo
title: American Airlines

review: I’ve installed, re-installed, updated and still can’t get it to work on iPad Pro... It works fine on my regular iPads... Kind of a bummer because I use the pro more.
title: App Does Not Work On IPad Pro...

review:
Phone customer service is great, best phone service in the air. 

Flight attendants are a different story, the are simply the rudest of any major carrier
title: AA experience. Customer service with AA over the phone is s

review:
At a tough time for work travel with cancellations by customers. The airline I fly exclusive is beating me up. That is fine I have other options I will go back to using. 
Brad Burns
title: Dissatisfied

review: First off the airline gives zero cares about your safety. Secondly I can log in on my computer without issue. App not so much. Already deleted and not looking forward to my flight. Of American, Spirit, Southwest, Delta, Jet Blue, and Allegiant; American took the cake as worst airline that I’ve used.  I don’t want to hear another joke about budget airlines like Spirit. They’re 10fold better than this company.
title: Unsafe airline/ inefficient app

review: I’ve had the AA app for years, but today I used it to change flights for the first time. It was intuitive and easy.
title: Easy to use

review: Even on a perfect internet connection, refreshing flight information or retrieving booking details takes really long. It seems like a server-side issue. Also, basic flight details like departure time or delay-status should automatically refresh in the background, as the values are updated on the server-side.
title: Really slow

review:
American is continuing to diminish the overall value to customer. Admiral club changes and on board services changed American into “just another airline”. I am actively looking for alternatives do myself and my team. 

Message to shareholders- release executive team, restore brand recognition and service to retain loyal customers.
title: Admiral club - value to customer

review:
This app is not very user friendly. Finding receipts is a complete pain in the rear. I almost missed a flight recently because my boarding pass would not load because I didn’t have the latest update. There are not many features on this app of any benefit. Delta’s app is way easier and user friendly. 

American, please redesign this app for all of us. It would make your customers very happy!
title: Can’t Stand This App

review: Compared to all other major airlines, including Delta, United, Southwest and JetBlue, this is the least user friendly one I’ve experienced yet. I was never able to check in using the app after multiple attempts. Even after checking it at the self-help kiosk, the app didn’t recognize that I had checked in. Please upgrade this app!!
title: Frustrating App

review: Usually the app is simple and easy to use. But it’s been acting up lately. It isn’t letting me check-in so I can’t get my boarding passes on my phone. Additionally, my flight was cancelled so I had to rebook and they want me to pay for my bag again…
title: Has been acting up

review: My wife missed her flight because she was 5 minutes late. Her final destination was Madrid Spain and to get there she had to take a flight from San Francisco to Dallas and then her flight from Dallas to Madrid and her stay was only 40 minutes. The 2 flights were really tight and she went as fast as she could and make it 5 minutes late to the gate and they would not let her in.
title: Dallas To Madrid Flight

review: 1st Class seats staring into space drinking my woopdeedoo free alcoholic drink for 2 hours because y’all decided to remove seat back screens. Plus internet WiFi that’s intermittent and constantly kicked off if your trying to use your iPhone that oh by the way if you have a new one it is not able to plug earphones into anymore!
title: 1st Class Ripoff

review: The features are great but performance has been really bad lately making it hard to use
title: Performance

review: I have to go to the airport and put in my global entry # at the stall in order to have TSA pre-check show up on my boarding pass, even though my frequent flyer number is set up in the app.
title: TSA Pre-check doesn’t work

review:
My main problem is getting my boarding pass on the app. It’s horrible, it only displays it minutes before you have to board so good luck with TSA. You can add it to your Apple wallet but this is the only airline app I use that forces you to do so. 
Sincerely
Disappointed
title: Not my favorite

review: Landed in DFW.  Went to baggage claim. After 30 minutes I asked a lady to check my status she said it was coming be patient. 15 minutes later I asked her if she would actually check the computer she said no.  Too busy talking to co worker.  10 minutes later said they dropped the bags in wrong spot.  So I had to limp down to the other bag claim.   No apologies or offers to help
title: Luggage service

review:
The app is very difficult to navigate for new users.

I can’t even figure out how to add my boarding pass to my Apple Wallet. 

There is no help option or FAQ to guide you either.

Good luck.

***New Update

Back to say using this app is pointless. Trying to book a flight on this app is impossible. You will be stuck on a loading screen until the day you die (literally the screen will say “loading” forever). An airline app you cannot book flights on... do I even have to continue to explain how that is a problem? Just delete it off your phone and try your luck with a call to customer service.
title: Terrible Functionality

review: I have been using the app since I joined AAdvantage in 2014. They have made some great improvements to the app. I travel often and have used other airline apps and none of them can compare to American.
title: Best Airline App

review: I tried to reserve my flight from Dallas to Raleigh this weekend. The app showed an error saying that something went wrong and closed it. Yeah! Something went really wrong... YOU CHARGED ME! I don’t have my ticket, or a record locator or an email confirmation but this morning i had an unexpected charge for 333 dollars . What’s up to that. And I can’t even reach your customer service team! I need my money back!
title: Charged me without confirming my flight

review: This is confusing and hard to use. I just want to log in and have my information on hand without signing up for AAdvantage. That being said it is aesthetically pleasing, but I just wish it was easier. I don’t often fly American Airlines because they do everything just a little bit different and it’s confusing.
title: Delta app is better

review: It’s nice that there is an app to entertain yourself with something. The problem is that American Airlines doesn’t inform you, although you have wi-fi, that nothing works unless you have their app. However, you don’t find out you need the app until you are on the plane and cannot download it until you have “regular “ internet. Unfortunate.
title: Late information

review:
Will be flying soon with AA and according to their website, to stream in-flight entertainment you need this app. Got the app and decided to try to join AAdvantage. Cannot even do that because for the address portion you need the state. The app just says “loading states and provinces for the first time,” then just stops. It’s impossible for me to even put in a state. 
Forget it, I’ll load up my iPad with entertainment before I go. Deleting.
title: An utter disaster

review:
I think the UI for this app is fine, check in is very easy.
Major concern is that the app crashes or stalls when there's any major flight delays. Anytime there's a storm at an American airlines hub, everyone is trying to check flights and the app craps out. They should really build this out to be more robust to handle high volume spikes
title: Bad during crunch time, otherwise decent

review: You would think the app that can count down the minutes until boarding, allow you to order food for pick up etc., would provide the correct gate and terminal.  Thanks for sending me to the other side of the airport and consequently letting me miss my flight.  From now on I will confirm with the website and the departure board in the terminal. Otherwise the app is fine.
title: Missed my flight

review: Same day flight change, Seats checked bags and keep all flight credit available and ready this app is the best
title: The best

review: I know its all “loyalty points” now, but it would still be nice to be able see these things! They were a fun metric, especially for those of us that fly a lot (EP here!) 133 segments last year, this year??? Thanks!
title: Dollars miles segments

review:
The AA is sadly and stunningly so bad compared to United or Delta.  Can’t book multi destination travel, have to log out to book guest travel,  no price comparison by day and terrible ability and options when rebooking flights, you end up having to call in and wait on hold.  
Truly unbelievable that in today age of tech and app can be so bad….
title: The worst all of the major airlines

review:
The App is very user friendly. The things I love the most about the App
1. Ability the change my seat!
2. Ability to track my bags!!!
title: Good job!

review: I wear a Hearing aid and could not hear her name well.  I think it was known.  Beautiful black lady and her service was outstanding!   I have taken this flight for 5 years, she is the best!
title: Service that was great!

review: On my flight from DCA to CLT was the worst after I got to CLT, I literally had to wait and 1 1/2 hours to get a wheelchair and was then taken to a comfort zone and had to wait 45 minutes to get to the front door. I have never been so furious at the airline at how they treat the customers that have disabilities. I have stage 4 bone cancer and should sit in a airport for two hours to be taken to the front door.
title: Wheelchair

review: Rude customer service and gate agents, with exception of one supervisor on the phone. My flight was delayed, then canceled with no explanations or apologies. It took over an i’ll work to get a supervisor on the phone to finally get vouchers for a room and meals. Check-in counter reps were no help. Fortunately, I’m a travel agent and continued to pursue this situation. I will no longer be booking clients with American Airlines or myself.
title: Rude customer service reps & gate agents

review: App should provide updates of gate changes and make if noticeable. It should also update a boarding pass when a seat change occurs.
title: Updates

review: Everything went quite well except the temperature was too warm even with my personal vent open all the way.
title: Flight from Reno to Dallas

review: The main purpose of an airline app is to check in and get your mobile pass. This app does not do that. It forces mobile pass to be sent as a link to your email. I’ve tried it several times with 3 different mainstream browsers and they all say they cannot download the link (which is like a paragraph of a link too). The only option is to email yourself the pdf.
title: No mobile pass

review: I am writing this review because I want to warn others that the data provided by this app is horrible. Baggage claim data is almost always off. What’s more aggravating though is flight data. Not only is it horrible, leading to bad decisions on the travelers part, there are other free sources like flightaware that are substantially more accurate - to the point that American Airlines employees use FlightAware over their own systems. That’s pathetic.
title: BAD FLIGHT DATA - Use flightaware

review: The first time using this app, it took me 5 seconds to realize it’s useless. After logging in to check my booked flights info, I expected to find a list of my upcoming booked flights. Nope, it doesn’t know what flights you have booked. You need to enter your record locators. Well, who memorizes that information? So I search though my emails to find the and enter a record locator, only to get a server error  :-(
title: Useless

review: The app opens and shows a great glorious picture of an exotic area that you will never be able to get to through the app. I not even able to log in. Sometimes I get the keyboard to pop up to enter the credentials but The keyboard is not responsive. This has to be the most amateur attempt at an app that I have seen in a long time.
title: Can’t even open it

review: All information was kept current with maps.  I haven’t been to SAT before.  Very helpful with location of bags from baggage claim.
title: Flight

review:
The new standards / rules for the new points system is very unclear. As a Executive Platinum member for years, it seems very difficult to achieve this status in the future.
I might have to look at other airline programs like Delta to achieve equivalent status.
title: Advantage (Frequent Flyer)

review: Trying to book a flight is very difficult on this app, I can’t even search for flights, whenever I try to search for a flight it just says loading airports with the loading symbol and that never goes away and the app won’t let you search for any airports or any flights.
title: Unable to search for flights

review: Checking in my golf clubs has never been better. Less hassle, and a more friendly staff. Congratulations on the improvement.
title: Improved customer service

review: Booking is easy and convenient. But AA has to many canceled flights. What a way to zap the joy out of booking my flights with this app.
title: App is great, but too many canceled flights

review: App freezes after a search on the booking page! Maybe some testing before release next time?
title: Booking search kills the app

review:
I have used this app happily many times however, the last way update has left me out in the cold!!!

I am very disappointed to learn I can no longer use the app because it requires a higher iOS than I can get on my iPhone 6 😡.
I love my iPhone 6 and don’t believe I should be pressured into a new phone- this has worked well for me.
title: Upgrade left me out in the cold

review:
App doesn’t load and lags quite often then heats my phone up. Doesn’t run smooth at all.

Dashboard is confusing and checking in and picking your seat isn’t simple. I won’t fly American Airlines again. This was the first and the last. Plus if you try to call them get ready to get hung up on or wait 6+ hours
title: Poor poor app and customer service

review: I tried to check in becuase i got an email prompting. i thought by having this app it would a seamless process. after putting my information which they already had but they wanted again the same information very repetitive. then i get a pop up that says please check in with agent at the airport. again useless app.
title: useless app

review: Honestly this app is horrendous. You can’t check in as a guest and there is no functioning way for you to recover your password for your login. So much easier to go online to check in for your flight and claim miles through your email. It would be nice if the app actually helped you manage your flight but it does not.
title: Not user friendly

review: “Show Boarding Pass on Lock Screen” stopped working after the last update. Please bring it back.
title: Show Boarding Pass on Lock Screen

review: American needs to fix their app.  It doesnot update to show current data when info changes. It doesn’t provide notifications or update info when flights are delayed or gates change.  This has happened to me several times and almost missed flights by trusting app.  DONT TRUST THE AMERICAN APP FOR ACCURATE FLIGHT STATUS & NOTIFICATIONS
title: Do NOT trust app.

review:
I have had this app and it was working
Today,I needed to retrieve my flight info 
And the only part of the app that was working was the apply for a credit card section!
I deleted and reinstalled- still the same issue!
title: Help

review: It’s a good app. Sometimes it’s hard to log on or hold a signal. Some of the entertainment stream is often glitchy. But I think it has plenty of value - especially when. I think of whet a lot of other airlines offer.
title: Good app but a boy glitchy

review: Read some of the other reviews...some are a little excessive, but after checking in, I went to try to add a bag but the app kept crashing...had to jump online, but I would’ve expected some message if I couldn’t check a bag, not a dead end road.
title: Leaving the user hanging

review: When it works, it’s great, but I have had so many issues with this app over the years, particularly login errors. Many, many times have I been at the airport trying to get through when the app locks up on me or won’t let me in. Make sure you screenshot your boarding passes or critical information so you don’t have to rely on the app when you need something.
title: Continual errors across years

review: I really don’t Hate the app... when it’s working which is astonishing not terribly often.  I’m happy the error I received this time was fixed by a manual upgrade (not always the case... would have been nice to receive an in app notification to do so if AA knew they were forcing an upgrade.
title: Sorry AA mobile team: this is the least reliable app on my phone

review: I have flown with many airlines over the years and used their apps. American Airlines has an okay app, however the airlines itself is by far the worst airlines I have ever flown with. Sure, they occasionally have the cheapest flights but other airlines are so much better. I’ve never had a good experience with AA.  Do yourself a favor and fly with any airline other then American Airlines.
title: American Airlines is the worst
