review: While attempting to sign up for the app’s rewards program, I received a text message and switched to my Messages app.  When I finished with my messaging duties, I switched back to the American Airlines app, and EVERYTHING I had entered up to that point was GONE.  I had to start over!   This is RIDICULOUS and should not be happening with an app in the year 2021.  Epic FAIL, American Airlines!
title: App is not user friendly

review: Great experience flying American with my 2 kitties this morning. From checking my luggage, to getting the ticket for my pets, to the staff on board. Especially the luggage staff went above and beyond to help me. Much appreciated.
title: LAX to JFK

review: The app should have a link that says check-in at the top which is the main reason why people go to the app. Of course my record Locator did not work, provided me zero support or any other way to find out that apparently my flight has been canceled. Terrible service, terrible communication and a terrible app
title: Terrible navigation and incorrect info

review: In the recent past I’ve used this app on my iPad without problems but it no longer works. I cannot sign in nor can I see anything but a landscape background with a blank gray box. I understand that this problem is widespread and I’m hoping that there will be a fix soon and fortunately I have no flights coming up.
title: Stopped working on IPad

review: The app has been sluggish and temperamental for a couple weeks now on top of seat maps being unavailable.
title: Tired of the seat map being unavailable

review: Trying to book three flights and switching back and forth from another app to cut and paste frequent flyer numbers for everyone. App randomly resets and have yo start over with finding the flights and inputing the data. How stupid. It should store frequently flying family members like Orbitz
title: Stupid app

review: Flying with American Airlines in a few days, I guess I won’t be able to use the app to check in because when creating an account it won’t let me add my state! It just says “states and providences are still populating.” When I try to continue as a guest I can’t add my flight. I know the bare minimum of computer coding and program software & I could create a better app than this.
title: Can’t even create an account

review: The AA app doesn’t correctly display a “+1 Day” alert when searching for flights in APAC. This can be deceiving as those who search for flights in Asia may incorrectly assume they “gain a day” when traveling to APAC. This can negatively impact business/personal travel as this loss of day can greatly affect our travel agenda.
title: Unclear International Flight Results

review: I wrote to AA after my last flight and got no answer. Who should I contact?
title: Disappointed in lack of answer

review: Every-time I login it takes me over 100 clicks and 20 minutes just verify a flight. I have 3 bars of service and 3 bars of wifi. It really shouldn’t be that hard to make an app that does not kick me out every 5 minutes. I’m angry that I have to give you a star. Whoever made this app should’ve stayed in the fish tank with the other clownfish.
title: Terrible App Worse Airline

review: Air flow was so hot we had to turn off our air to avoid overheating which is contrary to the many reminders of wearing masks yet air circulation thru HEPA filters has shown to be as important.  We both have responsibilities to limit Covid and my flight from DFW to IDA was uncomfortable to say the least.
title: Air filtration and COVID

review:
The WiFi &  in-flight entertainment did not work on the app or on my web browser for 2 / 3 flights I took on this trip. 

I’d never had this issue on past AA flights, it was quite frustrating.
title: WiFi / In-Flight Entertainment

review: I took a trip from Dallas to Cancun, my bags got lost, it took me more than 24 hours to find one, by the way, I still have to find one.  every time you call call support it's 45 minutes or more waiting, you travel to rest and end up getting stressed because everything is scheduled and you don't have any clothes to wear.  😡😡😡
title: Are not professionals

review: You go though all the safety hoops they want you to follow and even after doing all of this and having your seat confirmed weeks in advance they will still change it on you to a middle seat. If they ask to pay extra for the seat of your choice don’t do it because their word is unfortunately trash. Un American Airlines should be the new name.
title: Upsetting

review: App is confusing, slow, and obnoxious. Good luck trying to upgrade, getting to the upgrade option is like trying to find the fountain of youth. I’ve seen better designed apps from high schoolers just messing around with coding. Save yourself the hassle and just use the electronic kiosks.
title: Terrible and Confusing

review:
Our stewardess was confrontational and looking for a fight she was rude and had a huge chip on her shoulder.  I guess she was trying to take a bad mood out on us. She ruined our flight and I’ll remember it for quite a while. Very disappointing actually hurt my feelings too. 

Flight on June 27 from Philadelphia to Hartford in First Class. Her condescension was unnecessary and insulting. Will remember it for a long time.
title: Horrible rude stewardess

review: Today I had an early flight from DTW to ORD and my new Fitbit was out of power and I wanted to see if they might have an Inmotion store.  I never realized all of this information is available on the app!  Brilliant.
title: Discovered!

review: This app is terrible in comparison to the other airline apps in terms of layout efficiency. Why is it that out of 5 or so different airlines/apps I’ve never had an issue finding a quick check in method to my fight but cannot seem to do so with this one. It should be one of the main options at the face of the app, come on people, it’s so simple!!
title: Terrible layout

review: I tried to look up a flight with the app as a guest. Even though I said it’s a round trip ticket for 4 people it only gives you a price for one person one way until the end. A round trip flight found with other airlines is half the price of not less (flight time, layover and seating all comparable). Unless I’m missing something simple I see no valid reason to use this app
title: Misleading

review: Agent at the gate was unable to sit our party of three together, despite having empty seats.  Also the flight attendants in the galley were talking loud during the entire flight.  Very disruptive.
title: Issues

review: Let me check in, and give me flight updates. So far, on this reticketed flight because our trip was delayed due to AA error yesterday, I am not able to check in on line or on the app. So annoying.
title: The app literally has one job 24 hours before a flight

review: It’s mind boggling how such an amazing app can receive poor reviews. I don’t get it. A frequent traveler finds this app very helpful, very easy to use and very comprehensive. 5 stars all the way! Continue doing what you’re doing!
title: AMAZING APP

review: The app itself is great, yes! I won’t deny it, it definitely makes it easier for travelers. But I don’t know if I’m the only person who opens the app, can’t use anything, reopen it, get 1 step further before I have to reopen it, and so on. I’m order for me to log in I have to reopen the app 6 times?
title: Buggy Maybe??

review:
This app is absolutely horrible, and it’s apparent the public agrees.  The fact that this app has only 9k reviews and it’s competitors have MILLIONS, really says something.

Interface is gross, and it’s functionality is just not great. But at the end of the day, it doesn’t surprise me.  American is SO FAR behind in its other tech areas as well, including their kiosks.  

Bad enough that I would take a spirit flight over American next time....
title: Garbage App

review: Change the program back to where i can see my boarding pass in the app. I dont want it in my apple wallet and when I need to use the boarding pass and I haven’t loaded it in the app it slows the lines down in the airport because it is loading and then makes you go to your wallet to get it. Not a seamless process.
title: Boarding Pass

review: The hidden tray table in seat 3B of my flight from chicago to Lexington had all left over food residue from previous flight, so its clear that someone didnt do thorough check for cleanliness n hygiene despite of the pandemic going on. Disappointed.
title: Just one complaint

review: The last two times I flew American I spent the night in the airport due to continuous delays and finally canceling my flights. Their customer service is worst than their cancellations. They do not offer hotel accommodations are any vouchers. You have to file a formal email complaint in order to receive compensation. I will do my best to never ever fly American again.
title: Horrible

review: I travel a lot for one of my jobs so I'm very familiar with most of the airline apps. Of all of them, this one is the least user friendly and the most restrictive. When I click on the boarding pass I want to see it, not add it to my apple wallet - It's silly I have to click on review each time.
title: Not the best

review: My flight attendant was sharp when she saw a bag sticking out from under a seat, but she could care less about ensuring all passengers received beverage service.  Between that, her constantly hitting my shoulder as she walked by, and the incessantly crying infant on board, the best part of that flight was getting off that plane from CLT to CAK. Ugh.
title: Inattentive Flight Attendant

review: I still use an iPhone 6 and am limited to iOS 12.5.4.  This app has suddenly stopped working properly for me and gives pop ups telling me to update to the latest version. I am using the latest version for iOS 12.5.4. This needs to be fixed.
title: No Longer Works with iOS 12.5.4

review: The maps of the airports don’t work and it no longer consistently shows time to boarding. I had to stop and look at a map on the wall in the airport to find the lounge because with or without WiFi the map would not work
title: Used to work better

review:
I lost my spot on a flight due to an app glitch, and called Americans Airlines customer service and they were not able to fix it. So frustrating!!

Any activity you do on the app, take screenshots as proof and check confirmation emails for different information than showed on the app to confirm things. Or better yet, ditch the app and only use browser.
title: USER BEWARE!!

review: I’ve been flying every week for a year now. Deltas app is way easier to navigate through. I’m creating an expense report for work, and I can’t find copies of my receipts or flights through this app. Whenever I go through Deltas app, I can find it all quick and easy. Also, mobile boarding passes can’t be shown in the app, they must be added to your wallet in your phone.
title: Very confusing app

review: The app info is great once you get it. However it takes forever to update and it rarely updates itself. I have had this app for several years and you need to stimulate the system repeatedly to get current info.
title: Super slow to update

review: Booked tickets and chose seats weeks ago even paid extra for a “premium” seat. Check in and get a text morning’s of flight saying our seats were changed from row 10 to row 34! Last row of the plane. No reason for it. Airline just doesn’t care who they bump around. Thank goodness for Doris at Ft. Lauderdale airport - she took care of it for us.
title: Seat change

review: I’ve now almost missed two connections because the app displayed incorrect or out-of-date gate information (out of two times using the app). Also, although my notifications are turned on, I failed to receive gate change info. I had to google it to find out what was going on. Terrible. UPDATE: Wrong baggage claim information.
title: unreliable for connecting gate information

review: AA is the best airline and the app allows for in-flight entertainment and they have the best movie and TV catalog. The app is funny though that when I try to redeem my earned miles it suddenly doesn’t work.... seems like a convenient time for the app to crash so not sure what that’s all about.
title: Decent but....

review: Finding where to go in the app for some functions is not always obvious.  The menu on the left side is missing choices like frequent flier information, which requires clicking on something else to find by chance.
title: Navigation is not clear and obvious

review: I have never had a problem with inflight entertainment. Would not allow me to watch any movies at all, but it kept playing all the ads.
title: Entertainment Fail

review: Requires newest ops 13. iPad does not support that ops so when you get that error message it thankfully asks if you want to go back and download the most recent compatible version. If you say yes it just keeps asking the question over and over and never executes the task. App is therefore unusable which is unfortunate when taking a long flight.
title: Compatibility

username: i dont want to make a name
review: Disappointing that I tried to watch the in-fight entertainment on two separate devices and the movie/tv would not load on either one. It just buffered for several minutes. The advertisements had no problem loading, each and every time I refreshed the screen, though.
title: Entertainment in flight

review: During checkin I was given the option to select and pay for specific seats, which I did and was charged for. Then before boarding I was put reassigned a seat in back of the plane in the middle seat, which I never accept. My plea to be seated for what I paid for was responded to by deplaning and speaking to the ticket agent. Totally unacceptable! I am terribly upset and feel helpless.
title: Reassigning My Seats w/o permission

review: Love the app but AA needs to look at the United app and update, they include up to date service offerings, where the plane came from and it always shows not just prior to the inbound landing, seat maps and much more
title: Decent but needs updates

review: Logging in is a chore because you need an account number that is only shown to you once in passing when you register your account. Also the mobile boarding passes don’t scan through TSA or their own kiosks. 1 star because the most basic of expected functions don’t work
title: Boarding passes don’t even scan

review: Never have I ever been so disappointed in a major airline competitor as I am today. They have all of the ability to provide cutting edge solutions to enhance the customer experience and they have failed at every step of the way. I may as well drive 780 miles instead of flying with American Airlines and using this terrible app.
title: You get what you pay for.

review: The app is simple to use extremely convenient and every time I fly American because of the friendly staff
title: Simple

review: So I enter everything and it says card is already on file. So I pick the card on file and it says it’s expired. So I fill in the new information and it says it’s already on file again!  Had to call AA. App is okay if you already have current credit card information on file.
title: Pretty terrible when dealing with credit cards

review: American Airlines needs a refund on the payments made to their app developers. It doesn’t even activate your keyboard when you need to type something. Isn’t that the most BASIC necessity for functionality?!?!?  😂😂😂 I’ve never seen anything quite like it! You literally can’t type anything in the app. Like ever! 🤦‍♀️🤣👋
title: Did you pay someone to make your app?

review: The app has many useful functions and proactively notifies you when your flight time approaches and if there are any changes.
title: Proactive notifications

review:
We checked in, paid for our seat and when we get to the airport at the gate, they tell us we are not checked in!!
Charged my card for the seats and I had a boarding pass on my phone, how can I not be checked in??
We then had to go back to the ticket corner and wound up with horrible seats, even though we had already paid for!!
Use another airline at all costs!!
title: Worst Ever

review: I’ve tried them all. AA app is hands down the most intuitive, most logically designed, and most user friendly.
title: Best Airline App

review: Maybe you could occasionally get the baggage claim right… That would be appreciated.
title: Although often inaccurate, better than nothing

review: I was extremely happy with the app until recently you cannot book an on hold reservation through the app without entering all your demographic info and credit card info again into the app. The app used to save it and you could more quickly complete the transaction. REDUCES USEFULNESS OF APP…PLEASE FIX
title: Please fix on hold flight payment through app issue

review: American continues to lose our luggage.  Both on international itineraries and domestic.  We even checked in at 4:30 am for a DFW to DCA and still managed to load our bags on the wrong flight.  They don’t even appear to be concern about it.  No apology just we’ll deliver your bags if you want to (window of 4-6 hours) after they locate your bags.
title: Lost baggage and lots of gate changes

review: This app tells you when your flit is in advance and tells you when there boarding. It’s very trust worthy.
title: This App

review: The future is now. App tracks everything and keeps you super informed. Example: had a bag get gate checked - app was instantly tracking the bag!
title: Wow

review: This app is great.. it only needs to be able for people to can book multiple destination flights  .. app is great
title: Great

review:
Please allow older versions of iPhones to update your app. At the moment, I am not ready or able to purchase a new phone. Greatly appreciate if this will occur!!!!!!!!!!
I have always been extremely satisfied with AA!!!!!!! Thank you!!!!!!!
title: App Update Required

review: They lost my bag I don’t know why they charge you $30 for you luggage and then they lose it plus it is a nightmare dealing with that specialty they don’t care they told me go look for it I told them this is not my job they said call Dallas location I told them you call them they said they never picked up the phone
title: Last time I will fly with American Airlines

review: This app helped me from start to finish! I can handle everything from canceling, booking, and customer from my app
title: Very helpful

review: I haven’t been able to get into the application for my last two flights and had multiple different errors pop up. It’s getting on my last nerve.
title: Not working

review: This app is garbage.  There are cattle car carries like Frontier, Allegiant, and Spirit with better apps. Upcoming flight info can’t be readily accessed upon launching the app.  You can’t add flights to your account after the fact like ALL other airline apps if you did not use your account at the time of booking.  Absolute GARBAGE.  Devs need to hang their heads in shame. Deleting!!!!
title: Not user friendly, terrible!!!!

review: The app is alright but if you leave it for a little while booking a flight, everything gets canceled. Also, all of there flights are always delayed. My mother’s flight was scheduled to go at 5:30 and still has ent gone while it’s 6:43. Over an hour late and is still being delayed. I am never going on a AAL flight again.
title: Horrible

review: Provides accurate update on flight status
title: Accurate and Easy to use

review: As always professional and attentive service. My first option when flying
title: VIP service

review: Good app in general. But has bugs when you really need it to be reliable. When adding boarding pass to apple wallet sometimes it makes the pass invalid. Happened multiple times for me. Extremely unsatisfied with this bug. Not acceptable.
title: Buggy but decent

review:
Writing this as I sit here waiting 2hrs + for another plane since AA made me miss mine. American Airlines will switch gates on you. Plus they wont even bother to notify you of the update via the app. Like many other airlines currently do.
Application still needs major development. These discrepancies shouldn’t even be an issue. I was at my gate an 1hr + early, waiting for nothing. Extremely upset!
title: Horrible app - Zero Stars if I could

review:
This app used to work at one point, now it just does not. Can’t even log in. Keeps giving me an error. I can login on my web browser, but not in the app. But even on the web browser, it does not have my upcoming flights. I have to do a physical search for it every time. Very frustrating. 
Hey American...having NO app is better than having a crap app that can’t be used.
title: Useless

review:
More often that not when trying to book international awards flights this app 
Gives error messages . Come back later .
System unable to process etc , have tried to delete and re load the app which accomplished nothing . Delta , united All 
Have superior apps that are way more intuitive and reliable .
title: Unreliable to book international rewards

review:
Can see flight info, but when checking in for an international flight, the confirm button won’t work after validating my passport. RFI scan will work but then not move forward.

Useful to *see* info but not take action for flights
title: Can’t check in

review:
The weather and Covid have not been kind to travel as of late & AA is fantastic!
On time and friendly helpful crew, can’t ask for more!
title: Great Flight & crew

review: This is the first time in a while that I have flown. The updates and text updates have taken a lot of angst out of connections.
title: Love love love this app

review: I have used many airline apps this one has to be the worst. I don’t know how many times I had to go back and add my gender it kept losing it then when I finally got through it told me I had a duplicate reservation so now I’m stuck with no reservation and I have a three hour wait for a phone call back from American Airlines
title: First time use

review: Once again, American let’s me down. They Rebooked my flight a couple of hours before departure from New York to Indy. However, they rebooked me at LGA across town when I was supposed to fly from JFK. Took a $50 taxi ride to get there, and now in Indy waiting on my bags to be unloaded. Plane landed at 11:56am and it is now 12:53pm. Still waiting fir them to unload the plane. Never Again!!
title: Hate this airline!!

review:
I was checking in with our pet like we always do the agent did like our kennel.
We explained to them we’ve used this kennel on many trips with no problem.
They made me leave to get another kennel which I didn’t and went to the gate.
The gate agent looked at the same kennel and had no issue with it.
Your ticket agents need more training on pet travel policies!
title: Ticket agents

review: The APP consistently has issues. Some features work sometimes and then you get “system error” other times or it just crashes on you in the middle of booking. Also, why can’t you book different a multi-leg trip on the APP like other Apps.
title: APP issues

review: I am completely in love with the AA app. Loving the new updates vi notification regarding my travel. I can see everything I need for travel and can resolve most issues by consulting the app.
title: Best Airline App

review: You don’t get back to applicants regarding the American Airlines Fly now Pay Later program. It’s absolutely unprofessional. You need to send an email and not ignore applicants with results. It doesn’t matter what those results are you need to be transparent. I fly a lot, but refuse to accumulate any more points since with AA since I am not valued as a customer.
title: American Airlines is not professional

review: After I check in with boarding pass, I change my seat and I see there is gate update, but the boarding pass won’t update the new info!
title: It won’t update on boarding pass

review: My app keeps crashing on my iPod touch. Was fine yesterday, but not responding today even with updates, plenty of storage and device less than two years old. No troubleshooting help for this problem on app FAQ’s or internet. No issues with United, Delta, JetBlue and Frontier apps.
title: App crashing

review:
The fact that you log in and it doesn’t auto populate your upcoming flights is unbelievable.

I logged in to see my flight, why would I then have to go find the record locator in my email, which has my flight info to then go back and type it into the app. Incredibly useless.
title: Finding booked flights

review: The app takes over something in my phone and launches each time I unlock my phone despite having a flight on another airline. Super annoying and almost made me uninstall the app. Gets in the way of presenting boarding pass on another airlines app
title: App opens by itself at the airport even when flying on another airline

review: Social distancing is being emphasized throughout the airport and getting off the plane. While flying for hours, you are packed on a full plane, elbow to elbow.  There was a group of individuals who had a strong wet cough, while the airline is not responsible for their actions, stronger screening could be done
title: Packed too tight

review: While traveling alone with my young children, and after waiting in a very long TSA line, one boarding pass didn’t work while the others did. We had to go all the way back to ticketing for paper tickets and wait another hour in the line. I saw this happen to several other American passengers after it happened to us.
title: Electronic boarding passes don’t work

review:
It took 40 minutes for the airline to know where they put an entire plane of baggage. After three different employees gave us three different carousels, the passengers found our bags on a carousel never hypothesized about. Meanwhile the app and the monitors never changed their bad information once while an entire plane of passengers were forced to hunti for their own luggage at LAX.

 I hate this airline.
title: Worst airline, worst app

review:
This is the single worst user experience ever for me on the iPad. I couldn’t even enroll due to numerous error notifications that were incorrect.  Phone number, password, and other fields would not accept any input at all.  Auto enter, though appearing in many fields, failed to work in any of them.  

This is American Airlines, right?!  The largest airline in the world.  Unbelievable fail!
title: Amateur Hour!  Worst app I’ve ever used.

review: AMERICAN airlines canceled a flight reschedule me on the next day.  In the end I cannot get my boarding pass without way too much work.  This airline is not customer friendly and the app is not user friendly.   It is clear from the cancellation of the flight to the app user interface.   I would pick another airline.
title: Poor app

review: Always on time, up to the minute status. Saves time, frustration and checking in is a breeze!!!
title: Great app!!!

review: I’ve tried almost every airlines apps and nothing even comes close to the functionality of American Airlines App period.
title: Best Airline App in the game!!!

review:
On a recent business class flight SJU to MIA they upgraded a passenger next to me who was maskless 90% of the flight.  When I complained to a flight attendant they said the scam was well known to AA (they specifically warned passengers over the PA of it).  It consists of ordering alcohol and continuously sipping from the glass, circumventing the mask rule.

There is a very simple solution:  STOP serving beverages to people who abuse this exception to the mask requirement.
title: Masking not enforced

review: For no apparent reason, I was locked out of my account and it took 4 days of waiting on the phone (many long waits and call-backs) until I finally found someone who could help (she was quite helpful which is why I raised from one to two stars)
title: Account lock out

review: The current version of this app requires iOS 13 or above to run and the smart developers didn’t think to make it backwards compatible.  While my kids both have newer iPhones my wife and I don’t, but unfortunately for American Airlines, guess who chooses which airlines to fly and handles the check in process?
title: Fly Southwest if you have an older IPhone

review: American Airlines is a complete disaster. Every single time I fly with them, they not only delay every single flight by multiple hours, they also lose my checked bags. They have cost me countless vacation days while getting me back to my destination no earlier than 2 AM. I’d rather fly spirit or walk next time I plan a trip then take American.
title: Worst Airline

review: Horrible customer service at FAT, not trained well but mostly attitude is so bad!  They were insulting and did everything to make it as hard for me as possible.  On way home , much better, flights were on time and attitude was great, however, once I landed, got notice my luggage will be delayed.  Here we go again, is it Fresno or American ?!
title: American has really slacked

review: For many reasons- but I love because it is the Best way to keep your travels moving - with advance warnings on weather and ability to make changes seamless- thank you!!
title: Soooo easy!!

review: App does not let me log in (gives me an error every time) and does not load certain prompts so I can’t even continue as guest and find my trip.
title: Terrible App

review: After checking in finding how to add a bag is impossible. Aldo, if being redirected the login info does not carry over and therefore has to be Emeterio manually can not be copied from saved info
title: Could be better

review: Every time I go into the app to check in for a flight and get my tickets, there is an error for retrieving my reservations and, after seemingly going through the check in process, it is not able to give my my mobile tickets. These are the basic functions of the app, so they should be working consistently.
title: Issues with retrieving reservations and ticketing

review: The most important part of this app is making sure the inflight entertainment works if you use Bluetooth headphones. This one does not, it sends you in circles, nothing plays pack except for the commercials. So that was a nice 6 hours, thanks AA. Tried the headphones they hand out but it was like listening to the original phonograph, I couldn’t even understand any speech inside the continuous howling resonance they emit.
title: Absolute garbage

review: This app is helpful but I would like to see it be able to display my boarding pass too. As well as allow me to enter phone numbers of those with me so that they can get their boarding passes sent to them too.
title: Good but needs work

review: Overall the app is good and I use it weekly. My one frustration is with the new update, which won’t allow me to see my boarding pass. Instead, it wants me to send them to my Apple wallet. I don’t use my apple wallet and don’t want to do that, why try to force me to use it? This is an idiot design addition and gets a one star for the app instead of the four stars I’d otherwise give
title: Good app- but apple wallet?

review: AA deleted my awards account I had for 30 years, causing me to waste time creating a new one just to take advantage of the app. When done, neither app nor website allows me to add existing trips to the new account. I can look up by locator number but have to repeat that each time. I am a seasoned flyer and have other airlines apps, and I tend to agree with the reviews that rate this one as subpar. TIME IS MONEY, AA!
title: Can’t add trips

review: Over the past few months the app has had constant connectivity errors. None of my other apps experience these problems and I’m able to get to my web browser without problems so it’s definitely an issue with the app. Very frustrating.
title: Constant system errors

review: Sitting at the gate in hub airport CLT where a delay has been posted and then an announcement about a maintenance issue. App says flight is on time and throws an error when retrieving the boarding time, which passed about 45 mins ago. Like the track bag feature.
title: Most common response is “Error”

review:
Can you please add the ability to buy ticket from the app using miles? I would think that’s a basic expectation- no?

Also, about once a month, I get connection errors when I start the app.
title: Buying a ticket w/ miles and connection errors

review: I have an older iPad and it won’t download IOS 13.  Now my AA app doesn’t work.  Thanks.  15 year platinum or above and now I cannot watch movies.  Nice.
title: Terrible only IOS 13.

review: I fly every other week. When my company makes me fly American, they lose bags, over charge for check in bags when they lose them constantly, they cancel flights at last minute, Stewardess are usually rude. If i got to book my own flights i would pay extra to fly ANY other airlines!
title: Never good experience

review:
I flu 2411 flight on May 8 and my bag was lost. I understand this things occasionally happened but the service I received was completely inappropriate. I waited in line for over an hour. I asked the men behind the counter to get help to facilitate the process but got nowhere. 
The airlines lately delaying and cancelling flights, loosing bags, enormous lines ect. and no accountability whatsoever!
title: Lost luggage

review: Don’t forget your password for this app- if you try to re-set it even while you are logged in it will demand… the forgotten password!  Idiotic and useless.  Oh, and you have to enter your whole life story to submit a request for assistance.  Most of the information requested has no relevance to the subject you are asking about.
title: A total time-waster

review: Why do you have to input your record locator number when the app already knows who you are? That’s really stupid. Even stupider is I have to find a nickname that has not been used in order to execute the send of this complaint. Whoever designed your app just does not understand how users want to work with it.
title: Track your bags

review: The in flight entertainment only worked half of the time. We had two legs to our flight. It worked for me on the first flight but not my wife. The opposite happened on the second flight. Annoying
title: Poor in flight entertainment

review: Wanted to say the flight attendant in first class was excellent. Even with a mask you could tell he had a smile. Very attentive and professional
title: Miami flight

review: Our three hour flight from Chicago to Boise had no in flight entertainment because the WiFi was not connected to the internet. The flight attendant would and could not help and simply stated “see it’s online”. Despite the app saying there is no connection to the internet. Was very disappointing experience
title: WiFi

review:
The App works fine on mainline flights in the US but codeshare info is not updated even what terminal flight leaves.  Honestly that’s a limitation in most US carrier apps which is why I rely on App in the Air but AA limits integration which makes it less ideal.
Just fix your codeshare flight info please...
title: Need Codeshare integration

review: No way to upgrade to first class in app(other airline lets me do this). To upgrade to first class will cost 15K miles AND $50???? Why even have miles then? (Other airlines lets you upgrade for some flights for 4K miles and no fee). Also during COVID AA fills their planes up(no concern for safety, only profits.) Other airlines fill it 65%
title: Terrible app. Terrible company. Terrible everything.

review: I was traveling last week when my flight got cancelled. As I was walking down a street in NYC, the system auto-rebooked me and got my seats. It was pretty awesome.
title: Flight cancelled. Rebooked via app.

review: I can log in online but the app won’t allow me to log in. Customer support says it can’t see my failed attempts at logging in. After 25 minutes on the phone the best they could do is tell me that they are having multiple issues with iPhone 8,10, and 11 and are working on it. FYI, this has been an issue for many months now.
title: Doesn’t work for me

review: I downloaded this app because I cannot get the Record Locator on the website to work. This app doesn’t work at all. The interface is just a pretty backdrop that takes up the majority of the screen, the American logo is at the top corner and there are three buttons in a bar along the bottom of the screen. The buttons don’t respond to anything.
title: Doesn’t work.

review:
Seat colors are white or grey- so far so good. Now when I choose a seat, rather a “color” change, I get that a “seat was taken “ color. So w/ out a true color change, allI know is that the seat assignment is taken- but by me? - or someone else?
     A color like blue or red or green, for example indicates that I took the seat assignment, rather than the fog of grey.
title: Seat color upon assignment

review: I have to say the app give accurate information but your service is horrible
title: Ok

review: The boarding pass doesn’t update correctly. My gate and seat assignment changed, those changes were shown in the app but not in the boarding pass regardless of the number of times it was refreshed.
title: Boarding pass function

review: Customers were left waiting at the scheduled carousal with no updates on app or baggage screens. Some heard over the intercom after a period of time. From my experience (22 years) Sea-Tac is challenged with their workers in baggage claim.
title: Baggage Claim

review: Great App, timely information and updates, always abreast of what’s going on.
title: Info is up to date

review: Wonderful and courteous staff, even when I’m not traveling in 1st class. There are exceptions every where but overall a very friendly and hospitable staff from Ticket counter to flight attendants.
title: Arun Singh

review: American Airlines has the worst customer service. Pay first class fare and get treated like your riding public transportation. Will never. Ever. Fly this airline again. Showed up to the fate 13 minutes before departure and I wasn’t allowed to board. 2 minutes late. Even for first class. The agent was rude. Handed me a standby boarding pass and that’s all. Ba bye!
title: This is the worst airline

review: Since flying American last spring and a scheduled flight this September I can no longer view my flight status. Shows I need an update which my iPhone 6s won’t accept. United has no problem with my phone. The price of getting a new phone is more than the flight. Guess who I will be flying with!
title: Poor compatibility

review: Two flights canceled, new flight is delayed, and probably won’t make my connection. Also lost the isle seat I selected for the first flight and am now stuck in the center. Attempted to address the issue with counter staff and all I got was “I’m sorry”. I will not be flying AA in the future if there are any other options.
title: Poor service

review: The only service that was offered in flight was taking any garbage that we might have brought on the flight. Not even a water was offered. Very disappointed.
title: International flight

review: I tried to cancel a flight on the app, but when I click on “cancel flight”, it brings up seat selection. Maybe the app just does not work on iphone8. Now I have to sit on hold with their customer service because the app doesn’t work.
title: Buggy

review: I flew first class & you guys put a dog in first class which is for someone that needed it but you should communicate that to the rest of your passengers who are close by. I’m allergic to dogs. And I’ve been waiting for my luggage now for way too long & there’s been no communication. This is not about Covid just things you guys need to work on.
title: Poor communication

review: I spoke to customer service, tweeted, everything. The app is useless. Can’t log in and constantly get errors. As a frequent flyer, I’ve started using other airlines because I can’t get my tickets from the app, and the website redirects me to this useless app. My whole opinion of the airline has dropped because of the lack of effort gone into this thing.  Just use United.
title: Useless app

review: Overall, I like the app, but recently it has been crashing when swiping up to review account information and award miles activity. I tried deleting and adding the app again, but the problem persists.
title: App keeps crashing

review: I live by this app almost every week and it just gets better all the time.
title: American app

review: The app is not easy to use. When filling out my personal information I could not click the Save button because the bottom menu was blocking it. It didn’t even make sense to have the Promotions and Wallet buttons showing there. Pretty basic design flaw.
title: Poor user experience

review: Why do we have to wait soooooooooooo long for our bags. Its been over 30 minutes. This is ridiculous. It only gets worse. Never better. What're they doing back there ? Going through our bags ? What exactly. How do I get here before my bags when its a super long walk !!
title: Baggage claim

review: Flew five times overseas on the last 3 months and the app made everything easy and practice. All flyght info in one touch.
title: Perfect

review: I’ve been using this app to make reservations check in look for gates etc. It’s all easy breezy I’m glad I have it!
title: Easy breezy App

review:
The AA app is smooth, easy to understand, informative, and customer friendly. I don’t know what else I would want in an app. -
Charmane Tatum, USAF
title: Great Customer interface

review: I resent AA for making their app only compatible with iOS 13+. There are many people with perfectly functioning iPhones that don’t update to 13, and don’t like the pressure from the app developers to throw away those phones and contribute more to Apple’s coffers. My Delta app still works; I guess it’s just easier now to make my reservations there.
title: Resentful

review: Great app to create reservation, check flight status, track luggage, get boarding passes and much more.
title: American app

review: Until last week ap was sufficiently functional to search and book flights, AAdvantage program details, track luggage, etc. Suddenly, the ap will no longer work on my iPhone 6. If it ain’t broke, why mess around with this. Hope they’re not messing around like this with their air planes
title: Too many bells and whistles

review: I have been using the for many many years with out issue. Now it will not let me log in. I am able to log in using the website but the app just doesn’t log in anymore. Keeps telling me that my credentials are wrong…but they work on the website. So, no stars for inability to log in.
title: No longer logs in

review: You had me running through the airport with A four year old and a six year old because you posted check in at 9:14 for flight number 3858. When we got to the gate they said that the check in time was 945. American Airlines you lied needlessly and you caused me great undue stress with my broken back and these two children.
title: Departure time

review: ❤️ don’t know what to say this app makes it easy. Book flights even has map of the airports
title: Luv it

review: The text can’t be enlarged, it’s too small and they put too much useless garbage info on the screen and not the important stuff.  I can’t land on a Monday and check into my Tuesday flight without fits of poking everywhere.  United is way better and easier app and is intuitive, this is a model of poor design.
title: Horrible application

review: The airline did a good keeping things running smooth everything went great
title: Great trip couldn’t be better

review: Takes a lot of time.  A lot of error messages.  When it works it is great. The problem is it has a lot of skips  where it double loads the screen and keeps flipping it in.  Didn’t used to be this way not sure what happened.
title: Skips a lot.

review: Thought I'd be slick and stay informed, on behalf of my group. However, both upon departure and arrival (a week later), DFW changed our gate, and the app didn't update until our large group had trudged back and forth across the airport, with no time to spare.
title: Bad experience from the start

review: There is no option to change reservation.  This is a must for COV-ID times.   With countries not allowing travel, you must be able to change reservations.    Waiting on hold on the reservation system for over an hour is ridiculous.
title: No option to change reservation

review: There were several gate change for my trip from DFW to MSP. The boarding pad had a different gate than the app, and got email notice from AA with a different gate. All were different and app never did update. AA agent at service desk told me to use google to search for gate info. Kind of makes the app pointless.
title: Out of sync- pointless app.

review: Even though I checked in with the app 23 hours ago, I keep getting notifications telling me to check in. Also, every time I go into the app, the Apple Calendar keeps telling me there is a change to my flight. Not true. Please fix these major annoyances.
title: Annoying notifications

review: If you are used to using your mobile for coordinating travel, get ready to be infuriated with the lack of intuition. You can’t check in, you can’t get a boarding pass for Apple (that works—thru the app or thru the website) and you can’t do anything. Be prepared to show up to the airport extra early, to deal with agents that have to navigate the same technology.
title: Worst app

review:
Can’t tell whether it’s the most recent app version or an iOS 13 compatibility issue, but inflight movies refuse to play full screen on an iPad (mini 4 in my case). Flew Boston to Miami nonstop today and the movie (tried more than one) insisted on what appears to be 4 by 3 format cutting off the sides of the picture. 

I’ve watched numerous movies before, as recently as last July, without this bug.
title: Movie bug

review: Downloaded it to manage a flight I had coming up and immediately had issues. At first just the background cams up, no menu. Killed the app. Then none of the buttons worked, but I could swipe up and down. Killed the app and opened it again. Finally was able to get it to work and then it crashed. Looks nice. Not worth it.
title: Don't use

review: Wanted to check in through the app for international travel. Instead of manually entering my passport information I used the scanning feature. The letters it entered were NOWHERE near my actual name. Since it didn’t match my reservation info I won a trip to the check in desk because it’s locked me out of online check in. Thanks for nothing.
title: Poor passport scanning feature

review: I have yet to be able to book flights using this app. Every single time it errors out at some point in the process. Same message “Oops, we’re having problems with our system. Please wait a few minutes and try again.” I’ve tried it several times on different days and it has never worked. Worst app ever.
title: Never works

review: The platform is easier to use and functional than it used to be but it is constantly crashing and searches constantly fail making booking a flight nearly impossible.
title: Better than it used to but still a huge pain

review: The app is ridiculously slow, to the point where it is almost unusable. It also takes up an insane amount of storage. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app to clear the storage and it somehow already has over 300MB of documents, not including the size of the app itself. How is that even possible?
title: Terrible, slow, and frustrating

review: App is extremely slow especially when it freezes trying to load adds for their credit cards. Like everything else this company does, they are trying to squeeze every last dollar they can out of you. The delta app is way more convenient and has a much better UI, for comparison.
title: Backwards app by a backwards company

review: The app used to work well for me, but now the “small enhancements” implemented require an operating system (iOS 13.0) that is incompatible with my iPhone 6.
title: Small Enhancements, Like Requiring New iOS

review: App gave me wrong baggage claim at New Orleans, said 8, there is no 8, it was baggage claim 4. Also makes me save boarding pass to wallet, I do like that, I want my boarding pass viewable in the app, AA has to many gate changes to have the passes in my wallet. Sorry 3 stars is even a push.
title: AA App

review: Got the app for upcoming flight. Trying to navigate through the app. Only app I have had issues with the touch not functioning. It wanted you to use the key board next Instead of touching the next field. That is very atypical
title: Touch doesn’t work well

review: My phone does not support iOS 13!  Not every one wants/Needs to invest a week’s salary staying current with Apple’s obsolescence strategy.  It worked fine with iOS 12.  I’ll guess I’ll upgrade the phone with the money I normally would have used to fly somewhere.  Ridiculous!!!
title: Why did you make this only work with IOS 13?!?!

review: This is the second flight where the monitor on flight was not working.  It’s frustrating when you’re on a flight of 5+ hours.
title: Entertainment monitor not working

review: This company is awful. They left me stranded at the airport at midnight because two of their flights in a row were late (due to AA scheduling flights too close together). They also didn’t update the app for delays until planes had already landed over an hour late. Please spend your money with a more reputable company.
title: Don’t fly with this company

review: While the app works well most of the time. Considering it’s used to catch flights not as dependable as I’d like. Especially when you need iOS 13 for an update. And don’t have time to update iOS so your just straight out of luck. Terrible choice to add this limitation. Thanks AA!
title: Nonfunctional

review: The app is set up in such a way as to dump your reservation any moment you go to another app - be it contacts, credit card and mail or calendar! By the time you reenter all your info after it dumps the rez, the price has gone up - in my case by $80... booo!!! 😳🤬👎
title: App Helps Bait & Switch Price Gouging

review: The app is so user friendly. It even tells me when my bags arrive.
title: User friendly

review: American has always been the best airline for me. Now that I am retired I do not travel frequently, but every time I do it is the same wonderful experience
title: Great Airline

review: It would be much appreciated if i was able to toggle options in settings for language change through the app.
title: Language Change in Application

review: ridiculous that the app doesn't realize that you fly every day and you constantly have to retype you frequent flyer number.
title: Points

review: I loved this app. But for the last week or so I have not been able to use it successfully. It keeps giving me a “connection error while retrieving your reservation” message. I have to go out to the full site to check in for my flights and email my boarding passes. I sure hope this is fixed soon it’s a major inconvenience.
title: Unusable

review:
Good: I can see how many miles I have accumulated.

Bad: 
1. Difficult to book a flight when you like to read through linked documents, such as the travel insurance policy, before moving forward with the transaction. When you come back, all the progress you’ve made on booking the flight is gone. I was trying to decide if I needed travel coverage for this trip. I guess my answer will always be no when using this app. So frustrating.

2. Also randomly restarts, and again, forces me to start all over. I hate this app.

3. WHY DO YOU KEEP FORCING ME TO RE-LOGIN, EFFECTIVELY LOCKING ME OUT OF MY ACCOUNT WHEN I MISINPUT MY PASSWORD MORE THAN ONCE?!? 

I HATE THIS BUG INFESTED APP.
title: What a worthless app.

review: Every time I try to open the app it says there’s a server error. I do it from my phone internet. That actually works. I tried”opening the app from the web page and it gave the error as well, so I just use the internet instead. Frustrating when they change flights and you have to get your new mobile wallet.
title: Never works

review:
The worst Airline ever, the attendants are rude, 
bags sent to different cites twice, with no help or assistance.  I will be calling AS headquarters and the Attorney General office in NC, for a first class ticket, and no professional care to baggage, this is be on service.  All
of employees are on their cell phones, not helping your customer.  When you ask for the employees name, the answer is “I have no name, figure it out”   Good job on failing customer service.
title: D. Johnson

review: I’ve had zero problems with the APP.  Platinum Member. Am a pretty frequent flyer. Not sure what perfection some are looking for in an Airline App.  It does everything I need and is constantly improving.
title: Great APP

review: The best looking and easiest airline app I’ve used. Shame that they don’t update their flight information quickly on the app.
title: Easy to use app, but slow updates

review: Tried to sign up.  Entered all information and hit submit. Nothing. Checked all information was correct. Hit submit again nothing. Oh well I will sign on as guest.  Needed my advantage #.   So requested number.  Said I would receive email with my number.  Never received and I also checked spam in case it went there. Nothing. Never could get signed in😢
title: Horrible app

review:
This is awful. Can’t log in as a member or guest. Anything you try to access says ...could not be completed error. 

Despite having both status and their terrible credit card, I figured I could try to change my middle seat via the app but sadly you cannot do anything with this awful app. 

American is the worst all around.
title: Don’t Bother Downloading

review: Seriously? I get an email about my upcoming flight and so I click to see the information about my flight and I’m able to view everything on my PC. While I’m not bringing my PC with me so I need it on my phone app but this app says they cannot find my reservation or trip. What a worthless app
title: App can’t find my flight

review: This app is well laid out and definitely a necessity. Food ordering works great and the airport maps are accurate
title: Invaluable!!

review: I scanned my passport to check in for my international flight. The correct information appeared on the app however the app would not allow me to confirm. The confirmation button appears to be working however nothing happens on the screen. My app is up to date so there shouldn’t be an issue.
title: Not Great

review: Travel is back.
title: Not a problem. Little waiting.

review: All international freight provide 2 check in bags but i was denied with out informed prior while on customer care call, i was told okey to bring 2bags. Even my single bag that was check didnt come with me now i dont even know when i will have it instead am told to open a baggage claim or loss claim. Am very much disappointed and angry
title: International freight not satisfied

review:
Checked bag in Dallas.  It was put on a different plane that arrived two hours later. Had to wait.

Checked bag in Chicago.  App stated that the bag arrived and could be picked up at A17.  Waited 30 minutes for all bags to arrive. No bags.  Went to customer service and was told that my bag is at D16.  The manager didn’t even apologize.  It was my problem not hers.  Wow!  Did COVID kill customer service at American Airlines?

Had to hike half way down the terminal to catch the shuttle to D.  Shuttle went to B first.  One hour after I landed, I have my bag.

I want a refund for the $60 that I paid you at a minimum.
title: Flight to Chicago and back to Dallas

review: Flights were canceled going and coming back for our birthday party group. We had to be dropped off 3 hours away from our home and find our own way home. Some of us were able to get our bags while others were in a different city. Worst experience ever.
title: Cancel Flights

review: Claims it needs updated iOS which isn’t available for my phone then says I can download last previous version of the app that works. But selecting download just brings up the download button again, over and over. Don’t they validate that their app works before releasing it? What a waste.
title: Lousy

review: An instrumental part to my on-boarding and off boarding. Makes flying: seamless and efficient. A must have for anyone’s arsenal.
title: Flawless

review: By far one of the best flying experiences in awhile. AA has stepped up their game in the customer service department. Will be flying with them again! 🤙🏽
title: Exceptional service

review: I will be flying with them in the future , I dislike the 5 hour layover , but everything else was great and the booking was easy. THANKS AA
title: Vacation

review: Still could be improved to make it even better
title: Great App

review: I was speaking to a customer service rep about changing my flight but was explaining that I was not happy with all the fees.  Then the app crashed and the rep CHARGED MY CARD and I could not get into the app again to change my reservation. I am furious.
title: They charged me for a flight change without my permission and then the chat function crashed

review: It took me over an hour to book my simple flight. The app crashed multiple times while trying to book my flights.  Even kicked me out while paying and I had to restart.
title: Crashed constantly

review: I checked in, I think. It never announced that I had succeeded. I used a medium iPad. Pages never adjusted to portrait mode, so I had to switch to landscape mode. I saw no option to print or add the wallet, as they claim. The app needs a lot of temporal review on different screens such as iPads, etc. Just careless design.
title: Clumsy

review: Hey clowns!! When you update the app - DO NOT make me sign back in again!!! Stop thinking you are that important!! You are NOT! Couldn’t sign in... entered wrong password in 6 times... you LOCK me out AND make me call your cust service to reset it BUT those crybabies went home for the night!!! So... I bought my flight on Delta!
title: Update App and you DUMPED all my info!!??

review: All other apps on up my iPad work but this one.  It’s a great app on the phone, but I only get the coronavirus warning and the left navigation is dead.  I deleted and reinstalled it and now I can even log in.  This happened under iOS 13.7 and continues under 14.0.  I hope it gets fixed!
title: Works great on my iPhone, but not on my iPad

review:
Nothing like an airline app that refuses to give you access to your boarding passes. Even better when you contact the airline you are told “Simply go to the ticket counter for a boarding pass”

If I wanted to go to the ticket counter I wouldn’t bother with the app in the first place!

The app is a perfect encapsulation of the airline as whole. The people that are responsible for it know it is broken and that overall it is a bad product but they just don’t care and seem to take pleasure from the fact that people are unhappy with it.

American Airlines we love BDSM and it shows!
title: Gets worse and worse with every update

review: Countless times when I try to purchase a checked bag the app says their system is having trouble and the payment appears to not go through. Moments later I will get an email receipt for the purchase from AA, but then on the app it shows that I haven’t purchased a checked bag. The is only one of my complaints about this airline.
title: American is the worst airline

review:
Nothing against the airline but this app is stupid and chock full of non-essential crap.

1. Portrait mode hides or annoyingly abbreviations all your flight information
2. Finding your boarding pass is not apparent 
3. Once you find an option to see your boarding pass buried under Manage My Flight, the app doesn’t store a copy to download to your device to avoid printing. It emails you a link to your boarding pass. So you’re using three apps, two of which relies on WiFi or data, when everything should be available in the airlines application. 
4. Boarding pass available by screenshot??

See Finnair’s app.
title: Garbage app

review: It’s been days and days. I am just trying to get rid of miles because this frequent flyer program is poor at best. I love the Southwest frequent flyer program. Trying to redeem miles for a trip and it does not work. Keeps saying error day after day after day. I can’t wait to get rid of these miles so I never have to fly American again.
title: Doesn’t Work

review: I have always like the interface, clean, modern and helpful. I have never had any problems with it.
title: Good interface

review:
Sums it up.
 -Formatting for login is off and doesn’t accept correct password information
-have no idea about retrieving boarding passes. Had to print mine out because I wasn’t able to access thru app (even your email link to mobile boarding pass is a disaster)

It looks snazzy. Looks only get you so far. Please find a new developer.
title: Worthless

review: It works fine I book reservations on here, check flight status and watch TV during the flight.
title: IT WORKS FINE!

review: When this app works, it’s great. In my experience though, sometimes the flights don’t get updated so I never see the time or the gate, it’s just blank which is really annoying and not helpful at all. I’ve never had this problem with the United App.
title: Flight doesn’t get updated

review: Just updated! And.... this app doesn’t work. You can only use the “Flight Status” Find Trip” and “Book Flight” options. Try to scroll up to use any other part of the app and it crashes. Pretty pathetic and frustrating. AA needs to get it together on the digital front. They seem to be a few steps behind their peers.
title: App doesn’t work properly

review: Not too bad of an app...just recently it won’t recognize my username/password. Since it keeps doing that I have to login on safari and the issue doesn’t occur
title: Login Issues

review:
I have traveled 3.6 million miles on American Airlines and still continue to travel mostly on American. 
Given today’s airline services in the US I find AA still as my prefered airline.
title: Many years of mostly good service

review: Thank you for keeping me updated
title: I love they give updates about the flight, and baggage

review: Even though I have this app on my phone, and have used it for years, the app icon is nonexistent all of a sudden. If I search for it I can use it, but where is the actual app icon? Why would you change it so it is invisible now?
title: Where is it?

review: I did not get the gate agent’s name in Phoenix, but was very pleased with her help! She straightened out a mixed up seat assignment concern with a smile, professional ability and competence.
title: Customer Service!!

review: For the second time during my journey they have lost my wheelchair your agent do have no compassion on people with disabilities how do u put a wheelchair on the plane u get to your next destination nobody knows anything I'm tired of this no one should be treated like I should be confiscated in someway something needs to be done actions need to be taken
title: Not a happy camper

review: Rarely works like it’s supposed to. Times out all the time. The links rarely get you what you actually need. The live chat makes more problems and never fixes anything. If MS Dos was an app. Shouldn’t be surprised since the airline is as efficient and works as well as the app. 80 flights and still punishing mysef
title: Is this thing on?

review: I was given the run around for two hours on my luggage being delayed before I was able to file a claim. My suitcase cover is damaged AND my lock was cut off. It was. TSA approved lock and could have EASILY been opened with a master key. They also messed up on my seating for both flights. I am done with this airline.
title: I will NEVER fly AA again!

review: App allows me to find the most important information without having to dig for it
title: Works Great

review: The gate people at DCA are rude, uncaring and gestapo like.   I was ‘ordered’ to check my back because of its size, eventhough the same bag was put in the overhead on the flight in.  The flight attendants must hate their jobs because they did not have the ability to say thank you for flying as we deplaned.   Tremendously disappointing!
title: Service fit for no one

review: Professional as usual the Flight attendants were attentive and made sure masks were properly worn.
title: Thank You

review: Tried to use they’re chat to talk with customer support, after an hour of waiting it got disconnected and wouldn’t re connect. So I decided to call and after waiting on hold for 2 hours I hung up. All for something I should be able to confirm on they’re app or website.
title: Awful customer service

review: Weather was a problem on my way, no ones fault. Now my return flight also has been canceled, but there were no weather alerts. All said my flights were on time. A lot of waiting in line for rebooking. I don’t have money to stay in a hotel again. I’ve missed 2 days of work now
title: Rough Travels

review: Glitches occur often forcing app delete and reload.
title: Glitches

review: Awesome App! It would be cool to have the ability to snap a pic etc for the location of your vehicle when parking short or long term. Just a though 😀
title: Airport Parking reminder

review: One of the worst apps you will use. Confirm or submit buttons covered by other menus and not able to scroll down far enough, very difficult to enter mileage number and check miles, not intuitive functionality with very hard to find options.
title: Unusable

review: This app is awful. I try to log into the app and it tells me my information is incorrect even though that same information works online. I’ve changed my info so many times thinking it’s me but it is clearly the app.
title: Terrible app

review: I have travelled from DCA to DAY and STL the last couple of weeks and have had flawless service.  Great time from the ticket counter, baggage, flights, etc.!!
title: Excellent Service

review: This is the worst app of any airline.  Never can login successfully. Due to this frustration I removed it from my phone awhile back.  Today I decided to give it another try because their website is worthless too.  Still a bad app.  Can you give an app less than one star?
title: Horrible

review: Though I find AA’s frequent flyer benefits lacking the app is great. I especially like the up to the minute gate and baggage claim info. The entertainment option is also a plus
title: Pretty great app

review: The AA app is by far the best amongst the many I have encountered. And even when there is a bit of a curveball thrown it’s way, the AA tech folks figure it out fast.
title: In a MVP class all by itself

review: Don’t use this app. There was an issue with the app telling me that I’m boarding at a different terminal gate than the one I’m supposed to be at. Then I went to American Airlines customer support and the support person told me I should have been using google instead of the app for flights/times. Clearly American Airlines isn’t aware of this and doesn’t plan to fix it.
title: Not worth it

review: Many others have already pointed out many of the flaws. Very annoying that you cannot manage your credit card preferences and you have to pay first when changing a flight then you can choose a seat. I got stuck in the middle. This alone will make me avoid American.
title: Poorly designed in limited control

review: Got the app because I thought it would be easier than dealing with their customer service for general flight services. App constantly times out, error messages for everything I need to do. Get your crap together American!
title: Constantly delayed just like their flights...

review: I don’t honk I would like this app if it would pull up my information. I sign on with the same user if and password that I use on the web but none of my itineraries come up. I can check flight statuses if I know the flight numbers but I have to lookup that information from email so that I can go back to the app to use it. It’s not very useful.
title: Not useful

review: Excellent, just a bit slow at times but great other than that
title: Great

review: Wish reservation and flight info were more complete and available on app like website
title: Good but need website for important things

review: The app is unusable. I could not change or edit my current reservations or book new flights because the button to continue is hidden slightly out of range for me to be able to select.
title: Not able to use app for any flight management

review: It’s easy to maneuver. Looking for flights , changing seats, manage miles, it’s all very easy to use.
title: Easy

review: Where is the dates when viewing my flights? Shows on the outbound but not the return.
title: Dates

review: You literally can’t use this app to book flights or redeem miles because the stupid tab in the bottom of the page is in the way of the button to search.
title: App is a joke. Can’t redeem miles or book flights because tab is in the way.

review: The staff were wonderful. Flights on time. And two empty seats next to me is always a bonus.
title: Great Experience

review: It took me forever to get electronic tickets.  Name and locator number would not take after several times.  Coming and going,  same thing. Also, before you even get to that point, you have to go through several pages of upgrades.
title: Difficult to get tickets

review: App does not let you rebook the flight you want. Crappy app chooses the flights it will let you rebook on.
title: Terrible app

review: I had great flights and good customer service on the flights but the luggage delivery in Raleigh is always so long a wait? Why???
title: Great flight la but very poor luggage delivery in Raleigh

review: Just arrived in KC on flight 1397. Everything was great about the flight except the temperature. I’m someone that is usually cold and I was uncomfortable so I’m sure others really were.
title: Temperature

review: AA has provided exceptional service over the past 18 months since I have been flying.
title: Exceptional Service

review: First time flying post pandemic.   Flew both delta and American.    Delta had drinks and snacks, American did not.    The baggage tracking app worked great on delta.    Dot so well with American.   So you are a bit behind your competition on those aspects.    But the flights were on time - so that much was good.
title: CLT to BOS

review: Sometimes being different isn’t good. Why is there a spot to put your last name to sign on? How about 2FA instead if you’re trying to make it more secure?! Anyway, can’t use cached password from my iPhone.  Makes signing on, and anything that would follow, something to avoid
title: Worst user logon of all major airlines

review: After traveling since 5 AM and half way home my son noticed a HUGE hole/crack in our large checked luggage. I immediately contacted Collin at American Airlines. I was told bag would have to be returned to airport for inspection within 24 hours! Not happening! Worst customer service ever!!! Will never fly American again!!! What a way to ruin someones vacation!!
title: Damaged baggage

review: I have no issues signing into the website on safari or chrome. I’m using the exact same credentials copied and pasted into the app but it tells me my username/password are incorrect and that my account will be locked after 6 unsuccessful attempts.
title: App won’t let me sign in with same info as website

review: Detailed terminal maps. Easy check in. Boarding pass at your fingertips.
title: Makes flying super easy.

review: I have been waiting for an hour just to get my bags. It is already bad I was made to check my carryon and when I got it back it was open! They have no American representatives to help with bags or information! Try to look it up on the app and it times out. If I could give you 0 stars I would
title: No help what do ever!!!

review: Check-in via app should be full proof, or at least a notification if it wasn’t successfully completed! Not to find out later at the airport when it’s too late to check in at all!
title: Doesn’t work the check-in feature on the app. Very disappointing!

review: Very handy. I use it all the time. My only wish is that they would give access to meal options in first class.
title: Great app

review: We loved this app with updates in real time, gps to get us through foreign airports. Loved the free entertainment during the flight. Easy to use.
title: Wonderful app

review:
Compared to what other legacy airlines offer, this app is truly terrible. 

American has invested their time/money into making this app look pretty rather than making it function. 

Glitches constantly. Provides very little information (for instance, on the United app I can see standby and upgrade lists, booking totals, etc.). 

Overall functionally useless. It’s so unreliable that anytime I fly American I opt for either a print-at-home boarding pass or I go to an airport kiosk. Delta and United aren’t necessarily better airlines, but the app experience has become an important part of travel and theirs are much better.
title: Terrible app

review: I travel a lot for work and American Airlines has the worst airline app of them all. My flights don’t auto populate. It is difficult to change seats. The overall architecture of the app is confusing. An example of an app with a robust architecture that works is Delta. I would strongly encourage you to check out what they are doing and fix yourselves.
title: Worst major airline app

review: I’ve had to fly American quite a bit lately, for the first time in a while, and have discovered that their app is a total disaster. It rarely is able to download info, and doesn’t seem capable of displaying a boarding pass on most occasions. I see no reason to use it in its current form. Hard to believe a major airline’s app is this bad.
title: Shockingly bad

review: I can see my flight, it keeps sending me notifications about it but it doesn’t have a generate boarding pass option. All other airline apps have this option of generating a mobile boarding pass
title: Why can’t I get a mobile boarding pass

review: SO many horrible reviews and American Airlines don’t do anything about it? This is my first time flying AA and I am already feeling unconfident if the Airline is as unreliable & disorganized as the app does. Why is this such a huge airline and the ratings can’t even compete with delta United EVEN ALASKAN???? I just don’t get it. Do you not care? I’m just in awe.
title: Seriously?

review:
This app is basically unusable for how slow it is. Cannot check the status of my tickets without waiting several minutes. Not looking forward to traveling and having to rely on this to make multiple connections. 

This definitely makes southwest my choice of flight app due to its stability.
title: Slow

review: Terrible user interface; slow. And to check flights it just brings you to a web site within Safari. No need for app - might as well just log in on web site.   Poor design. No other airline app that I’ve used is gene as poorly.  Such a disappointment from AA.
title: Terrible app

review: I am not able to “find trip” I think they really push you to register for their credit card before they will give you any information.  I cannot download my electronic boarding passes. Other airlines I have dealt with, for example Southwest or Frontier, make it very easy and are not pushy, this is a bad app and probably why it is not rated high.
title: Awful app

review: Almost every single time I go to fly somewhere the app will not open up. I click on it and it immediately closes. The app is good when it’s working but they need to fix whatever bug is causing this.
title: App never works

review: This app has really gotten terrible. Customer service and app do not have same info.  Poor notification of cancel and delay.  Lagging information for canceled itineraries .   My list goes on.  The app only disappoints  now and I am just not going to use it.  It is actually quite useless to book flights or travel international.   What happened!?
title: No longer a very good app

review: Downloaded the app to get a e-boarding pass on my phone.  Proceeded as guest and then “Find Trip” that presented the typical name and record locator to find my record.  The problem you ask?  How about an input box that simply doesn’t prompt with a keyboard!! How does one actually enter any information.  Whichever outsourcing firm or agency created this app should be promptly disqualified and fired.
title: Non functional

review:
All our flight attendants were pleasant and helpful but Patrick goes beyond the call of duty!
Thank you for the delightful short flight from Charlotte to BNA!
title: Awesome Steward!

review:
What is the point of having an app if it doesn’t give you the option of getting your mobile boarding pass?

Update: Yeah, I had to again go get a paper boarding pass because the app would not give me an electronic one. Ugh. No problem with other airline apps.
title: Junk

review: This App will let you know about delays, but won’t let you reroute or fix problems. Half the messages in my inbox don’t open. The important ones don’t open. Call them and the queue is 11 hours long. The chat line has a 45 minute wait to chat with someone who can’t help you.
title: A Nearly Useless App

review: We flew from Maui to Los Angeles and then from Los Angeles to Miami. The service team and cleanliness of the aircraft were top notch. We can’t wait to fly American again.
title: Amazing Service

review: My last 3 trips .. in the last 3 months have all had issues.  Between flight cancellations, flight delays and now my checked bag on a direct flight did not make the flight when I checked in at the desk 1:40 prior to departure time????  How does that happen??
title: Constantly Issues with American Airlines

review: The app made my first solo trip with my baby a lot easier!
title: Definitely Recommend

review: The flight we came from Atlanta to Dallas seems to be very old. The flight time was full of sounds and jerks as by if we are traveling on Road and not in Air. It was not at all a good experience. I think it’s time for American Airlines to stop flying old flights.
title: Flight from Atlanta to Dallas

review: Not showing on app when trying to book flights.  Cant pick dates.
title: Calendar

review: This thing is flat busted! No matter what I do, I can’t find my trip data. I have entered the required information and all I get are error messages. American Airlines, your app is just stupid! It’s seriously dumb enough that I will just fly Southwest next time. At least Southwest has an app that works. Mic drop!!!!!
title: Waste of time and your mental health

review: Sadly I had no choice but fly American for this trip. As is customary with American, they were late on both flights and managed to lose my luggage. I am sure when/if I do get it, everything will be properly destroyed. I will give American this, they are always consistent with their disappointment
title: Full of disappoints

review: Of only 14 bags to be offloaded onto the carousel for baggage claim C15 DFW and others being transferred to other connecting flights it shouldn’t take 30 minutes when sitting in first class to get your bags at baggage claim from flight 2424 coming in from LAX and there was no first class service for paying the upgraded price except for  seat comfort.
title: Only 14 bags
