review: What Sam Marcus said is true. I’ve been an Aadvantage member since 1981 and American does whatever it can to make things difficult for the loyal business customers that keep them in business.
title: I agree with Sam

review: When booking on this app, be sure to check your flight status elsewhere because even though they cancelled my flight the app showed everything as A-OK.  It was only when the app notified me to check in did I discover the problem. Switching to Delta from now on.
title: Worst Airline Ever

review:
Arrival at C19, Baggage Claim exit is closed you must walk over to B. Arriving at Baggage claim the Board says flight is at B1. Walked every carousel and Not one specified my Columbus flight 
Had to ask a luggage cart attendant and it seemed the luggage was collected and had been put in the hold area. Frustration *** I didn't walk that slow.
title: Baggage Claim Disarray

review: Almost useless when trying to book a flight. When trying to click submit, most times it does not load flight options. Then when it does start to load flights, the loading screen just freezes.
title: Booking Flights Issues

review: This app is terrible!!! Right in the middle of the app sits a constant credit card advertisement and it can’t be removed, navigating the app is a chore and all I can find is legal notices, and other non helpful links, a real pain and I still can’t find my flight history. An arduous chore to navigate.
title: This app is terrible for finding anything

review: Shows you as not checked in when flight details update (such as flight time change or seat upgrade). Won’t let you check again; gives errors such as ‘all parties must check in to complete check in’ and you are the only one in your party.
title: Can’t handle flight changes

review:
For the same numerous (and apparently acknowledged) reasons offered in the numerous 1 star comments.. and the latest update 2 days ago is to a “dark theme”???! 

To add to the insult - my account is gone - they recently deleted any account not active in last 3 years (per customer service). I can’t even sign up for a new one with this lousy app. 

Sad. Very very sad. Delete.
title: Horrible app

review: If you accidentally hit a different passenger’s name to check in along with your own you can no longer check in on the app and have to do it at the airport. There is no way around the message and doesn’t let you type in additional information to correct the mistake. Poor app construction and will not use again.
title: Bad

review: Useless app.  You want access to your flight info and ability to make real time changes.   Seems impossible here.   And if it’s buried and I just couldn’t find it, doesn’t help.   Other apps are intuitive and meet the needs of a regular traveler (thanks delta app!).   I hate flying American and this makes it worse.
title: Need an option for zero stars

review: AA really did it with this one, from making it harder to find your boarding passes to just a frustrating UI that you’ll inevitably accidentally swipe away from an important page. Do yourself a favor and don’t get this app, just use the website
title: Clunky, confusing, and somehow more frustrating than the website

review: I enjoyed my flight! We were not only on time but we arrived safe and early. I love American Airlines… something special in the air
title: Awesome staff

review: Quick great service during flight. On time. Easy check in. As always, nice job American
title: Great flight. Good service.

review: Very annoying that flight reminders keep showing on my phone an hour after I’ve already landed!
title: Flight alerts

review: Myself and three friends arrived on flight 2908 today, Tuesday, November 30. Phl-Tpa. Golf club’s are missing; we were told they may come in on the next flight. as a result we are missing today’s golf reservation that was already paid for not to mention the need to come back to the airport to get our clubs. Very dissatisfied, John Reilly
title: Missing golf clubs

review: Not happy that the American Airlines app does not work on my iPhone 6 anymore.  This will certainly be something I take into account when I choose my flights in the future.   Not only do I have to pay more for bags and nicer seats, but I also have to buy a new phone?  No. Way.
title: Does not work on my iPhone 6

review: First of all this airlines always get delays! Second of all I never get back my refund! After calling customer service and they told me about 12 to more weeks of business days to get my refund back which is so stupid. And now is almost two months and I still haven’t get my refund back yet!
title: URGH!

review: Horrible day in airport, no information given just delay after delay. Caused us to miss our connection. Having to pay for hotel and cab rides our self.  This will cost several hundred dollars. They want give us our luggage when it arrived with us and we don’t fly out til noon the next day.
title: Delayed flight

review: Over a 1 hour wait in Phoenix yesterday and already 30 minutes today at DCA.. still waiting!!
title: Baggage service

review:
Not sure what happened. Has always been a great application until recently.  Now when I open it all I see is the background.  I’m on most updated IOS and even tried to uninstall and reinstall app twice. Still nothing. And there doesn’t seem to be an update either. 

Any help, would love to rate 5 stars again.
title: Application Failure

review: Downloaded the app and started to join AA Advantage and it won’t allow me to put my birthdate in. When I try to submit it, it won’t allow you to. I tried to get help and wouldn’t you know it I have to sign up for AA Advantage to contact them.  Very frustrating. But that’s what you get when you deal with big companies. Customer service is lost
title: Poor app

review:
I don’t usually write reviews for apps because I rarely ever care to do so. However, this app is atrocious because it always have connectivity issues no matter if I’m using cellular data or WiFi. I’ve been trying to check my seat location and check-in with no luck.

I think Southwest will be my primary airline from now on.
title: Such a bad app

review: I get part way through checking it and it gets hung up on seats even if I don’t want to change them. If I get though, it’ll act like it takes my CC to pay for bags, but still no boarding pass. Even after I check in at the airport, still won’t show I’ve checked it. All it does is send me alerts. Worthless app.
title: It never works!

review: Uninstalled and reinstalled twice. App forces closes more often than not, and when it doesn’t close nothing works right. It doesn’t send my boarding pass to my Apple wallet correctly, it never looks up the baggage right, and crashes when I try to use in-flight entertainment. Worst app for the worst airline.
title: Completely Useless

review: I’m trying to book a round trip flight using miles. It shows me there are flights for the day I selected, that are starting at 37,500 miles. But when I scroll down to search these flights, they are mostly 95k points. There are other issues to, such as,  who’s gonna shell out 95k to fly to Florida? Come on. Copy Deltas app, it works !
title: Reward flight

review: While in flight, when I get redirected to the app from the link mentioned to watch a movie, it just opens the app. When I click on Free Entertainment in the app, it redirects to open the link in a new browser. This constitutes an endless loop of frustrating experience which is why I thought of sharing the feedback before I uninstall.
title: Pathetic experience

review: On a 2-leg flight, the boarding passes disappear after landing on the first leg. And why cant I just see a boarding pass from the app? Why do I have to save them  Try to save them in Apple Wallet?  And why when I go to Apple Wallet to get my passes am I directed to the AA app?  Why do you make things so difficult?  Stop selling credit cards and make an app like Delta’s.
title: Was once OK. NOW ITS AWFUL

review: The app is great at keeping me informed when flights are late or change.  Thank you for the help.
title: App

review: The bottom tab on the app blocks the “Continue” button when trying to make flight changes…pretty frustrating.
title: Impossible to change trips on the app

review: Every time I check the app it sends updates to my calendar even though nothing had changed
title: Fix calendar updates

review: This app is so frustrating and just wastes your time massively. Unlike many other airlines, it rarely finds my reservations and I have to manually enter the confirmation number over and over every time I want to check on my trip. Makes me stay away from using AA personally.
title: Non functional app

review: It only recaps portions of a connecting flight.
title: Wish miles and flights I took would be added

review: To truly be useful, the app should easily allow adding flights to your calendar.  Also, if I change my seat after I’ve checked in (e.g. pay to upgrade), my boarding pass does not reflect the change.
title: Bare minimum

review: Terrible experience every time I deal with American Airlines, delayed flights so often it has ruined trips, and has built up a distrust between me and the airline. I have never been on an American flight that is either on time OR the original flight I booked. Might as well go frontier or spirit
title: Waste of time

review: I am very disappointed in how you all keep changing my flight status, how am I to book a car to come pick me up when the times and flights keep changing, there needs to be an end to the flight changing so I can get my travel to the airport booked?!
title: Flights

review: I’ve had so many problems with this app. It will not connect from my AAdvantage account directly so when I sign in it isn’t showing my available miles which are over 80,000. It’s the weekend so I can’t contact anyone to book a flight.
title: Will not connect to my card

review: Changed seat after paying additional money and was refunded immediately. Love it!
title: Excellent service

review: I’ve used this app for years.  With the new update I’m unable to log into it.  I can log in through the browser but not the app.  I spent hours on the phone with American and it still doesn’t work.  The tech group can see that the app isn’t recognizing my password.
title: App doesn’t work

review:
I get ready to board my flight several people are Coffeen I go to the front  desk to upgrade my seat to first class.
One minute before getting ready to leave a gentleman sits behind my seat and he’s coughing the whole flight.
I don’t think this person should’ve been The plane
title: Way to go American Airlines

review: When I book a flight I need to be able to go back and pick up the times. Not possible in this app
title: More thought needed as to how travelers will use it

review: Gate attendants and flight attendants were professional, friendly and prompt with service.
title: Star service

review: I loved this app until now!  It won’t let me login. Yes I have deleted and added! I can login online but will not let me login to the app.  How do I get help!!!
title: American Airlines lover

review: Always the best and newest info on every aspect of travel. Why would anyone fly any other airlines ?
title: Up to date!

review: It would be nice to have pictures of the planes that I will fly. It would correlate nicely to know what product customers are flying with the model. - example Airbus 321 vs Boeing 737..show a picture of this with the livery.
title: Viewing planes

review: The amount of time to sync this app, is insane. On top of that, to try and view/change seats takes upwards of 10-15 seconds. Until those things would be improved, I can’t even consider other improvements that I would recommend.
title: Slowwww

review: Horrible app. Able to access extremely limited amounts of information on both my airline profile and also flights.  Not useful in the slightest. Worse than Hawaiian Airlines’ app- and that’s saying something. However, the app is an accurate reflection of the airline’s customer service.
title: Least User-Friendly App I’ve Ever Used

review: The worst airline imaginable. Put my bag on a plane to Charlotte, the flight is cancelled. It is now somehow taken to Charlotte before a second flight even occurs. Attempt to get on the second and last flight of the day, but they delay it 12 hours at once without reason and then cancel it. Somehow they send the bag all the way to Barcelona. How does this even happen?
title: How

review: I updated my password on the AA website. Now the app won’t recognize the new password. I tried deleting the app and reinstalling it and still no luck. I’ve even had someone else try entering the password. The new pw works on the main site, but not on the app! Gah! Now I have no access to the app. Thoughts?
title: Password change on website won’t work on app

review:
This app is horrible. After uninstalling and reinstalling several times, I still can’t log into my account. I repeatedly get error 2 with no option to fix. I can only log in on the website.

When I could log in on the app previously, I always had difficulty accessing entertainment in flights.
title: Error 2

review: Flight from Phoenix AZ to Charlotte NC . No issues and best customer service! Fly was on time. Will travel with th again!
title: Smooth flight!

review: My flight’s departure time drastically changed, but the flight information in the app never updated. I only knew about the departure change because a friend was on the same flight and told me. You can’t rely on anything the app says.
title: Doesn’t Show Flight Changes

review:
Lacks features for frequent flyers.
It needs to have same functionality as you would have from when you login from website.
title: Lacks features

review: I tried to change seats multiple times using the app, couldn’t complete the process. It’s also not possible to view a receipt for the flights that you purchase.
title: Not a functional app.

review:
Had a flight from XNA - Dallas and a connection from Dallas -Miami , with my boarding pass for both flight. Make the first flight perfect and in second flight did not allowed me to get in
Horrible experience ! I need to get to Miami because im flying back yo Buenos Aires, Argentina tomorrow
American Airlines NEEDS to solve this asap ! 
Horrible airline
title: Horrible experience

review: Not as user friendly as other airline apps.  Lacks easy to find functions like boarding pass retrieval and seat maps without a lot if searching.
title: Lacks basic functions

review: This app is pretty clunky with constant reroutes to web pages that make you log back in and re-Insert credit card Information. What is the point of having a proffered card and address if I have enter it every time I wish to make a purchase.
title: Inefficient reroutes to web page

review: I fly extensively with American and avoid checking bags into DFW at all cost but when you do, it is at least a 45 minute wait to get your bags. This isn’t a once in a while thing, it’s an all the time thing.
title: Baggage is an absolute joke with this company

review: Tried to book a flight multiple times on different days and times but freezes up as soon as I hit the search button. Multiple delete/reinstall actions wouldn’t fix problem.
title: App freezes after few min

review: Very frustrated. I can not get my TSA Pre to Show up on my digital boarding pass. So every time i have had to wait in line at airport to get my tsa entered. TSA is in my profile. I try chat but they want information i don't have as it is all digital and im at airport in a crowd. I just want a resolution PLEASE, thank you. ed
title: My TSA Pre Does Not Show Up on Boarding pass

review: Our plane and connections were spot on. Loved using the app which was a time saver and very easy to navigate.
title: Excellent service

review: Wanted to upgrade but could find how to request
title: Where’s the upgrade button?

review: The app has great info and features but doesn’t always work. App freezes. I have in-installed and re-installed and still freezes.
title: Booking doesn’t work

review: I have an  iPhone 6plus and obviously I can t download the latest IOS.  American Airlines request the latest version in order to update the app.  Is there an older version ?
title: Can t download the App

review: The app really comes in handy yet it doesn’t make sense to me as to why they don’t add an option to automatically add your advantage number.
title: No way to automate adding advantage number to all flights

review: Tried checking in for an international flight. Can’t put in my passport expiration date as the slider defaults to today’s date no matter what you put in. No option to overwrite with manual entry. Have to log into my desktop now to do this… frustrating.
title: Impossible to check in

review: What is the point of booking a direct flight if they can just change it last minute without even asking? Airlines have no problem wasting your time. Next time we will drive!
title: Direct Flight

review:
Wait time on phone 4 hours for customer service!!!! Really???

App not working night before to check flight status and check in. 

Receive email at 4:15am that our flights have been cancelled and rebooked for next day!!!!!!!!

What?????

No reason given why???

No call or ability to reach a real live person who can help. Hate computer prompy and assistants. NOT people!!!

Rebooked on our own with different airline. Probably have to eat expense. So much for keeping expenses in line.
title: No customer service. Changing flights on us 4 hours before leaving

review: I’ve flown AA plenty of time and this is probably my second time flying international.  I am not sure why AA decided to team up with VeriFLY instead of adding info to the app. VeriFLY is not working and is not syncing with the AA app. Please fix this so that it would be easier to check in since I can’t until I get to the airport.
title: Flight

review: Getting off the bus at Paris Island was a bit more enjoyable than the flight 899 from Phoenix to LA today. Flight attendants behave like bull sharks, no support or help for passengers. Hang my coat please?  just shook her head and walked away. Glass of water? Looked at me made some sort of grunting noise and kept walking. God help your business.
title: Can the American mgt team find the CX again?

review: This app stays in crash mode whenever I try to research a trip or try to book an award travel flight. Does anyone at the airline have the job of reading these reviews and taking them to the appropriate department that fixes these problems? These problems have existed for years!
title: Worthless app

review: Luggage not arrived from a direct flight. Monitor says complete and status says unloaded but no one knows where luggage is. Airline employees completely unhelpful even though 2 are at the counter in IRD doing nothing else. Laid off the wrong employees
title: Luggage

review: No ability to get trip receipts without 20 steps & knowing things that you don’t always know. The upgrade and rewards system is indecipherable. American’s system puts the system ahead of the human in every case. If I did t have to fly them for convenience or price, I wouldn’t.
title: App and company are a real challenge compared to other airlines

review: Check out your competitor’s app functions. I had United a few years back and loved how I can look at other flights that I was connecting to and entertainment was made easy. Also allowed me to view the standby list.
title: This app is not up to date with the times

review: If I was able to choose my own carrier when traveling for work it would NEVER be AA simply because of this App. Lags FAR behind its competitors. Constantly getting error messages, inability to log in and unable to find upcoming flights due to the above mentioned error messages. I end up wanting to smash my phone in disgust.
title: Worst App of the Major Carriers

review: Doesn’t provide real-time flight information. Is my flight delayed? Maybe. You’ll find out it is as you’re walking down the aisle to take your seat.  What’s my gate number? You’ll find out after you’ve gotten to the gate they said it was. Pretty worthless.
title: Below average

review: I had to reset my password which I’ve done successfully on the website and have no problems signing in on website. I change it in the app, but it won’t accept the correct password!  What gives. This has been going one for months and months!  Fix this please!  Otherwise this app is useless!
title: FRUSTRATING AND USELESS!

review: If I’m logged in to the app and can get my tracking # why do I need the hassle of finding my record locator to see what bag claim to go to ?
title: Baggage tracking

review: This app is useless except to check in and get your boarding pass. Flight info is not updated at all, sitting here delayed for hours while the app still says “on time.” This app and this airline are both ridiculous.
title: Not accurate, does not update

review: Title says it all. Couldn’t pay for a booked flight. Took a half hour to add a payment method. Couldn’t used trip credits. Flight kept getting cancelled. I’d say use the website but the barely functioning website was why I downloaded the app… So, different airline I suppose?
title: Barely functioning app.

review: Usually accurate, but hard to navigate and slow to update
title: Slow to Update

review: Flight was fine, however, upon arriving at our final destination our luggage was not waiting for us. Since we had a 2hr layover between flights, there should have been adequate time to get our bags unto the connecting flight.
title: Missing Baggage

review: So difficult toggle to next flight once you’ve used a boarding pass. Also, Hold flights don’t clear out of screen after ahold expires.  And it appears you really don’t want to get reviews as I’ve tried 10 nicknames and they are all taken
title: Not user friendly

review: There was nobody at the departure airport (DFW) to do the HI COVID screening. Apparently they had been there earlier (at Gate D28) but I was there with lots of other people 30 minutes ahead of time and the screening station was unmanned. That resulted in a terribly long delay at HNL after a really long flight. When I’ve traveled before the screening folks were on top of it. But not this time.
title: COVID SCREENING

review: Use this all the time, I agree with the exec plat member.  You can book, assign seats, track flights and luggage. Keep up the great work AA
title: Excellent App

review: I would like to review this app, but two hours into the download and it’s still going. No it’s not my internet. I just downloaded United and no problems. Took no more than 2 minutes. Maybe I’ll update this review a month from now when it’s finally installed.
title: Horrendous download time

review: We were not allowed into Maui Hawaii and American ticket counter has ONE representative.  Why are they not checking prior to leaving California to avoid problems like this.  Then truly only having one person here helping people with these issues.
title: Maui Hawaii and test results and not being allowed in the United State of America

review: The app is horrible. The mobile pass it generated for me did not work at security. I had to print out a physical ticket and missed my flight because of it. The delay caused my traveling party to be split and my elderly parents had to travel alone.
title: Mobile pass didn’t work, missed my flight

review: I have changed my password on the app several times and on the website and they don’t seem to be syncing up. The only way I can seem to access my account is to use my computer and go directly to your website.
title: Password issues

review: I’ve tried everything possible but this app do not work.  I upgraded to the new iOS14, I deleted the app, turned off the iPad and wanted several hours, reloaded the app and it just shows a blank screen.  Not sure how it can work for some and not for others but its really bad.
title: App Does Not Work

review: Not happy that you aren’t practicing social distancing at all and still over booking flights complete disregard to the virus
title: Social distancing

review:
Tara was fantastic on my flight from San Diego to Phoenix. Friendly, conversive, chill and relaxed. 

I usually have great service but Tara was especially professional making my experience a pleasure.
title: VP Distribution

review: You have to log into this app to see your flights and such, so when filling out customer service requests / feedback it should already have all the pertinent info. I should not have to type it all in again!
title: Needs to remember more

review:
Love the app besides knowing my coworkers who fly United can see:

- first class seats at all times, not just when booked or upgraded

- upgrade list from check in
title: Transparency

review: Let’s be real, we only downloaded this app so we could watch movies in flight. I get to do that and I’m very happy with it. So I’m satisfied. ✌🏾
title: Does what I need

review: Even though my flight was confirmed and checked in online, the app can’t find my reservation. Very frustrating
title: App can’t find my reservation

review: I’m surprised by the low rating of this app. I am a frequent travel and briefly experimented with United as my primary airline. The difference between the apps is notable and I find the AA app to be far superior. AA isn’t perfect, but their app is quite good
title: Good app

review: This app continually errs, and it has done so over the last few years and across several different devices. 50/50 whether or not it works whenever you open it.
title: Never works, never has

review:
United, Delta, and all other major carriers have in-flight entertainment on their apps.  Their apps are also downloaded by over 2 million people with an average review of 4.9 stars.  This app is bogus and not gucci.  I’m poggers to see this from a huge organization.  It makes me wonder if they maintain their planes the same way they maintain their apps.

NOT GUCCI AMERICAN AIRLINES!  NOT GUCCI AT ALL!
title: Horrible compared to all others

review: Electronic boarding passes don’t show boarding times nor are they shown in the flight status,gates are wrong before,during and after flight,app shifts to upcoming flights or trips when all I want is current and connecting flights... I’m patriotic but this app makes me want to fly unamerican whenever possible
title: Untimely and inaccurate

review:
I just spent 15 minutes on the app trying to get my mobile boarding pass only to keep getting prompted to print it. DFW accepts mobile passes but it’s so hard to find how to do it! It’s not intuitive whatsoever...and I work in tech. I can’t imagine my mom using this app. 

Fix it or you’ll lose customers.
title: Horrible- might start taking Southwest

review: I found the app easy to use and very helpful. It saves a lot of time and worry.
title: Great time saver!

review: App works but is not always accurate. Do not trust times or gate information without checking first. Flights never leave on time so boarding times are also dependent on the tides. Please merge with spirit airlines so everyone knows the expectations.
title: App is ok. Airline not so good

review: Seat selection seems to push to a website, unless it’s the day of travel.
title: Things are broken

review: Just had a really funny, genuine and kind flight attendant and wanted to give her a shout out. Her name was Shawn and it was a flight from Dallas to XNA flight 3518 on March 1. Thanks AA!
title: Great flight staff…

review: Flight and crew were awesome. Thanks for a great flight to and from Miami. Look forward to traveling again.
title: Miami

review: Four flights tight connections. All flights on time or early, even late in the day
title: Trip to Turks & Caicos

review: New version has issues
title: Issues

review: No big surprise but flights I booked were cancelled and rebooked at less convenient times.  Getting up at 3 am to make a flight was not what I planned On.  Also lost 1st class when AA rescheduled me.    Then one of my bags didn’t make it.
title: Flight cancellations and delayed baggage

review: Bag tracker had it loaded in Charlotte airport it never came out in Asheville how do you lose a bag on a 17 minute flight?Seems that it was never loaded in Charlotte yet the app said it was..... what good is the app if this is the accuracy that it has?Very disappointed.... thought I would try another carrier and it backfired..... back to Delta!
title: Lost Baggage

review: Fast, easy to use, took a while but AA finally got it pretty right
title: So much better than it used to be

review: Too many people are being booked on the flights during this pandemic. I think we should still be at least leaving the middle seats vacant. Too RISKY!!
title: Flights

review: There is a menu that minimizes to the bottom portion of the screen and blocks your ability to select confirm for many processes, including adding mileage. Spent a considerable amount of time adding flights, airports, dates and was not able to finalize due to horrible UI. Fix ASAP and test better.
title: Horrible UI.

review: I received a notification that I could check in to my flight tomorrow. When I tried to check in, I got an error message preventing me from checking in. When I called customer support, they said the app was one hour off and I can only check in 23 hours before my flight.
title: Unable to Check In

review: Love the real time checked bag tracking and ease of viewing activities and all flights once logged in.
title: The best US airline app

review: Delayed flight, then returned to the terminal.  Got inside and there was another flight boarding with seats open on it, but they wouldn’t try to accommodate even a first class passenger or any other.....had to shut the door....sorry (not)!
title: Where’s the customer service?

review: Switched over this year to American and for those who travel a lot like myself the app is extremely slow, interactive features are not great, and definitely had better experience with delta and United. Please for those of us who fly a lot this would be a huge upgrade.
title: App seriously needs refreshed.

review: The app allows basic functionality only. You can’t even update or change your seats anymore, you have to go to the AA website! If I have to go to the website to do anything why is this even useful?
title: Extremely basic and no seat charts

review: Almost every time I switch out of the app (not closing the app) to look up my schedule for example, it drops the transaction and I have to start from scratch. It’s not a complicated process to complete the transaction, and small apps as well as delta are able to do so, it’s embarrassing that AA app craps out every other time.
title: Slow and frigidly app

review:
Update:  garbage crashing app.

Frequent traveler.   Poor updates, inability to change flights when canceled, no memory when searching or tracking flight status.  
Delta app is significantly better.  
More frequent and accurate updates for American Airlines flights on my free FlightAware app.
title: Poor App and inaccurate flight status

review: I love the app, I love AA, they are the best, they are amazing!!! With the app I can take control of my seat, updates, book flights, track my activity, my mileage and much more.. I love you AA
title: I love you AA

review:
How about a function to request and upgrade or even pay for priority boarding?
Other functions work well but isn’t the most user friendly thing out there.
title: Okish.

review: This app is horrible. You can’t even view your boarding pass in it. You have add it to your wallet. You lose the ability to change your seat or view seat map with 60 minutes of flight. You can see standby list. Terrible terrible terrible. Can I give this a negative star?
title: Limited functionality

review: Flight was good but baggage claim is directly across from gate and takes ridiculously long to come up!!!!
title: Baggage takes wayyy too long!!

review: Checked in 3 hours prior to my 1-way flight, which was half full, yet my bags were placed on a later flight without explanation.  This caused a loss of 3 hours work and missed meetings, and American offered no compensation, after paying $70 for bags to be shipped professionally with the traveler.
title: Horrible Service and Procedures (Zero Stars)

review: I would like free WiFi that’s not just for movies tv and music but also for the use of internet browsing
title: WiFi

review: I have been using the app for about 4 years. Great tool. However I have an older iPhone and cannot download the new updates now can I us the app anymore. Very disappointed that American did not make this backward compatible
title: App

review: It keeps telling me that it is unable to locate my reservation, but I have no issues with locating it on the website. Ahead of my trip I entered my passport number, but now that I need to check in for my flight it is requesting it again and I don’t have my passport with me.
title: Horrible app

review: AA is worst airline on planet. I’m speaking as a platinum member. To top things off we waited at baggage for over an hour for our bags - no announcements. No Aa people to be found except the rude woman in “baggage claim assistance” who didn’t respond to anyone’s questions. Typical Aa. Can’t wait for them to go under and replaced with better leadership.
title: Baggage and service horrible

review: I attempted to request a refund after my exit row seat was changed without even asking me. When the agent came on to chat she offered me a website that didn’t work and then disconnected before I could ask additional questions
title: Terrible customer service

review: We are in the midst of a global pandemic. Yet American continues to fly without any regard to the health and safety of their passengers. Airlines like Delta are flying with their middle seats open. Yet American is OVERBOOKING their flights. They asked for volunteers to take a later flight - which we did. And did not get compensated for it.
title: Flying through the pandemic without a care

review: I use the AA app several times a week for all things ‘American’. It is perfect for booking, checking flight status and assigning seats.
title: App Review

review: First time user. Downloaded app on iOS. Tried to create account and it won’t allow a state so it won’t allow me to submit the form. When clicking on state field it spins for a couple seconds and says it is downloading state codes but then doesn’t load them. Garbage app!!!!
title: Garbage app

review: App is completely out of sync with website (and most current) itinerary. It’s been this way for weeks on an upcoming trip. This is not a “wait a few minutes for it to update” issue.
title: Incorrect Itineraries

review: Customer service supervisor Sophia Nowell(sp?) was horrible.  She was unable to answer basic questions and had an unpleasant attitude.
title: Travel experience positive, customer service via telephone needs work

review: 40 passengers on entire plane but don’t let them spread out even more cause those empty seats are premium.  I thought you cared about our safety and were going to allow that.  No your flight attendant made sure people sat together while those special 6” of legroom seats, not first class seats, all remained empty.....Thanks American for caring.
title: Social distancing?

review: App works great. Has good functionality. But it’s strange my boarding passes only will show through Apple Pay....I don’t use this service and find that odd.
title: Update

review: Not a lot of features but this app is very simple and user friendly.
title: Simple and easy to use

review: I don't need to be reminded of the economy restrictions every time I open the app. And why is it so hard to swipe from flight to flight? Just makes using the app so frustrating that I'd rather look at my flight info online...
title: Worse than other airline apps

review: Easy to use, works fast, even allowed me to change delayed flights from the app. Very happy!
title: The best!

review:
Horrible app
Go in to check my flight status and it asks for my name and ‘record locator.’ Really American? Who would know what the hell this is? Maybe saying ‘confirmation number’ would be a little better? (I found out its was this by waiting on hold for an hour). This alone should dissuade you from flying whth these ppl
title: Get it together, American

review: With the latest update, it super hard to read the upgrade list if your in dark mode.  They need a different font color so it stands out against the black background.
title: Can’t see upgrade list.

review: My mobile boarding pass decided not to work for my flight, causing me to miss it and AA did absolutely nothing to help me. no refund or anything even tho when asked about the situation they said that my boarding pass didn’t work because of the mobile app and i needed to print one.
title: never use this app or company

review: I love that I can see that my bags made the connection
title: Quick and informational

review: I attempted to buy a ticket and they never sent me my email confirmation. I cancelled the flight. About a week later I bought a ticket with them and the flight got cancelled so I had to wait for a flight the next day, and they ended up overbooking the second flight. Fly with anything except American Airlines.
title: Don’t buy with American Airlines.

review: Two big requests: 1) allow passengers to buy upgrades to first class straight from the app and 2) allow sharing of flight information/status from iMessages (like United) instead of just offering up silly stickers.
title: Not as functional for frequent flyers...

review: I used to love this app. Very user friendly and helpful when I fly, which is fairly often. Now it doesn't let me check in for my flight or update my miles for my last two flights. Kind of useless now...
title: Used to work, not so much anymore..

review: From Gate changes to upgrades to bag tracking, this is the best airline app hands down!
title: A Great App Experience

review: American Airlines always delays their flights and there have been multiple occasions where I have had to run to be able to catch my flight, I’m tired of missing flights because of their poor scheduling practices. This is a common issue.
title: Always Delay Flights

review: The ads play perfectly fine, over and over again without issue, no matter what. However, the actual movie or tv show will not play. Very cleaver American. Getting that ad revenue without actually providing a service.
title: In flight movies won’t play

review:
I’m unable to enter Record locator / ticket or credit number in order to find a purchased reservation. 

I.e. I can’t enter anything at all… the field is not functional. Can you please fix this?
title: “Find Trip” not working

review: Always helpfuad friendly.
title: Flight

review: This app is great to book and manage all of your American Airlines flights!
title: Fantastic ✈️ app to manage your AA flights!

review: I flew from DFW to ORD to MHT back to DFW.. I was not met with wheelchair as requested on any stop or arrival except for my final deplane in DFW…very painful walk to/from distant gates. Listed on my A/A profile.. is it worth it to fly American anymore? Maybe not.
title: Disability

review: I love the Airlines themselves but for the last two months all of my flights have been canceled or delayed and they haven’t done anything to compensate
title: Disappointed

review: Can’t change seats or do other basic things in the app. Sends you to website.
title: Minimum Functionality

review:
You are the worst airline in the world

Pls refund me my money since you decided to not give me the seats i paid for and changed it to the worst seat ever beside the toilet. I paid for 6C and was given without any notice but only at gate before I boarded seat 23D

Not worth a single cent…. Pls give me my money back
title: Worst airline in the world

review: The functionality of the app is great and when the app works it is convenient. But it is contact giving error messages, the loading time always super slow. It makes for a frustrating experience.
title: Constant Errors

review:
The only issue I have is that there isn't an easy way to retrieve baggage receipts.
The app works really well for boarding Tix & updates well. RECEIPTS though!
title: BAGGAGE RECEIPTS!

review: I use the same credentials on mobile and web, and the mobile app is rejecting my login credentials and telling me that my account will be locked out after 6 unsuccessful attempts. The website works fine though.
title: Horrible app - can’t login on app but I can on web

review: i’ve always loved this app and am executive platinum on aa so i used it almost every day. but since they “updated” it they’ve locked me out on the grounds that “the data couldn’t be read because it’s in the wrong format” (the data being my name my frequent flyer number and my password). my advice - don’t update your app😱
title: terrible app update

review: What a disappointment! This version is a big step backwards. Lots of functionality now gone or removed from home screen. Entertainment while on a plane is much harder to navigate. Did anyone actually test prior to launching?  Common sense is missing on this one, needs to be quickly addressed.
title: Huge step backwards

review: 2nd leg of flight was delayed multiple times and I heard numerous reasons why. Still hasn’t arrived, arrived but mechanical issues, etc. finally booked myself on a later flight, but I should have just driven!
title: Delayed, delayed

review: My my plane landed at 2:04 it’s now 2:54 and still no luggage . Planes that landed after mine luggage has arrived. I could walk to the plane and back faster .. what terrible service and it’s always slow to get your luggage at MCO AMERICAN
title: Why does it take so long to get your luggage ?

review: Paid to upgrade seats on all of my flights. Second plane with TVs I head rests. Our screens did not work. We’re not offered free WiFi or any compensation. No AC on the first flight home. Crew was unorganized and rude at times.
title: Two out of 4 flights bad

review: This is a great app, works fantastically on an iPhone. The only issue with it is that it does not update sometimes as fast as it needs too
title: Great app, only one request

review:
I just booked a flight and my card was charged. However, even after an hour of waiting, there is absolutely no way to see my reservations in the app. 

I called support and they said it’s an iPhone issue, not an AA issue. Newsflash... your iOS developers messed up somewhere. Fix this. This is absurd.
title: Terrible - Can’t see bookings

review: I just updated to the latest version of the app. I can not get it to stay open for more than a few seconds. It keeps crashing. When I was able to open the app previously it was not as helpful or easy to navigate as the United app. A major update is needed.
title: Not helpful and crashes

review: This app was updated recently and the layout of the tablet version changed and it is terrible the fonts used for the flight info are to large and do can’t see all the data
title: Latest tablet version is a step backwards

review: It used to display on the iPad exactly as it did on my iPhone.  That is no longer the case.  I’m on 13.2.2.  The display is oversized now, very large font and either runs off the page or wraps in a too narrow unreadable column.  Please fix it!!
title: No longer displays correctly on iPad

review: This is the worst app of ANY I’ve used.  Not only does it not work- the ability to type in a field is ZERO- but it’s pointless to have.  I would be better off calling on a rotary phone to get my flight information. It’s that bad.  I hope it doesn’t reflect the airlines ability to maintain and fly their planes.  Get with it American!!!
title: Worst app ever

review: I am unable to log in and unable to find my reservation as a guest.  The application is not reliable for travel.  I can not recommend this application and I think customers would be better served without this app in the store.  It reflects barley upon AA and could cause issues for those using it for travel.
title: Unusable and unreliable

review:
What a dreadful app. If you are using it to check in, be sure you are not making any seat changes. 

Just looking for a seating option causes you to lose your current seat. Have also seen the seat map COMPLETELY change in a minute, going from 15-20+ window and aisle seats to NONE.
title: Use their website

review: This is one of the best airline apps I’ve used. Great job AA. Keep listening and keep making your app better.
title: Great App

review: This app is one of the worst. It is very non user friendly when it comes to trying to pay for luggage online. I never could figure it out so I had to pay the higher price in person instead of discounted price on the app for luggage.
title: Not user friendly

review: The app used to provide the boarding pass right within the app. Now it is requiring you to use Apple Wallet. Not a fan of any app that forces you to use another. I should be able to simple obtain my boarding passes within the American Airlines app.
title: Forced to use Apple Wallet to get boarding pass

review: This was my first time ever flying on a plane in my life and American Airlines showed the best first experienced! Thanks so much from Philly to Miami let the party begin!!!!
title: James Gray

review:
In flying domestically, you can watch AA entertainment on your phone.  

However, when you fly internationally you have to use the head phones on the plane.  

Please make it easy to use your device on international flights instead of making your customers purchase internet connectivity.  

Thanks!
title: Entertainment on my device

review:
When I checked in for my flights yesterday, I requested wheelchair assistance for my traveling companion, Anne Woodiwiss. 

Upon arriving for our Dallas to Chattanooga flight there were numerous mixups for wheelchair. We ended up being put on 2 different cart rides, and missed our flight at  10:15 am. 
Now we’re on standby flight at 4:30 this afternoon. A long day ahead!

Your gate agents were mostly helpful, but ended up dropping the ball once the mix up with wheelchair started. 
Boohoo!
title: Dianne Williams

review: Wish the app had a flight tracker and it from time to time. User friendly for the most part.
title: Wish it was as modern as other airlines..

review: Why does it take 30 mins or more for bags to arrive at DFW AND ONLY 10 mins at other airports? DFW being the hub it should have much faster service. Escalators are always down also.
title: Baggage

review: Trying to retrieve boarding passes within the app almost always crashes the app. Happens on multiple phones. A real pain when you’re waiting in security line and it decides to crash.
title: Boarding pass never works! Crashes all the time

review: Hard to navigate and find things like my personal account and information
title: Confusing app

review:
I fly frequently and use various apps but this AA is the worst app i have encountered thus far. You would think an established company would pay for programmers who have actually reviewed other apps before putting out the garbage they did
For AA. Dates are confusing to enter. Passport scans dont work.  Its a mess
title: Terrible

review: On time service, friendly staff, professional operation
title: Most reliable air carrier for the Caribbean people

review: I love the bag tracking feature. Helps relieve anxiety.
title: Works well, double check gates on screens

review: Can’t select a state so cannot complete creating an account. Obviously very low budget UX design and programming. No fields allow integration with iOS such as email address, home address, etc. This is the worst first experience with an app that I’ve ever had.
title: Bugs and poor interface

review: Everything I might think to include in an airline app is here!
title: Intuitive easy navigation

review: The app is glitchy. I can only log in when on Wifi. It doesn’t allow log in on LTE. It’s inconvenient when you want to pull your boarding pass at the airport.
title: Good when you can log in

review: These people nickel and dime you for everything!! Almost as bad as frontier and should never be considered one of the major airlines. Gave them a chance after years with Delta and I have to say it was a mistake. $120 for two checked bags even though I’m flying with their partner which explicitly allows them... what a circus
title: Never again

review: All I want to do is book a one way flight on this crappy app and when I search for it, the app takes me to a page that says I don’t have access to this information. What good is this useless app if I can’t even book a flight with it?
title: Access denied when trying to book flight?!?

review:
All the things you want to work: checkin, mobile boarding pass, accurate flight information, seat selection, bag location are always broken. 
Things you don’t care about: credit card adds, new exciting destinations, for purchase add ons all seem to work.
title: Imagine a good app, this is nothing like that

review: Very nice travel, all on time, personal friendly! Thanks all
title: Sweetie go to home

review:
We should be able to see a seat map for the entire flight, not just our class.  And show us the upgrade lists/ position.  
United does it.  I’m sure American could.
title: Opp for improvement.

review: So far, it’s the worst experience I’ve ever had in trying to check in for my flight. The basic text fields don’t work. After many attempts I could enter my first and last name, but pasting the record locator fails. Am on iPad mini, latest iOS. Epic fail.
title: It simply doesn’t work

review: Coming from Cancun, you should have text iMessage that we had to re-check our luggage at the Dallas airport, to make our connecting flight to Chicago. Unbelievable that passengers have to re-check their own luggage. Worst, the airline didn’t tell any of us about it.
title: Dallas airport Re-checked luggage.

review: i used to really like the app, but it has become less user friendly, and much slower. i actually use the website now instead of the app.
title: App is getting worse

review: Not just an app that deserves the best rating..the service, the flight and everything top notch…👏👏👏
title: TBB ( the best in business )

review: For past few weeks, every time I try to change my seats, the app crashes. I deleted the app and reloaded and still having the same issue. Please fix.
title: Seat selection

review: This app has everything I need to get in get and find lounges when needed.
title: Awesome

review: It doesn’t automatically update the flight info. I have to uninstall and reinstall everything I want to check my flight information, or if it’s time to check in
title: It doesn’t update the flight info

review: I tried to communicate many times with Customer Service team using the chat, and the app didn’t connected.
title: Chat didn’t work

review: Close to impossible to put your boarding pass in apple wallet. Far from user friendly. Pay attention to companies that don’t care to make things easier for you. It’s a reflection of how important you actually are to these companies.

Used app to check in. All 3 where checked in and boarding pass.
At airport had to do process all over!!! What’s the use of using app or checking in on-line!???
title: Redundant

review: The app is very simple and straightforward to use, but the system is always having problems whenever I need to make changes to my flights.
title: System needs work

review:
2 times in 2 trips over a 2 week period our luggage was misplaced. Vital medicines, vital machines were within the contents and health concerns are in place due to this oversight. 
American Airlines will be our last resort when booking flights again!
title: Continual lost baggage

review: Just discovered you can track your checked bag!
title: Baggage

review: The app will show boarding times and the wallet will not. Why? Please fix ASAP. This should have been added in in development.
title: Info difference issue.

review:
I used to love this app but recently it has not been accepting my password, although the same password works on my computer.
I tried calling apple support but after waiting half an hour they cancelled the call.
As an Executive Platinum member I am very disappointed.
title: Used to be great

review: I’ve used this app infrequently as most of my flying is with more pleasant airlines. I’ve the latest OS and the latest download of the app and it cannot load still, and this has been a problem only with the most recent version of the app.
title: Latest crashes on iPod.

review: I was put on a different flight because they can’t checkin the luggage half an hour before boarding. I would highly recommend avoiding them at all cost! I traveled to work so much and I never had an issue as I had with this Airlines.
title: Worse Airline experience.

review: Apparently the developers are more concerned with using (actually, REQUIRING the use of) the latest bells & whistles from Apple than they are with compatibility - which means serving customers as well as possible.  The app requires ios 13 which will not install on an iPhone6.  Useless to me.
title: No longer usable

review: Easy to use and navigate through.
title: American App

review: One of the easiest apps to use. Can track everything in one place.
title: Easy App

review:
During the flight wearing a mask is not being enforced as well people are abusing the no mask while eating loophole!

I fly business class a lot and people will sit for the entire flight with a cup of water as an example without a mask!
title: Masks not being enforced

review: The kiosks weren’t working properly (couldn’t get our bag tags at the kiosk), and the staff at the counter was overwhelmed.  The AA management staff needs to hang out at the front counter so that they can get a handle on the situation.
title: Checking in at DFW

review: If I’m signed in already I should be able to track my bags.
title: Could be better

review: I would give this app 0 stars if I could. It is impossible at this point to cancel my trip because it simply won’t load. And their website is even worse at navigating to a flight cancellation. It is set up that way in purpose I’m sure. Absolute trash.
title: Trash.

review: There needs to be a tab so that you can just click on it in the app. I think the first flight it was there and ez to get to but coming home it was.
title: Mobile boarding pass

review: It’s great to check in and even choose seats but for booking flights it is basically unusable. If you leave the app to look up any other information, you lose progress. Stick with the website to book flights.
title: Not a very good app

review: I tried to sign up and it kept telling me my phone number was invalid because it wasn’t a 10 digit number. I tried 3 times before giving up. I’ve never heard of a computer that couldn’t make it to ten. Very irritating. Thought I was loosing my mind.
title: Won’t let me sign up

review: The app has progressively improved over the years, but it would be helpful if one could do a multi-city booking using the app.
title: Multi-city booking

review: I like American for all the offerings of non stop flights. However when are you goin to get with the program an allow us to pay for our bags through the app
title: Update

review: App. At times is very slow loading and periodically does not load trip or flight credits.
title: Slow

review:
I purchased my ticket with wheelchair assistance.  Our flight to Salisbury was handled well both in Charlotte and Salisbury.

The return flight had us deplane onto stairs and WALK to the terminal.  Inside I was told it is NOT POLICY to meet wheelchair assistance passengers at the plane.  Take a seat and wait.

Thanks for NOTHING
title: Wheelchair assist FAIL

review: This new update makes using the app really tricky. The “promotions and wallet” lower tab will randomly appear while booking, and there’s no way to get rid of it. It’ll block buttons, so I’ve had to close the app and start the booking process all over again.
title: Don’t Update

review:
First flight: canceled on 23 hours notice 
Second flight: booked incorrectly for the next day effectively taking a day off our trip.
3rd flight:  Late so it missed our layover 
4th flight: booked on a flight separate from my girlfriend for our connector. She would have waited 12 more hours than me. 
5th flight: had to come to the airport and complain to their onsite team because the reservation line was on a 21 hour delay. 

Do not fly American. They take care of themselves before there customers.
title: Learn how to schedule

review: There is a notification connected to promotions that will not disappear no matter what I do. I called AA about this matter. The idiot had me try several things which I told her I had already tried. Then after acknowledging the problem she told me just to ignore It. Gee thanks, moron! M. Moneka
title: Promotion notification

review: If you want to show support for people struggling during a pandemic, and are waiving all the fees, why still charge for bags?  You’ve made enough over the years and once the pandemic is over, the fees will likely return anyway.
title: Baggage fee?

review: If you want an app that’s not useful for updating critical travel information and where the chat doesn’t allow you to send information to their agents needed for those same updates. This is for you. For the rest of us, it’s trash.
title: Not helpful

review: Horrible flight attendants, food is awful, chairs are uncomfortable, and it’s a hassle to get them to reward your miles. Flew over 7000 miles with them and didn’t get awarded not one of them to redeem. Taking my time and money to United, way better service.
title: Horrible service

review: I’m keeping you at a 1 star until you allow passengers to apply flight credits to new flights. I shouldn't have to call your overworked phone staff and then wait for hours on hold to do something that Spirit Airlines allows you to do with two taps. Unacceptable.
title: Horrible Company

review: I fly every other week and usually American. I just missed a flight 15 minutes ago and I’m certain I wouldn’t have if I could open my app and make the necessary changes. I have not been able to access the app all year even after I update it. Please fix!!!!
title: What’s Up with the App???

review:
American Airlines in my experience is a hassle always. Sure enough I down load the app cause I got stuck and had to use an AA flight. When I go to sign up to be an AA member through the app I can’t submit my info. Why you ask?  Because it won’t let me put in my state. Keeps saying loading states first time. 

Usual hassle!
title: Typical. AA hassle

review: Only allowing users to view the boarding pass through Apple wallet was a mistake and annoying. I don’t want to have to maintain and delete passes out of my wallet. Would prefer to have it in the app so I can easily access and see status of my flight. Not making it easy.
title: Board Pass

review: I totally regret upgrading to Gold Status!  I have had 42 flights with Zero complimentary upgrades, not even to a Main Cabin Extra available upgrade! I will need to tell all my staff, friends and family members about this worthless upgrade with American Airlines and NEVER to do it because of the horrible experiences I’ve had!
title: GOLD STATUS IS TRASH

review: Still unable to handle middle names and suffixes (Jr, etc.). I’m never able to use the app to checkin because it can’t handle names that have suffixes. It gets irritating waiting in line to see an agent for every single flight, who is able to immediately see that my name is valid.
title: Unable to match names properly

review: Not trying to sound like a downer, but I literally just had downloaded the app and to my surprise I couldn’t even use it, i wasn’t able to sign in or join. The screen was just froze. I tired refreshing the app, downloading the app again, and even restarting my phone and no luck.
title: Doesn’t work.

review:
Could you add the boarding times before the actual boarding?

It only starts to show barely before the flight takes off and there isn't any notification from app or option to send one via email or text message.

Other airlines apps tell you when the boarding times are!So it helps to plan ahead when to get to airport if there is traffic!

This is coming from an experienced flight traveler with multiple airline carriers.
title: No boarding times

review: When I first got the app I suspected it to have movies and everything. When I opened the app I had to make an account. I tried to type my phone number but it kept saying your phone number must be a 10 digit number even though it was indeed 10 digits did not use the app after.
title: Bad app do not buy

review: The app is completely useless. Hard to access needed info, had to go through my emails and search online to get my flight info. The inconvenience of the app alone and trying to access my flight information is enough to not make me book with AA again.
title: Actually useless

review: Fantastic journey, got upgraded to first class with few $$. Convenient apps feature.
title: Trip to St. Louis to Chicago.

review: No issues. Smooth on time flight that was completely full. No problems
title: Typical flight

review:
The service inside the airplane was pretty bad….no internet connection during a 6 hours flight.

You have to check your devices and the service that you offer to your customers.
title: Service and internet too bad

review: What good does it to have flights arrive on time and BRAG about that when we passengers wait an hour or longer, for baggage to unload?   How hard is it to coordinate services for known arrival times when labor is needed, number of bags known and passengers are inconvenienced for an hour because AA doesn’t really care?
title: AA Poor Performer

review:
Can’t get access to a ticket that I paid for .. unless I download this stupid app, VeriFLY. It’s incredibly difficult. It’s vague. 

For having to comply with something so stupid, it should be easy. It’s not like we want to jump through all these stupid hoops. 

Never using American Airlines ever again
title: VeriFLY? Really?

review:
I am extremely disappointed, our carry-on bags were checked in together and only one item was put on a different flight!!!!
Such an inconvenience because we try to be helpful and not take our carry-on.
title: Baggage issue

review: Excellent service and the veggie food was out of this world. Really enjoy this flight 😁😁
title: Tampa flight

review: Baggage claim stated as 2 but it was in baggage claim B.. took a lot of searching to find the correct baggage claim area. Other features seem to function well.
title: Great except for Baggage Claim Info

review: Have more people working the counter. Especially when you send luggage earlier then supposed to. At least respect those coming in to get them on the road.  Terrible what customer service has become!!!!!
title: Customer service or lack of

review:
App requested upgrade but needs to have Apple send 13 or higher. Doesn’t work anymore with my iPhone 6plus. 
I have 6 million miles on AA, but would rather fly another airline than to buy a new phone because of this app not working
title: Doesn’t work anymore

review: On a journey from the Middle East we couldn’t GYE the boarding passes for our last leg JFK-CLT called the elite line and then was transferred to the web support, they could t help, neither the counter at JFK. Nobody knew what or how to do it so they printed a paper boarding pass .. 😏😕😟😔
title: Bad sun with partners airlines

review:
For some unknown reason my bag didn’t make it on my connecting flight even though had 1.5hours. The baggage agent in Colorado Springs couldn’t seem to get my email or address correct. There have been two more flights from DFW but still no bag. 
Glad the baggage people aren’t flying the planes !!
title: Lost bag

review:
Flight AA2289 from LAX to Mia.
The AA team doesn't allow me to carry my bag with me on the airplane,  even though was under the limit measurements.
To claim my luggage back at MIA took over an hour and a half.
Because of that, I missed my shuttle and had to pay extra for another one.
title: Big delay and financial loss.

review: Almost every traveling family has multiple accounts.  If the APP accommodates that fact, it is a well-hidden feature.
title: Multiple Accounts

review:
Arrived PHL on 651 from SFO. There is no general guide to which carousel the bags will arrive in. It is required to walk the entire length from A to G, to check each one. It is now 829 pm and the carousel has not been identified and flight does not even show as arrived in the PHL arrivals Screen. 
Very very shabby
title: Carousel

review: I love how simple the app is, as well as it’s smoothness. They’re are some things that are still easier to do through a web browser. Nevertheless, it’s “A Okay.”
title: Easy App

review: Never takes my AA adavantage number or password yet in the website it does. Seems like the app developers and the website developers don’t share the same brain cause the website is genius and the app is stuck on stupid.
title: Garbage app needs A LOT of improvements

review: I paid for a first class seat but I don’t think this was a first class for the money that I paid. The seat was not comfortable and the they don’t even serve food or snacks. I am disappointed and I think I will not fly first first class with AA Any more
title: Un satisfied

review:
This app used to be great

Now you can’t even log in. I log in just fine via the web, but no amount of copying and pasting the password into this app works. I’ve had to reset my account twice now, thanks to the app. 

Not an ok bug at all
title: Can no longer log in

review:
Very upset that 10 minutes prior to boarding, they elected to tell us no food being served.
I understand the current conditions, but they should have let us know earlier. My wife and I elected not to eat because we were getting dinner. No happy!
title: 1st class seating

review: The app is pretty user friendly, it’s the airline and lack of concern for the passengers that’s alarming. Very disappointed in process of boarding and un-boarding, especially in the event of a national virus. Zero cares or concerns, even when presented to the floor manager. Fly southwest.
title: American Airlines

review: This app is pretty bad. Not a lot of feature/functionality as well as being extremely inconsistent. I’ll resort back to paper tickets. “Biggest” airline in the world can’t get a mobile app right.
title: Step it Up AA

review: The worst experience I have ever had with not only this app but this airline. T-mobile customers get gogo in flight for free and they pay more for the one plus feature to use on flight 3rd party...good luck it’s useless 5 flights no WiFi from NC to California. Delayed flights and extremely rude customer service.
title: The WORST.

review: While the app works, the boarding pass did not. Thankfully there is a way to print it out at the airport but I think that costs money so thanks a lot for wasting that even if it’s a little money. You should be providing an app that works, not one that almost costs someone their flight >:(
title: Wouldn’t work

review: A company the size of AA has no problem assigning developers to oversee app functionality. The fact that this app is very glitchy, often lacks basic entry capabilities (ie- “select your state”) and has a terrible user experience... only shows how little this company cares about actually providing quality.
title: A lack of care reflected

review:
The app doesn't work on my IPad. It completely freezes every time I open it. The best I've been able to do is get the first two digits of my Advantage number or last name in before it locks up.

Find it rather useless on my phone since I can never get the wifi to connect.
title: Locks up on IPad

review: This app might as well be trashed, by far the worst airline app I’ve used to date. Also a frequent flyer
title: Worst app I’ve ever used

review: Can't even check in for your flight with this, or at least I couldn't find it after a minute browsing all the menus available. They also don't even have maps for all the major airports they service. What's the point of this 🗑 ?
title: Completely useless

review: Completely unusable. Wouldn’t let me enter my state, kept giving message that it was populating the states list, but never let me input the info. All the user input is justified right for no apparent reason. Am deleting this bc I literally could not get it to take my basic information. Big thumbs down on this stinker.
title: Unusable

review: Please fix.
title: Boarding passes aren’t updating when gate changes

review: I made sure my advantage number was right, I made sure that my password was right, and I still cannot log in through the app. I deleted and re-downloaded the app, and it still gives me problems. Please fix.
title: Able to log in via the web. Unable to log in via the app.

review: The real time, in-flight progress to destination and the baggage claim features are great!
title: Handy!

review: Multi million company can’t even get their app to work properly. To be honest if I could give it no stars I would waste of time downloading American Airline App. Easier and quicker to go on the web and book a flight.
title: Horrible app doesn’t even work

review: My 4 hours flight was uncomfortable due to noisy kids in front of me. The flight attendant gave the kids cups of water and they wasted it and it went through their seats and wet my feet and pants and my carry on that was stowed under my seat. I was given 2 paper towels and it was horrible.
title: Disgruntled passenger

review: Why why why does American Airline find a way to keep passengers in the plane way after it’s landed? Every single flight I’ve boarded with American Airline, there’s always a reason why we’re stuck inside the plane after landing.
title: Always stuck inside the plane

review: You did good American. One big hiccup from me and you still made it happen without to much trouble.
title: Good day to fly

review: app told me to go to Gate B19 which was almost a mile walk away from where i landed. when i got to the gate i used the restroom then went to sit and wait. my bordeing pass never updated and i missed my flight coz the gates were changed!
title: missed my connecting flight

review: This app is very helpful with everything you have to do
title: Very helpful

review: Waited over an hour for bags that the app say were offloaded.  No updates and when ask for updates we got a shrug of the shoulders.  Ultimately, no solution was provided and after an hour and half we had to leave our information for delivery.
title: Baggage

review: This is a good travel app for American. Sometimes their gates aren’t all on their like in CLT but overall does the job.
title: Good App

review: Wow if your going to cancel flights at least note so before embarking on the first leg of the trip.  Then really can’t get us in another flight until the next day.  Should have know by all the previous negative responses not to trust the airlines!
title: Cancelled flights

review: The app I changed my seat and it said I changed it and then the counter said it did not
title: Aura Acevedo

review: This app is a false sense of security.  No matter where you make your “check-in”, American doesn’t let you know if it doesn’t work.  Great way to miss a flight to see family.  Couldn’t recommend the app or American Airlines any less.
title: Avoid avoid avoid

review: I have enjoyed this app for some time. I also enjoy Very Much Flying with American Airlines.
title: Field Service Engineer

review:
There are two big reason to instal an airline app: book a trip and checkin. Unfortunately, the app does not have checkin functionality. 
Big insufficiency!
title: No Checkin Function

review: Thanks AA for getting me home safe after all this covid nonsense! Attendants & Pilots were very friendly & accommodating. So glad to be homeee 👏🏼🙌🏼💃🏻
title: Smooth & Steady 😊

review: Great app with bold letters for an easy read and excellent menu to organize your future flights!
title: Easy App

review: Despite checking in my golf clubs an hour prior to departure, they were not boarded on the flight and I have a tee time booked for this morning and I will now not be playing with my traveling mates who all received their clubs.  Thanks for making my trip memorable for all the wrong reasons.
title: Checked Bag

review: Scanned my passport via the app at checkin 24 hrs prior to flight and it fully accepted the passport info to check in. When i got to the gate they couldnt let me on board bc my passport information wasnt in the system correctly. Currently sitting stand by on the next flight while i watch my original plane sit at the original gate
title: Useless

review: Easy to use/understand. Free in flight entertainment through app is a big plus
title: Best airline app

review: Just moved so switching from United to American. United app was flawless. American Airlines app is clunky, confusing and inconsistent. On today’s flight it won’t load my boarding passes saying my flight was invalid. Luckily I’ve learned to get a backup paper ticket. Can’t believe I am saying this but I prefer United. American, fix your app.
title: Unreliable

review: The app just works. And now that it gives you boarding notifications - winner winner .
title: Works

review: Errors when trying to check in. Errors when trying to book flights. Makes you just want to use the website.  Needs improvement.
title: So many bugs.

review: It keeps crashing. Every time I try to scroll down past the main screen the application closes. It is super annoying. I am flying this week and my guess is as usual I will have to go to Safari to track my bags and everything else. Please fix this problem!
title: Keeps closing

review:
This UI is far behind the state of the art for airline apps. They need to modernize the whole app IMHO. 

Two small examples: 1: When setting the secret questions, the questions are too long and I can’t see the whole question on my screen. 2: To change seats on a flight, the app kicks me out to the AA website.
title: Terrible UI

review: I am unable to log in to the app with the same details I use successfully on the American Airlines website. There are no details in the error message (“we’re unable to log you in with the details you entered”), and there is no suggested action to fix the problem.
title: Unable to log in

review:
This is the most frustrating of all airline Apps. 
I can only get it to update when I’m connected to WiFi. 
I’m not when I’m traveling, only cell’s Data service which it refuses to recognize and never updates. Very frustrating when I have delays.
title: Can only use if connected to WiFi

review: Just got off a flight from LAX to JFK - have to say we enjoyed the crew. Good natured, helpful & funny! Makes flying a joy. Thank you.
title: Smiling faces!

review: Freezes entirely and often locks you out of the ability to select a travel date so it is completely useless and nonfunctional. Feels like the app may not have been updated in so long it no longer works with the current version of iOS.
title: Broken - don’t bother

review: Wish I could have even been able to set up an account. At the log in page after two times of putting in all my info it would not let me select my state saying it was populating all states and provinces. 24 hours later same thing.
title: Like the reviews say, bad app.

review: Great tool to have when jettin around.
title: Effective and accurate

review: Constant issues with this app. It’s super glitchy and doesn’t really serve any purpose as you’re usually directed to a web page anyway. Delta has a far superior app that’s more user friendly and functional.
title: Glitchy app and doesn’t serve much purpose

review: It is not right to cancel a flight after everyone is onboard and baggage loaded also and then to offer one option 30 hours later is just adding insult. When will the truth come out and customers property compensated?
title: Flight 590

review: AA does a great just job. Miss flying with AA due to the pandemic and look forward to things improving here soon
title: Fred flying

review: Probably the worst major airline in the United States. Schedule has changed multiple times in the last 24 hours. Can’t get home. They rebooked several times. Now, I am stuck in DFW overnight. Probably won’t pay for a hotel! Way to go American!
title: American Airlines

review: Disappointing that our flight was canceled due to a staff shortage. We had to spend a lot of money to get home. I would like someone from the airline to contact me and discuss how to make this right.
title: Canceled flight

review: Great app.  Would be nice to know when the inbound aircraft is arriving.  Can that be added?
title: Person

review: In the midst of COVID, when business is slow and the flight isn’t full, American manages to lose my baggage ... again.
title: Lost bag

review:
If I could could give zero stars I would!

The flight was terrible!  Too many wheelchairs (8)! Too many jump-seats!  Too many standbys!  Too many air Marshall’s!  Too many police!  One too many prisoners!  No temperature checks!  All middle seats utilized with NO THOUGHT TO COVID-19!  You didn’t care about the health safety of your passengers!  You contributed to spreading the deadly disease throughout our country just to make money.  

I will never fly out of Miami ever again!

A very disappointing experience that I have never experienced on AA!
title: Flight  1985 MIA-DCA

review: Omg who long will you serve lasagna geez it been to long it’s time for a change for heaven sakes please
title: Business class meal

review: Easy easy easy. Never a problem getting to the info I need.
title: Simplest airline app

review: When one is doing a one day trip, the app will not let you check in even after you have completed the first leg
title: Check in

review: The app is just one small part of why AA is falling apart. The board should be given the boot for not getting rid of the CEO. AA came in last in the airline ranking (beaten by Spirit & Allegiant). The 3 stars is only for the app
title: So many repairs required

review: The app keeps notifying me to check in after I’ve boarded and after I’ve landed in the destination city. Annoying!!
title: Notifications

review: For some reason this app keeps crashing, even when I have nothing else running in the background. I have a fairly new phone and never have this problem with any other apps.
title: Crashes a lot

review: Just trying to get registered is an exercise in frustration... the country/regions won’t even load so I can’t even get registered! Looking at the other airline apps out there all rating 5 stars American really needs to up its game!
title: Can’t even get registered!

review:
This is a multi-billion dollar company, and I’ve seen better apps built by friends of mine, in a weekend.

It kept crashing so I downloaded the update, thinking it would add bug fixes. Then I couldn’t even get it to open at all, and when I finally did, it was frozen.

Useless. Deleted.
title: CONSTANTLY crashes!

review: Over and beyond customer service
title: All good

review: If it worked. I used to have the app and enjoyed it. Didn’t love it, but it did the trick and it worked consistently. Now, I get a spinning wheel of death when I try and select my arriving airport to search for flights. I’m gonna wait for an update but woah is it bad.
title: It would be great…
