review: Nuts - two cancelled flights in one day. One because they didn’t have flight attendants the other while we were flying to get a connection. Weather issues were two days ago
title: Two cancelled flights today

review: Love all the alerts I got! It helped tremendously! Will use it again and fly American!
title: Excellent

review: Impossible to check other info outside the app (like calendar or messages) during tasks like picking seats. App resets the state each time you return to it.
title: App loses state whenever you app-switch

review: The aa app is rock solid.  Always updating me on gates, trips, and baggage claim.  Love the user interface!  Keep up the good work!
title: App Never Disappoints

review: The last several flights have been not just late but 7+ hours late. Finally today they are on time, had two hours to transfer luggage, and now it’s lost. Really, the service is terrible.
title: Always late and now lost luggage

review: App has tiny text that is hard to read. If you’ve configured your iPhone to use larger font sizes, those preferences are ignored
title: App doesn’t respect larger font accessibility

review: Something is wrong. It used to work fine for a couple of years. Then bam I had a flight yesterday ans bam I can’t log into the app but can log in online. I’ve tried deleting and reinstalling and still no luck.
title: Used to work fine

review: App can be convenient but sometimes it will say weird things and you need to just go to the website
title: App

review: Spent 30 min in a Lyft ride trying to retrieve PW and/or AAdvantage credentials and still no luck.  Text help provides no help.   Calling customer service no luck.   Kept saying email sent to retrieve credentials but never received.   Never had this problem with United or Southwest.
title: Garbage.  Good luck if get new phone or forget your PW

review: I use the widget and it used to show my 1 trip, but now it shows 0 trips.
title: Widget doesn’t show my trip

review: Makes traveling so easy.  On flight entertainment is great and makes managing miles and trips easy.
title: Great app

review: Network down BOTH flights today. Not good
title: Wifi entertainment

review: I guess there was some update that makes it so a mandatory pop up comes up when you first open the app....but you can’t close the pop up and now I can’t use the app. I can’t add my boarding pass to my phones wallet, I can’t do anything....
title: COVID-19 pop up broke the app

review:
App is one of the best on my iPhone. I’m flying every week and use the app daily.
American Airlines is number #1 and all the haters need to stop
title: Great App

review: This app is only consistent in how terrible it is. Being able to choose your seat is iffy. Can’t check-in for flights without errors. It’s only good for being up-to-date in flight times, but you could just rely on email and flight aware for that.
title: Terrible App

review: Poor App that is only superseded by an even worse airline.  None of the kiosks worked either so must have been a system wide issue.  Have flown domestic and international; terrible food, bad seating design, and agents that are apathetic at best.
title: Couldn’t get upgrade feature to work

review:
Your new seats are a joke. How can you cram passengers into a space like that in good conscience?

Also, one of our 3 bags didn’t make it onto the flight....somehow.....and must be delivered.
title: Charlotte to LaGuardia

review: I’m not sure how a bag gets lost on a direct flight but this airline somehow figured it out. I don’t usually even fly with this airline, usually do cheaper flights with other airlines and somehow the more expensive airline loses my bag. Let’s see what accommodations they follow up with because this is ridiculous
title: Lost bag

review: The app has always worked well, but after the latest update it keeps crashing anytime I slide the bottom bar all the way up. I can’t access anything like my activity, same-day flight changes, etc.
title: App keeps crashing after latest update

review: Just booked flights, got the app and it won’t even let me type my name to look at my trip! But it will work if I want to book another flight! Wish I booked with United or Delta. This will be first and last with American.
title: Terrible

review: Since the most recent update every time I select the app it freezes or crashes. I’m lucky if I can get one step beyond the home screen. I’ve tried deleting the app and reinstalling it but it didn’t help. This bug needs to be fixed ASAP.
title: Constantly freezing and crashing

review: There are too many updates that do very little to impress vet the app. As a biz traveler I have no time for all these updates on all my devices. Last flight the app would not play movies on tablet only on phone because of needed updates.
title: Stop making it a full time job 2 update your app

review:
Awful interface.
This is the app you need to download for inflight entertainment, though you’d never know it from the pictures and description. However, it’s incredibly slow and difficult to use on the plane WiFi. 

Just don’t fly American and then it’s a five star experience.
title: Hire a UI Designer Please

review:
I checked in more than 90 minutes before my flight. Priority Lane, AA agent tagged my bag.   AA has lost my bag on a direct flight from DFW to PDX.  

It’s never OK to lose control of someone’s bag.   If I had been late, packed improperly, or something out of the control of AA, then OK. 

This is not OK.  It was even tagged “Priority”.  What does that then mean?
title: Lost my bag

review: There’s no way to use travel credits or flight credits to pay for hold flights.  Customer service number takes days to get through—even “elite” status hotlines.  Switching to spirit so I’ll get what I pay for.
title: No service airline

review: I don’t know what is more incompetent the phoenix airport or this unAmerican airline. It should be illegal in this country to have any business with this rate of failure carry this name. An absolute lesson i will never forget. NEVER COUNT ON AMERICAN AIRLINES. Alaska has made them look so bad, so far behind in total experience….
title: Worst airline experience ever.

review: Absolutely cannot get a hold of anyone to talk to, someone is using my information, has a flight in my name with 3 other passengers who I have no idea of and I cannot speak to anyone! They are flying RIGHT NOW! And I cannot get anyone to contact me! What is going on?!
title: Customer Service

review: I have been waiting for my bags for over an hour. Your service desk doesn’t have a clue about anything. We pay your airline for a service, and if you are not going to give us that service I will switch to another airline.
title: Baggage Claim

review: Have flown with many different airlines and Americans app is my far the best. Great UI  and UX, very informative, easy to use .
title: Best airline app

review:
The app allows check in and boarding passes but that is about it. It would be helpful if: 
1. The gate is shown prominently
2. Boarding time is shown 
3. Baggage carousel is shown 
4. Future flights are shown on Home Screen 
I found I had to look up my flight with the reservation each time I tried to access it. 

Hopefully AA adjusts their app to be more consumer friendly.
title: Unhelpful app

review: The app is very user friendly and gives all the info that you need
title: Great app

review: Handy for eticket handling but information on delayed flights or cancellations can be hours or even days out of date.
title: Inaccurate

review: I understand delayed flights, won’t I don’t understand is making me pay more for another flight when you bumped me from first class down to the back. And cost me another hotel night.
title: Today you failed!

review:
I checked my golf bag inside at priority counter first class in Miami....went smooth except counter person asked me to leave bag by the counter and the guy would pick it up.....
Well landed in DCA with no golf bag 

Bummer
title: No golf bag after checking to the priority counter

review:
1 small bottle of water and 1 pack (2) cookies for a four hour flight. All the while, the flight attendants sat in the back of the airplane talking.

I have flown Delta twice in the last month and the service was great... 

Really terrible flight except for the pilot’s terrific landing.
title: Terrible service!

review: App errors out regularly.  Doesn’t show enough flight detail about food service, no option to remove the basic economy fares from search.
title: Unreliable.

review: You’d think for something as serious and costly as flying, they’d hire good app developers. Always have problems with the app ESPECIALLY with getting my boarding pass (something you KINDA need when traveling). Theres a reason I usually fly delta, cause their app actually works.
title: App barely functions properly

review:
I fly weekly w delta.  Tried american out for a trip this week.  Delays.  Calncelations. NO COMMUNICATIONS TO TRAVELERS RE REALISITIC ISSUE RESOLUTIONS OR UPDATED...

Now here i stand at end of trip and have waited for for my luggage for 40 minutes so far.  Bag was unloaded 35 ago and on ground agents said.... were busy.  Give me a reason to fly w american and try you again..
title: To bad in my trip american couldnt get it correct

review: The date selector for passport expiration date is defaulting to (though not displaying) the current date. If you change the date, it immediately reverts back to today’s date. F ft
title: Defect in international checkin workflow

review: So much traffic now that my flights to and from LYH are always delayed.  Today sitting on tarmac waiting to takeoff for over 50 minutes.   This is what I expect at crappy airports like philly.  Now American is creating another one in CLT.  Too bad too.
title: CLT airport going down hill fast

review: This is the worst airline app. I can’t pull my boarding pass up until I’m actually at the gate, and by this time it’s pointless since I already have a paper copy. I can’t check in and I can’t even update my seats, it’s been super frustrating to use, and I travel a lot!
title: App doesn’t work

review: Every time I open this app it needs to be updated. More often than Facebook. Frame errors, flight booking, looking up reward travel flights is a guessing game. It’s always something different. Never write reviews but felt that compelled to respond about this app.
title: Never working

review: Every time I click on the book flight icon it takes me to its actual website instead of keeping in the app. It doesn’t happen on my phone, but it does happen on my tablet.
title: Booking on tablet

review: The most recent systems update, regardless of goal, has left the app unusable for me. My 20-character password can be neither entered nor pasted into the field to login. At 17 characters the field stops. After changing passwords online and confirming login, the app still does not function appropriately.
title: Cannot login dude to update

review:
American Airlines always seems to accommodate my needs.  Head and shoulders above the rest!!

DLJones
title: Great service

review:
Hours to check in … when it works … requires you to download multiple other redundant dysfunctional apps. AND THEN you still have to present hard copies at the airport of all information filled in and scanned into the three apps.
POINTLESS !!!!
title: Horrible app

review: Although a short flight to Nashville from Philly - there was no air so it was very hot. The beverage service was subpar as you only were able to get a half can of soda!! Very disappointed for the price of tickets!
title: AA Flight

review: Great wheelchair service for post op knee replacement passenger. American is tops in my book.
title: Friendly service

review: This app is progressively getting worse. It's lost the mobile boarding pass. Its lost the in flight entertainment. It's now just a glorified frequent flyer milage tracker which is now useless since I you no longer earn miles on basic economy.
title: It's evolving just in reverse

review: Solid app but feel that Delta sets the bar right now for the USA based airlines.  Aesthetics and function both could be tweaked to 2020 standards.  There still is time :)
title: Good app

review:
When trying to book a flight at the end after displaying all the total $ amounts in “Your trip summary”, when pressing continue button it comes back and displays error message 
”Choose a different flight or fare”
title: Buggy site/app

review: the app doesn’t work unless connected to WiFi which is EXTREMELY inconvenient especially when traveling.
title: WiFi connection

review: I can book a flight (when the app responds). However, no matter how often I verify and re-verify my flight information, the app always says “cannot verify”. Very frustrating. Good thing the app is free.
title: Can’t look up reservation

review: Tried to use it, but when I tried to sign up for their AAdvantage, it would not let me submit. It didn’t say that I had anything entered wrong, but yet the submit button would not work. The cancel button worked fine, though! United’s app works much better!
title: Not a good app

review: If you are flying international and your passport doesn’t have an RFID chip, it won’t let you check in. It’s an awesome idea and feature, but there should be an option for those holding a passport without such technology.
title: NFC reader - blocking step in check in

review: I have three good things to share: American Airlines gives me confident of Safety, Decent prices and great service following the American culture.
title: Safe and Trustable Airlines

review: App seems to think we are boarding now but they are literally deplaning. Is this tied into an actual network or is it just guessing? I don’t trust the info I receive. We are already delayed so did they fudge the boarding time to get around the FAA and DOT? I smell a rat.
title: Bad info

review: I’ve flown with American Airlines three time and each time was comfortable and fast.
title: Review

review: I usually just end up using the website from my browser.  You can’t email flight info from the app or add it to your calendar.  Just good for basics, shopping for a flight and boarding pass.
title: Clunky and clumsy

review:
Terrible app, full of web pages, takes ages to load, this is definetely not an iPhone app.

It’s a website compresses and bundled into the app store. Shame on the company for allowing this to happen.

I can’t login, can’t retrieve my password, the security questions instead of using FaceID and TouchID is the worst decision made ever.
title: Worst Airline App Ever

review:
When did the boarding pass discontinue from being added to Wallet? Had this on prior versions, my older AA tickets show in passbook/wallet but cannot add upcoming passes. 2 stars -Ugh!!

Update - wallet pass appeared after checkin .. still 2stars for the frustration.
title: WTH .. no wallet boarding bass?

review: The app constantly rotated or cropped my properly-positioned Covid test when using the photo option. Then once all the information was complete (with photo sideways but visible) it refused to validate, with no explanation. Waste of time.
title: Lousy COVID section

review:
First, start serving us in real glasses. 
Second, I am tired of the same Turkey cheese on soggy bread or cheese sandwich on soggy bread. I am Exec Platinum and tired of seeing the pilot served a hot entree and I continually get a cold soggy sandwich.  First is not cheap, please quit treating us like second class passengers.
title: Food in first class

review: Unable to update reservation because manage trip and change seat is always in the way!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Even after adding all the info, it remains annoying!!!! I’m switching to other lines, screw this
title: Annoying!!!!!!!!!!!!

review: I would not prefer to use American again bags damaged we were in a8 he flight only served a box of snacks coming and going.  Flight attendees 1 actually want the best just not overall happy upgraded my flight to get canceled and sat in seat that was not happy about.
title: Hawaii

review: I guess they figure if you don’t prioritize having the newest phones (maybe saving a little money so you can afford an airline ticket) you don’t deserve to find out your flight status... kind of offensive.
title: Need a new iPhone to use this

review: Very helpful and convenient.
title: Saves time

review: Gate change last minute in LAX must have caused our baggage to go to Dallas instead of Tulsa. Will have to drive back to the airport 4 hours later to pick up bags as of now.
title: Bags loaded on wrong flight again!

review: Our luggage did not make the connection. We have to drive back to the airport or wait until tonight to get them.
title: Bags are late.

review: Highly capable app, user-friendly, makes traveling a breeze.
title: Great App

review: Lack of communication, flight change day of. Unaware of Changed flight until flight landed in connecting airport. Flights moved up an hour sooner than booked without notification.
title: Flight change without alerting passenger

review: You can’t cancel a flight using the app - the hyperlink to cancel is only partially visible AND it takes you to the seat change section.  You have to use the full site to cancel!
title: Crummy app

review: It keeps my reservations at hand. I can book easly except with miles
title: Love my AA app

review: Smooth and flawless. Gives me the info I need when I need it.
title: Love the widget

review:
Very good job American 
I love the way you handled yourself during this pandemic.
Thank you
title: Happy happy happy

review: I love that the AA app imports both my AA and codeshare flights and offers up ETA/traffic info to my departure airport and food-preorder at most airports.
title: Great app, clean and easy to use

review: Maybe they could at least figure out how to keep your place in the app when you switch between the app and another, such as email or Safari? Evidently not! Have fun restarting your booking!
title: Bad app representative of mediocre airline

review: Horrible app. I feel like I’m working with safari on the original iPhone. Glitchy, slow, and you can’t actually do anything on it. Can’t even choose your seats.
title: Southwest will always be better at everything

review: Slow to access seating. Shuts down occasionally when using. Nice to be able to change seats from your phone.
title: Don’t be in a hurry

review: American is a good company, but lately there have been many delays I travel 2 or 3 times a month and 2 out of the 3 flights are delayed or canceled, which makes it very hard for me to visit my customers on time and support our operations in different locations
title: Travel experience

review: Our flight arrived 40 minutes ago and we still haven’t posted to a baggage claim!  I willingly checked my bag at the counter to save space and this is exactly why I normally just keep it with me.  After you have flown all day you just want your stuff so that you can head home!
title: Baggage Claim

review: Had the app for a couple of years now, usually fly a dozen or so times a year. I’ve yet to be able to connect and go where I want to without some difficultly. This time a three hour flight with connection problems.
title: Never without a problem

review:
All I can see is my next flight (and apply for a credit card). Where did all the other useful stuff go (account, flight tracking, Admirals Clubs, etc)???

Looks similar to the pruning BA did on their now largely useless iPad app. Pleas go back to the previous version.
title: What did you do to the iPad app?!?

review: I wish you guys could add whether the airports have curbside check in.  That would be really cool
title: Curb side check in

review: Great app for my needs. Fly American primarily. Would really like to see Pay support for ticket, checked bag, inflight WiFi purchases.
title: Love app but needs Pay support!

review: Seriously? Very poor performance, navigation, stability. Second time I had issues getting boarding passes - they just don’t show up. Wish it worked as smoothly as the JetBlue app. A bit frustrated as I write this since I have no passes for flight I need to board 🤬
title: Just not good

review:
Unable to login to my account using the exact same information that works in a browser.

Fortunately the record locator feature works.

Keep trying you will get it right (or not considering this issue has existed forever).
title: Unable to Login

review: The website pushes you to the app to stream your movie/tv show and then it won’t play. Tried on two different 767 flights in the last few days, multiple iOS devices. Fix this AA or give us another app option to use.
title: Panasonic inflight entertainment doesn’t work

review:
We were stranded in Richmond VA with horrible service from United.
Appreciate the rescue!
title: Thank you

review: app does not work. I don’t know what is going on, it’s been a year since I booked a flight and the app worked well. But it hasn’t been working for over a month now and I’ve done like 10 updates!!! Ridiculous!
title: unresponsive

review: You cannot get rid of notifications on lock/Home Screen…even days after your flight. All the normal ways to turn off notifications on the iPhone do not work.
title: Errors

review: The flight attendants are rude and seem to care more about gossip and their personal lives than doing their job. I fly a lot because of my work and I usually try to avoid AA. (I know this about the app but it had to be said)
title: 5 am flight

review: The American App is not a user friendly or app oriented as other airlines. The app is more like the website than an app
title: Not user friendly

review: Absolutely atrocious customer service. Spent well over 2 hours on the phone (mostly on hold) to be told I should email them for help after my travels and “maybe” they’d be able to help. Honestly unbelievable.
title: Horrible customer service

review: Amazing rewards program!
title: Great rewards program

review: Great flight and love the the app! The app is easy to use and very helpful!
title: Flight

review: We are so grateful for the booking agent, the checkin agent liz in jfk, Barry our escort and the flight attendants on flight 1367 to Jackson hole from jfk!!
title: Amazing service!

review:
Gate crew required that I check my carry-on as I was one of the final 50 people to board. There was plenty of space in the plane when I boarded. 

All of the time and effort that people put into only bringing a carry on onto a flight…. I will not fly AA again.
title: Unnecessary bag check.

review: Moving through this app was very easy. I really appreciated the eased that I had since I’m not tech savvy.
title: App made simple

review: For some reason every time I put in a trip, once I hit the submit button it says there was an error. I’ve doubled and triple checked the information is correct. Not sure what is going on.
title: App isn’t functional

review: I’m quite surprise at how much I have enjoyed using this app!
title: To be completely honest,

review: This is the worst company I have ever seen. And this app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded on my phone, and that includes Lily’s Garden. It always crashes, always freezes, the UI is basically inoperable. Who even hired these coders. Fix yourself.
title: App has terrible functionality

review: Please make it functional again for less than iOS 13.0. It’s especially inconvenient while I’m in the middle of a trip and Mobile is no longer working.
title: Not everyone has devices with iOS 13.0

review: It use to be boarding time in boarding boarding pass and it was logical, convenient, and only place to see it. Please return BOARDING time in a BOARDING pass. I already see departure time in flight information.
title: Boarding time.

review:
App is not user friendly at all, Southwest has a much better app. 
Can’t tell if movies are free or not. Absolute joke. Tells you to visit a website to watch movies but I still need the app? Plane is stuck with repairs on runway. I hate this airline and app.
title: This app and airline is a joke

review: I would like to give it five stars but since I can’t even look up flights then it’s pretty pointless. Hope you guys can fix the issue soon even the website not working
title: Doesn’t show me flights

review: The app works well during travel but not great when trying to purchase a fight.
title: Issues with buying a flight

review:
Lost my known traveler #. Thankfully it was a slow airport. Tried to remedy by re-entering on their app, but it crashes every time I try to enter my profile. 

AA has plenty of problems, and you can add their app to the long list.
title: Fine...When it Works

review: You require the app to be downloaded before the flight in order to access in-flight content, but the app is 209MB!  Airport Wi-Fi or crappy AT&T service at the airport means this can take 30 minutes to download.   Good thing you’re always delayed departing so there’s time to get it done.....
title: Bloated

review: I can’t even get past the signup because my 10 digit phone number won’t accept because “a valid phone number is 10 digits” and there’s nothing I can do about it because there are 10 digits.
title: Can’t even get in

review: The airline is great however the app continues to crash. I just removed it and redownloaded it so I am hoping they have fixed the kinks. It baffles me that American does not pay to have the best app. I hate united and frontier as airlines but their app ratings are superb.
title: Pay a real app developer

review: As a Gold/Platinum AA customer for almost 20years this app is the worst technology product in the airline industry. The amount of bugs and loops that occur in the “Book A Flight” section alone makes it IMPOSSIBLE to book a flight.  I have updated/deleted and reloaded and the problem continues. BAD👎👎👎
title: Terrible App - worst in the industry

review: Trying to buy tickets but had to redo the same search countless times. Why? Every time after I opened another app for some information (e.g., the DOB or phone number of a passenger) and returned to this poor app, all data got wiped. I had to start from a new search. So frustrating!
title: So bad and unusable!

review:
This has to be the most horrible app ever, if you took out some of the useless ads maybe it would work better. Keeps timing out....can’t even book a flight.
Just another corporation that doesn’t care about anything other than $$$.
title: Useless junk

review: So it allows you to watch movies with Internet
title: The best

review: Horrible airline. Don’t even think about installing this app. Fly Delta. My flight was delayed due to crew unavailability. After that they said “oh sorry it’s due to weather” because that way they can get away without booking us a hotel.
title: Liars

review: Doesn’t recognize your ticket number and forces you to call 800 to even get your flight into app unless you booked in the app. Ridiculous waste of time.
title: Don’t use it traveling with multiple people

review: The app is difficult to navigate for basic information like boarding time. They need to look at United’s for some ideas of how to improve functionality.
title: Not user-friendly

review: Easy to use. Very informative. No more paper boarding passes. Go American
title: Great app.

review: Ignoring the fact you have to frequently stress if your flight will be cancelled or not, hands down worse airline and worse customer experience there is. Becoming spirit airlines in their attempt to nickel and dime you.
title: Worse airline ever

review: Very easy to use, has all your info
title: Great app

review:
Bags listed on wrong carrousel.  American Baggage was aware yet didn’t walk the 500 ft to tell anyone that the screen was wrong. They had time to pull the bags off the wrong carrousel and write a note for us to read once we figured out where they were. AN HOUR AFTER LANDING.  

Fun times.
title: Baggage Fail

review: Had a connecting flight from GSP to DFW to LAS. They put my checked luggage on a later flight. Told me it happens and they could deliver by midnight maybe. No apologies nothing and very rude.  So I spent an extra hour in baggage waiting for the flight my luggage was on. So much for convenience of checking a bag.
title: Luggage fiasco

review: Needs better information on how to get the entertainment part of the app to work inflight.
title: How do you get the entertainment to work?

review: The flights keep getting delayed there and back on my kids trip. Flights and gates were changed countless times there and back. I’m really going to have to try another airlines in the future.
title: The worst trip ever

review: Terrible functionality and navigation does not work.  Cannot handle simple passenger update info and multiple record locators pet user.  Needs much more work to make into an useful application.
title: Embarrassing for a mobile app

review: Cannot download or update existing app because my IPhone is not compatible with the latest IOS. There should have been a way to let my original downloaded app to continue to work.
title: iPhone 6 Plus

review:
AA makes waiting for my bags difficult 
Takes way too long waiting- really needs improvement for AA to be a world class airline.  Shame on you!
Rdf
title: Bag Claim

review: Their advertisement offered WiFi jet it didn’t work
title: WiFi

review: We had the best flight attendants on our flight
title: Flight attendant

review: What good is the app if I can’t even type in a record locator to find my flight? Useless. I try and type in the field and it appears locked and won’t let me enter anything.
title: Terrible - won’t let me type in record locator

review: I just saw a review that said the app is terrible but gave it 5 stars 🧐. You would think the US would have the best airlines but unfortunately they don’t. This app crashes like crazy and doesn’t work half the time. It really is terrible
title: Terrible app

review: If there is a slower airline at getting bags from the plane to the baggage claim I don’t know what it is. American is the WORST! I routinely wait more than 45 minutes for bags which is ridiculous!! The flight attendants are rude. The baggage is the slowest! The on time performance is horrible.
title: You are the worst.

review: Most unfriendly staff ever. Not even a smile or checking to see if anyone needed anything in first class ! Very rude
title: Flight from Portland me to charlotte

review: Unable to register in app. The state function say it is loading for the first time and is populating. This times out the app.
title: Bug

review: I was looking for my flight in 2 days, but it says I need the record locator. Well it has my name and AA number, it should be able to find it. Poor search feature.
title: needs improvement

review: Our flight from Dallas to Baton Rouge on 2-29: none of our bags arrived. There was plenty of time between flights. Now we will be woken up sometime in between midnight and 4:00 AM to have them delivered. Very disappointing after being dead tired . The aircraft was very nice. Not one of the old beat up ones.
title: Displeased

review: It is obvious to me that American tech has never tried to use their app for making comments ir asking questions.  It makes you start all over if you leave to do things like go to email to get the flight identifier. Stupid. All the info they need like name etc is IN THE APP.
title: This app is a joke

review: The app is certainly not up to par compared to lesser airlines, but now the mobile boarding pass feature is completely broken.    Pathetic. Frustrating to keep getting sent back to the counter for a paper pass...
title: Mediocre app and busted mobile boarding pass

review: No icon option to check in with the app.  Literally had to do a separate Google search to go to American Airlines website from which I was able to login  in seconds and get mobile boarding passes.  Phone App was worthless to me.
title: Can’t check in

review: Excellent customer service and very friendly employees.
title: Human Resources professional

review: More than 50% of the time when I try to use this app I get “Error” or “server not responding”. I have confirmed either string wifi or working cell service. The app is totally useless. Never have this trouble with other airline apps.
title: Server Not Responding

review: I love the service, Admirals Club and the on time flights. The upgrades ain’t too shabby either!😇🍾👍🏽
title: Cal Fryes Favorite Airlines

review: My TSA Pre designation doesn’t appear on the mobile boarding pass like it used to. I have to use the paper boarding pass. Used to show all the time. Please fix this.
title: TSA Pre Doesn’t Appear on app

review: Super helpful and couldn’t be easier to use!!
title: Marv

review:
Not completely accurate 
Information wrong about bags
title: Insecure information

review: Difficult to get into the entertainment
title: Some things great some not so much

review: Had no problems with flight booking, but inflight entertainment didn’t work.
title: Good but needs bug fixes

review: Can’t delete trip from the app
title: Can’t delete trip from the app

review: It has all that I need, all the information I need is here 😊
title: Great app

review: Excellent smooth flight from Long Beach California airport. Better than flying into and out of LAX.
title: American Eagle flight AA 3766

review: Airport maps don’t load.
title: Airport Maps

review: Perfect app!! Better than all others. Thanks
title: Excellent

review:
Waste of time. It’s no faster or better than the website. The app doesn’t even give an option to see if you got bags, and how many bags you have allowed for your upcoming trip. 

Just a trash app. Do not recommend.
title: Trash app

review: There is no way to rest password. It says you have 6 attempts but after 2 attempts your account is locked for 24hrs. That makes no sense for those that are traveling and need to use the app.
title: Not user friendly

review:
Very disappointed how American care about first class- both flights fro SFO to Miami . As first class we were the last one to get our bags. 

Just a point.. if we pay for first class it’s because we would like to treated as we pay .
title: Bags

review:
American Airlines crew members are always pleasant. They do a great job maintaining safety protocols and always with a smile on their face.
Lorri Zumwalt
title: Another pleasant trip

review: The developers for this app needs to be replaced. Terrible app.. what type of IT developers AA hires. It’s embarrassing. It keeps asking you to re log in all the time. That’s a very poor practice. I’d rather do all my transaction on my computer. This app is so poorly written.
title: Fire the developers

review:
Canceled flight that was already delayed on a clear day due to no pilot...really AA?!
Maybe going bankrupt like the net claims would be best to clean house at AA. Just started using this airline and the net is absolutely correct that it’s subpar service delays and cancelations will soon bankrupt them.
title: AA Screwed the Customer Again

review:
The AA app is functional, but it’s lacking features that many other apps currently have:

1) Can’t use FaceID to log in
2) App doesn’t tie into iPhone password manager
3) When searching for flights, there is no way to force it to just use the airport you selected.  I almost booked a flight to LAX instead of ONT because it returned results for all LA area airports
4) Can’t use ApplePay or saved credit card info on iPhone
title: Just OK

review:
This app was great. However, the last few months it freezes when trying to book flights (or even search for them!)

It is nice when it works.
title: Broken

review: App wouldn’t give me a drop down menu for my state and wouldn’t let me type one in.  I gave up after a few minutes because I don’t fly that often and I have better things to do with my time.
title: Glitchy

review: I’m trying to check in and it won’t let me because it won’t let me make an account because it keeps saying my 10 digit phone number isn’t 10 digits. I’m never booking an American flight again.
title: Bs waste of time. Invasive information required as well.

review: Fails to update routinely. Frequently tells me that it is offline when the phone is connected to the internet. Hangs up. When it works it’s fine, but only works 25% of the time.
title: Poor Reliability

review:
I went to checkin for my flight today and got a message to update the app. After doing that, it kept crashing. Checked the specs and the new app needs iOS 11.
Sorry AA not going to buy a new phone to use your crummy app. Back to paper for me.
title: Another app that can't be used on iPhone 5

review: Trying to find a flight and the app constantly gives error messages.  Please work on this so booking (and paying for!) a flight is not such a hassle.  Now I am off to look for flights to Europe through another airline...
title: App needs some work

review: Haven’t been able to search for flights or now sign in for a few weeks.  I tried deleting the app and reinstalling but that didn’t work either. Can’t sign in now.
title: Lots of errors

review: The app showed my boarding pass at security and decided to crap out at boarding.  I tried to reboot my phone but no dice.  I had to get a printed boarding pass and thanks to the delay... had to gate check my carry on.  Thanks for wasting 30 mins of my time, American.
title: Can’t get my boarding pass

review: We buy tickets six months in advance to Hawaii and pay cash.  Get to the airport and can’t get a seat assignment five hours before flight because it is over booked.  I’ll fly Southwest from now on.  At least they have not forgotten customer service!
title: Poor customer service

review: I have been trying for 3 days to even get this app to open. I can’t get passed the point of putting my address in. It just keeps saying to wait while the states load for the first time. I have even deleted and reloaded the App twice.
title: Load the states already

review: I try to enter my birthday and it automatically changes to today’s date. I skip that and continue to entering my state address (required) and it says it’s populating for the first time. That was a half an hour ago. Beyond frustrating
title: I can’t even get started in this app

review: Latest version does not work because it needs iOS 11 but installs on 10 so it freezes on load and you can't do anything.  Back to the Stone Age for this airline until they learn to use the App Store properly, not buying a new device every 2 years.
title: Dead App

review:
I love this app the map the borading pass is wonderful ！！
Do not know why that many people say is bad 🤔
title: Very useful！

review: I’ve been using this app for years! It’s my perfect travel companion!
title: Works like a charm

review: Great app always up to date glad they have it
title: Great app

review: This app does not provide basic information about reservations, such as flight time (time spent in the air), miles flown per segment, or what amenities will be available on a given flight.
title: Needs improvement

review: The absolute worst experience I have ever had buying anything in my whole life was buying American Airline ticks. Do whatever you can to avoid this company unless you enjoy flushing cash down the toilet.
title: Worst Customer Experience I Have Ever Had

review: Won’t let you use miles to book travel, but there are are flights if you pay cash. Just says something went wrong. Every single time.
title: Doesn’t work at all.

review: They were so nice & very professional. Kelvin has a great sense of humor.
title: Flight attendants

review: One of the best flight experiences we have ever had.  Our flight attendant, John, was fantastic.
title: Great flight PNS➡️DCA Flight 4904

review: Plane was cold, waited 2 hours from landing to get through customs since they decided to land 6 international flights within 10 minutes of each other. No one at Global Entry. Only three luggage carousals for six fights. Switched our carousel 4 times
title: Horrible

review:
Always great service.
Good communication regarding flight status.
title: Passenger

review: They dont pay back single penny. No security for ticket. Once you book it then you will be loosing money.
title: Cancelling flight tickets is rediculus

review: OMG this is the worse app ever! I am very computer literate and this app is sooooo bad. Wanted to watch free entertainment on a flight. Would not load or even bring up options. Bought the WiFi and still did not work. So frustrating!
title: Worst App ever!

review: Bag was handled poorly and not in the same condition as when I checked it. It looked like they were very rough with it. It was a heavy bag and I understand that but it was a little disappointing to have it happen.
title: Baggage

review: Before COVID hit I would have given American 5 stars since COVID their customer service has gotten horrible. They now care only how to make money to get out of hole and screw customers every chance they get
title: American please care about your customers

review:
I tried to correct my mailing address to conform to US Post Office specs and the app has mangled my address and will not accept any further attempts to correct the address.
I wanted to update my credit card expiration dates and I cannot even find that in the app.
USELESS.
title: Does Not Update Profile Correctly

review: The app is broken after this update unacceptable American
title: Wth

review: The app is great but it seems like they can’t keep their site up!  I am a frequent Traveller and get error on the app and their website constantly!
title: So many errors!

review:
This is our 2nd trip to Cabo San Lucas from our home in Charlotte, NC in the past year.  And for the 2nd time we arrive to find that our luggage did not arrive with us.
We are loyal AA customers, Platinum level, yet our peace of mind is shaken again as you inconvenience and disappoint us again !  Please remedy this issue!!
John & Debra Watt
title: Lost Luggage...........AGAIN !

review: I downloaded the app for an upcoming trip, but it won’t even let me log in. The keyboard freezes every time I re-open the app. Not having any trouble with any other apps on my phone, and I even restarted my phone, and it still didn’t work
title: Can’t Even Log In

review: We keep going backwards on this app. I am am 40 minutes into a flight and can’t get the app to work. The back and forth between browser and app is a clear sign that you need a developer that knows how to develop a native app vs a web app.
title: Hope they fly better!

review: This is the worst airline app available.   I get an error every time I try to log it.   Can’t get updates on flights or boarding passes.   I travel every week and look for flights other than American for this very reason.
title: Worst Airline App available

review: You need to have a better sign in flow, you give customers a couple minutes to get app before taking off but your system is broken and you lock people out after it doesn’t work. I’m not happy, horrible experience.
title: Horrible app

review: So it’s not the best airline app but it sorta works. But wailt till you get a delayed flight. The data that the app displays are unreliable. Text message departure time changes are different than the app. Kinda of a mess.
title: App just ok. Data in the app is unreliable

review:
My connection flight was delayed for 4 hours and I had to cancel plans at my destination city to accommodate.
AA made up all these lame excuses of “plane is being fixed”, “pilot is clocking out”, “cannot pump fuel into the correct tank”, then “over-fueled the tank”? 
How come you have all the bad luck? Maybe cuz you’re bad?
title: Ok app, HORRIBLE airline with LAME excuses

review: Oneworld support and visibility is almost useless. This company has its head in the sand and refuses to support and recognize its alliance partners. Have you tried to look up your alliance booking or manage your booking? You are supposed to be one team ...
title: No partner support

review: Easy to use and timely updates
title: Great app

review:
No information given via any means of communication, neither email/ App/ nor actual contact with staff. 
Flights were operated by another curriers airline. No updates no status changes informed of….
Poor client relations!
title: No attention to detail

review: Hard to find current flight information and very hard to use.  Support access is even more impossible.
title: App is very hard to use and not helpful

review: Poor customer service from Cmh to Phoenix and then at the Phoenix airport. I gave 3 stars because the flight from phoenix to Hawaii was much better
title: Customer Service

review: Extremely good ease to navigate
title: Superior

review: Flew to RDU. The flight was jam packed. When we got to RDU, we all waited well over an hour to get our bags. The attendant in the baggage office was surly. We arrived at midnight and no one got a bag, apology, or anything for well over an hour. Won’t do this again. Good bye, American Airlines.
title: Bags?  You will wait forever

review: I hate with someone or something is fooling me,  specially my time, when you doing checking, the last step to confirm US country, the app didn’t run and it’s bugged  there. BTW it’s not the first try.
title: Don’t waste your time on checking in on the app!!

review: The apps runs smooth and great. Love the app!!
title: Flight Status

review: Updates are not backwards compatible.  If I want to be able to use the new update, Ihave to buy a new smartphone.  Would have been nice to have a basic version usable on older phones without the latest bells and whistles.
title: Useless!

review: Worst customer service and attitude.  That guy should be fired.  On top of it he didn’t send the car seat out of there. It never left Charlotte.  Spent an hour just to talk to someone in Flagstaff to figure it out.  If could remember his name I’d cal him out directly.

review:
Bottom line first - the app needs a substantial overhaul. As others have suggested. United’s app is killer. 

In my experience this app is good for:
*Gate info
*check in
*airport maps
*boarding pass

The chat feature is totally useless. 
Never check bags, so i can’t comment. 
Seat selection works well enough for me. 
Never have any issues with app crashing or being non-responsive. 

Overall it rates a Meh.
title: Fair objective review

review: Made travel so much easier! 10/10

review:
So all my medicine is packed in my carry on
I go the extra mile and put everything in small bottles 
Get to gate and “ you need to check your carry on we are full”
So there I am tearing thru my bag with no other bag to put my medicine in- lady says “ mamm hurrry we need to get you on board”
I go on board with ten items loosely in my arms 
Go to my seat and yes the entire top bin is empty! 
Really I could have my carry on with me
If I have a seizure at my lay over port it’s all on you Amercan Airlines!
Never never never
title: Poor service

review: I’ve been using the AA app for a decade and logins constantly fail. Go though the Safari web browser and there’s no issue but the app consistently tells me my correct credentials are incorrect. Absolutely unacceptable tech tail from a multi-billion dollar corporation.

review:
I don’t understand the low ratings.  This app is a must-have for frequent AA travelers.  I’ve flown 120+ segments on AA every year fo the past five years and I use the app for every flight.  The app is tremendously helpful to research flights, change seats, monitor the incoming flight and gate changes.  As a matter of fact, sometimes the app alerts me to gate changes before the gate agent is notified!  Keep up the good work!

Note to developers - the iOS 13.x upgrade seems to have broken the seat selection dialog box on a 12.9” iPad!  The window is too small and doesn’t properly show all seats.  Please fix.

Consider the following for app upgrades
1) I’d like to see how many first class seats remain.  If I’m #1 for first class upgrade but there are no seats, that would be helpful information and would eliminate a gate agent question.  Maybe you could add this to the upgrade list display?

2) I’d like to see the flight upgrade list sooner than an hour before the flight.  If I’m #5 on a plane with 4 first-class seats, earlier information would help me understand upgrade status sooner.

3) Consider adding a “Earlier Flight Options” button.  If business finishes sooner than expected, the only way to check for earlier flights is to use the “Book Flights” functionality.  I’d like to see a “Earlier Flight Option” button that is accessible directly from my current flight view.  And to be the most helpful, it should also allow easy viewing of available seats in the earlier flights!  (I’m not going to stand by for an earlier flight unless there are decent seats available..) 

4) It would be nice to have an app option that allows the user to control how early the boarding alert displays.  The app currently tells me when the flight is boarding...which isn’t helpful if I’m in the Admirals Club and have a bag to store.  I like to arrive at the gate 20-30 minutes before boarding before the crowds form.  If I could tell the app to remind me 20 minutes before boarding, I wouldn’t have to manually check the time.

review:
My partner and I just arrived in Cali Colombia from Los Angeles USA. The experience we had with American Airlines the last 12 hours has been horrific to say the least. Upon paying a total of $1421 usd for our INTERNATIONAL flight, firstly we were disappointed to realise upon check in the checking in just one checked bag each would cost an extra $100 on top. Which is disgusting for an international flight at that price. Proceeding with our journey, on the first leg to Miami of a 5 hour flight time, we were beyond disbelief when we were told there was NO FOOD on the flight. Not serving a meal is one thing, but not being able to purchase any food either !?! We were offered a tiny bag of stale dry pretzels. My partner and I have medical conditions where we need to eat regularly to keep our sugar levels high, or we begin to get wheezy and faint. But we stuck out that leg of the flight. When we got off the flight, we had MINUTES to board the next flight to Cali, as there was barely any time allocated to get from one side of the airport to the other. We ran to the gate, and asked the gentleman prior to boarding if there would be food on this leg, he said YES. We were then waiting on the flight for 1.5 HOURS before take off as there was a problem with the plane, so this leg took a total of 4.5 hours. Once we were in the sky, we were told again there was NO FOOD except pretzels, and no food option to purchase. At this point we were about to faint and pass out. It felt like human torture. In between flights, not only did the man working for American Airlines at the gate tell us there would be food, but there was no time allocated in between the flights for us to even have time to be able to grab something prior to boarding. 

We are beyond disbelief of the treatment we got, along with rude staff the entire journey. We will never be travelling with your airline again.
title: AMERICAN IS THE WORST AIRLINE

review: I don’t often feel the need to wright reviews, and when I do they are always positive. However this third time this has happened has forced me to try and help others. After COUNTLESS delays (yes 10+) we were finally told we could board. And the app still told us the plane was delayed and not yet boarding.... Sat in the plane and heard multiple excuses from American staff as to the delay. First there was a plane issue, then no airline staff, then a mechanical delete, then we had to leave the plane after being warned we would lose our place if we left the plane. Everyone had to get off the plane after 5 hours and we we told our new gate and to watch the app for updates. We went to the bar meticulously watching the app for boarding times. Again delayed over and over and thank God I happened to get up and walk over to check the actual gate. They were boarding at their last call. I ran back and got my wife and sent her up to get on the plane, where the gate staff actually had the gall to yell at her to get on the plane and not wait for me. She was told she has to check the board AND NOT THE APP!!!. and the board behind this guy STILL SAID FLIGHT DELAYED!!!. Luckily I made it back up in time and got on the plane where we were delayed at least another hour again! I don’t know where they feel it’s ok to verbally abuse my wife who was following their app and their recommendations to the letter. If it was one mishap I can understand but this is the third time their app has given us false information that would have cost us our flight. And then the final kicker... we couldn’t get seats together unless we paid more at the airport. We were in the same row but in the middle on both sides of the aisle. Upon boarding the plane we were informed our seats had been switched and we would be sitting together after all. And that is because the family we were sitting next to in that same row actually paid extra to get them all together. American actually INTENTIONALLY spaced us out in the hopes one of our groups would pay extra to be seated together. This is UNETHICAL and ABUSIVE behavior to their customers. I would highly recommend that nobody EVER download or trust this app, we were intentionally misled in hopes we would miss our flight to accommodate their overbooking and profit maximizing schemes. If I could give this negative stars I would, not only unreliable but being used to manipulate their customers
title: Never EVER trust this app!!!!!!

review:
I booked a flight with American Airlines that was canceled (with no explanation I assumed it was due to weather). The flight was supposed to leave on a Saturday. After an hour of standing in line waiting to see what myself and two others were going to do the woman at the counter was not apologetic or sympathetic at all. In fact she was having a side conversation with a co-worker as I was speaking to her. American Airlines said the didn’t have a flight for us until MONDAY with no sleeping accommodations and could not even offer to pay for travel to a hotel. Another woman that works for American Airlines offered to go retrieve my checked bag. She came back empty handed and told me I had to walk to a baggage claim booth to retrieve it. I walked across the airport over to the booth and another woman was extremely rude and told me she didn’t understand why I was speaking to her. In fact, she said “take a look around if you don’t see your bag I obviously do not have it.” I walked back to the American Airlines counter and the woman I was originally dealing with told me she had to go to the bathroom and would make it a priority to help me upon her return. After 10 minutes she returns and starts doing something else that has nothing to do involving me. I approached her again and she apologized. She said she was going to go find my bag and come back. After a half hour of waiting I go looking for this woman only to find her talking to someone else in the hallway with no intentions of explaining where my luggage was. She frantically tells me American Airlines accidentally flew my bag to Charolette (my end destination was Cleveland) and to call American Airlines to locate my bag. 

The following day after sitting on hold for 2 hours- American Airlines refused to deliver my luggage to my residence and told me I needed to drive to Cleveland Hopkins Airport to retrieve my luggage. 

After all of that I had to “request” a refund for my flight and I am still waiting to hear if the airline will even cover the inconvenience of canceling the flight and losing my luggage.
title: A terrible experience

review:
We spent 27 hours accosted in Saint Lucia after our flight was delayed. The airport staff was incredibly incompetent, don’t care and straight up lied to us at times. There’s dirty visqueen literally just stapled to the ceiling. The food is mediocre at best, very limited and incredibly expensive. The outside looks like it’s been to war. There’s no where to plug your phone. The WiFi is slower than a snail. They put passengers in hotels that had no running water and blood on the sheets. Then gave us $12 food vouchers that wouldn’t even purchase a full meal. We spent $34 on Chex mix and sodas. No smoking area and denied exit after 12 hours sitting around. They had a pregnant woman, young children and elderly people sitting around on plastic airport chairs for a full day. 

After 27 hours of being stuck there, and most of it sitting in a terrible airport, the crew comes prancing out for the final time after refusing to fly all this time due to “maintenance issues”. Mind you, everyone can see the plane the whole time and NO maintenance is occurring. No one went near the plane. They turned around and started walking away for about the fourth time when they were approached by several furious passengers. Then comes “Captain Sam” (who portrays the hero) and 10 minutes later we’re boarding the SAME PLANE that’s allegedly having maintenance issues! 

Once on the plane, I heard the first and ONLY apology from the flight crew. They profusely apologized over and over. Thanks. Apologies were meaningless. We want compensation for that. Horrible experience. We will not be returning to Saint Lucia because of the airport staff and American Airlines. That experience ruined our honeymoon and Mother’s Day.

review:
Another bad experience on American.  From when I arrived at the front counter til I boarded the plane the agent (both at front counter and at the gate) have obviously forgotten that the paying customer is why they have a job. A smile was not only a challenge but was nonexistent. I’m a retired AAL flight attendant, my husband is a captain for AAL and my daughter is a flight attendant and I’m embarrassed at what AAL has become since USAIR and AAL became one. I was full fare (as I always am while traveling in business every week) and was so disappointed in the lack of customer service. I have always been able to choose my airline when on business and it kills me that 90% of the time I choose Delta because they are doing it right. It’s amazing what a welcoming smile can do or a “thank you for choosing American, we appreciate your business” can do. Neither of those gestures cost the AAL brand a dime. I wish this was a “Covid” thing but it’s not. It’s been 7+ years that I have been choosing not to spend my company’s money on AAL because of lack of customer service. I started my career in 1984 with AAL, loved every minute of my 26 years. I wish I could understand why the brand thinks that because they are the largest they are the best. In this case, quantity does not reflect quality. 
Please, please, please, listen....this is an honest message from a person whose whole family is invested in American Airlines. Improvements are needed and would  not be costly. My heart breaks when I see what this company has become (prior Covid) the past several years. 
I’m the first to sing the praise of the deserving unfortunately I cannot, once again. 
I hope the new year brings change for American. 
Sincere Regards,
Jane May

review:
American is by far the worst airline ever.
Because of the miscommunication about the pet carrier this trip has cost me an extra 1000 and a job interview. 

You see, not only did I miss the job interview because I could not get back home in time but my flight was cancelled this evening. My 10y o daughter and I are stuck in Charlotte North Carolina- our flight home to Jackson was cancelled, there were no rental cars available and AA booked ONLY MY MINOR CHILD on a flight home tomorrow (actually today Sunday because it is 2am). My 10 y o daughter, was booked without me!!! 

I can’t even get my AA app to work to see any boarding passes for both of us. You can see by the screenshot I have attached. Her name is listed with a ticket reference but I do not have one. To make the situation worse, I’ve been on hold for a total of six hours- six hours. 

The first time I called was at the airport (Charlotte). I chose the “call me back option” and the message stated four + hours (this was at 6pm tonight). I never received a call. When I called again at 1 am the system message asked if I wanted to have someone call me back again. So, I’ve been on hold for over an hour rather than SLEEPING because I’m afraid we will be stranded here tomorrow and I’ll miss a different job interview that is scheduled at 10am in Jackson MS. So.... I have had to pay for three Uber trips to and from the Phoenix airport, flight differences for both me and my child (only to have them cancelled), and now a hotel in the layover city. 

The original point of my contact was this- the carrier was the right size but a hard carrier. If it was the wrong carrier then the American Airlines agent in Jackson MS should have STOPPED me then BEFORE we flew to Phoenix Arizona on the 27th of May. She didn’t. She let us board that plane. When I got on the plane the carrier did not fit under the seat because it was a hard carrier not a collapsible type. So, the stewardess allowed me to put the carrier on the seat next to us. I was NOT TOLD the carrier was the wrong type (and I might add i also paid the pet fee so you know I’m telling the truth) otherwise, I would have purchased a soft carrier BEFORE my flight to Jackson Ms (from Phoenix). 

My 10 y o daughter and I get to the Phoenix Airport at 5:30am and then, at that time I’m told by Ms. Terri at the Phoenix airport that my pet carrier is not the right size. - 2 1/2 hours before my flight leaves. That doesn’t give me enough time to buy a new before the flight because it’s 5:30 am- nothing is open.

And, let’s also talk about how horrible this trip has been. I spend money on a new pet carrier, Uber fees, price differentials in tickets for two people, another pet fee, only to be stranded in the layover City, now having to pay over 200 for a hotel. I can’t even get an American Airline representative on the phone to see if we will be able to get a flight from Charlotte to Jackson tomorrow (wonder if I have to pay for the pet flight again?). 

American offered me a few mileage points- YOU THINK A FEW MILEAGE POINTS MADE UP FOR IT??
title: Horrible app horrible airline

review:
Even though we were in DFW for 3 hours in between flights The 2 pieces of luggage didn’t make it to Reno.  That is sad.  Other passengers in first class did not receive their luggage either.  

Also as an American stockholder I was most impressed with our flights and the attention to details in service that we received on the flights from Reno to Dallas,  Dallas to Cancun,  Cancun to Dallas and  Dallas to Reno. 

However as we came in to Dallas we were going to visit the admirals club at Gate 23.  As we approached the receptionist we were told we couldn’t enter because only a certain flier had access to the club.  The receptionist told me that my American Airlines credit card I was only paying $90 a year as opposed to $450.  Further, we don’t have  the flight status.  Really!!!   I’m retired now so my travels have changed. My question - is this how American welcomes credit cardholders and values its current, past, and future customers?   The receptionist has little, to no interest in speaking with us.  Are you kidding me!   

I have had an American Airlines credit card for probably close to 40 years. And to receive this cavalier attitude from your staff  is extremely insulting as a stockholder, customer, and a cardholder.   it demonstrates a changing culture at American and should be recognized so investors such as me understanding the changes occurring at American.  

As a stockholder this type of attitude is completely unacceptable. Is this an one off or standard operating policy with American Airlines.     Very disappointing.

With the stock nears  its lows, is this the type of service and attitude that representatives broadly American Airlines’ culture.  As one can tell I’m not a happy camper and extremely irritated that the company that I support.  This treatment should be delivered as feedback as my experience in Dallas at Gate A 23 about 2:30.  In my view this is completely unacceptable.

title: Worst Airline

review:
My paid luggage didn’t make it back with me.

Last minute, I threw my house keys in there.  My luggage didn’t make it back with me. When I went to customer service, they were very casual about it and started a claim. When I shared with the person that was “helping me” that my keys were in there, with full attitude she told me that they advise against that, especially because it was a short time between the connecting flights. When I asked her why they don’t warn customers with this information since she shares it as a matter of fact, she kept saying that it was a legal connecting amount of time and the representative next to her jumps in and they both start speaking over me that they go out of their way to remind everyone to take their keys and medication, etc out of the bag. They wouldn’t even give me a chance to tell them, this was a paid luggage that I checked in at the kiosk!!  I had to stop talking until they were finished telling me off, then once I said that, the second person stopped and just walked away.

I asked the first person if American airline helps with anything especially since I don’t know anyone in this area and it’s almost 11pm. She casually struggling her shoulder said not and kept saying over and over again that I should’ve cared to not put my keys in my luggage.  She gives me the claims form and tells me it’s not my responsibility to call in the morning to ask them to send my luggage with the earliest flights, instead of a direct flight because then it wouldn’t get here until tomorrow night at 11pm. I told her that I couldn’t believe that American airline doesn’t have a better system that to out the customer in charge of coordinating getting to the luck to the destination with the earliest option possible!!

At the end she sarcastically asks me if there is anything she can do for me. It was a slap in the face!  And at that point I couldn’t help but to get sarcastic back and tell her that there are many things that she can do but she chooses not to. She needed to have the last word and kept making sarcastic remarks and I just had to walk away at that point.

The COMPLETE lack of acknowledgement of things going wrong, the casual comment that this can happen with short connections (and it’s fine that there is no warning to the customer at the time of purchase), the teaming up on me to tell me that they warn everyone to take keys and medications out because they were assuming it was a carry-on I had checked in (didn’t even know that it was a paid luggage I had checked in, nor did they care once they let me speak), the REPEATED remakes that I shouldn’t known better than to put my keys in there, the expectations of me to be the one to have to wait until the morning to call and request and plead to get my luggage on their earliest planes, otherwise their automatic default is to get it to me tomorrow night at 11pm and they have no means of notating or taking accountability to be the ones that will call to get it to me the earliest possible, the sarcastic remakes at the end.....  this is what American Airlines’ standards are for customer service?!

review:
Compre dos pasajes para viaje internacional en Octubre, para viajar Noviembre 10. Me doy cuenta por amistades que suspenden el vuelo y me reprograman para Diciembre 02. Nuevamente hoy Nov 26, me doy cuenta, por terceras personas; que han suspendido mi vuelo y American Airlines no me notifica formalmente de ninguna manera y cuando llamo me dicen que no hay espacio disponible en el proximo vuelo!!! ESTAMOS ESPERANDO DESDE OCTUBRE!!! 
Lo peor que estan trabajando desde que viajo con ustedes desde hace 6 años. Pienso que en Octubre no habia muchos clientes y vendieron pasajes mas baratos y por eso nos estan dejando de ultimo! 
NUNCA MAS COMPRARE UN PASAJE CON USTEDES

Hice chequeo para pasar a bordo en mi vuelo desde Madrid a Miami y cuando llegue para abordar el avión la puerta del mismo estaba cerrada, nunca hicieron una llamada de cortesía, me puse muy alterada porque mi familia me esperaba en Miami y no fueron amables. Tuve que comprar un pasaje de ida y vuelta con Iberia para poder regresar y nunca usé el regreso.
Como mi viaje fue a través de una agencia de viajes jamás pude recibir ningún dinero para atrás ni otro pasaje de cortesía porque son vuelos precomprados o como se llamen, en fin una amarga experiencia que no es fácil de aclarar. Debo añadir que no fui la única pasajera que se quedó sin acceder al avión si mal no recuerdo éramos 4 o 5 entre ellos 2 bussnes
 una señora con su niña y yo, comentaban ellos que el vuelo estaba sobrevendido y habían cerrado antes las puertas por esta razón.
Lissette Farinas

Para mi ha sido un robo y una desepcion porque realmente soy de las q no viajaba si no era con american. No hay un superior q me de una explicación adecuada para este problema. review:
American has the worst customer service ever. We were treated like trash. A Stuart Named Douglas from DC airport to Tulsa on 4/11/22 made a lot of passengers uncomfortable. He made it so uncomfortable even to try to go to the bathroom. He Scolding us over the intercom every time someone got up to use it. When I asked for peanuts he said, “ our company says you don’t need any. No.”
I read clearly that a flight over 250 miles get snacks. 
I even paid for the upgraded seats. I will never use them again. They also tried to lie about how much our bags weighed saying it was over the limit and tried to charge us. We looked at it and it was exactly 50 pounds. It was just a terrible experience for expensive tickets. Go elsewhere.
title: Terrible service

review: 2 hour Delay at SCE on  03/26/22. Missed connection in Philadelphia and was put on another flight and then had 2 additional delays. My flight was suppose to arrive in Charleston Sc at 345 pm and never arrived till 1130. Today no delays but luggage did not arrive in SCE. Went to Chicago. When I tracked my luggage it said it was loaded on the plane in Charleston at 1215. My flight left at around. 1048.  I’m Not a happy camper
title: Delays and loss luggage

title: Bug in latest version. Otherwise 👍🏽👍🏽

review: On itineraries where the first leg is done on a partner airline, (one code shared flight, other   flights on AA planes and AA flight numbers) on tickets bought on aa.com, the whole reservation is transferred to the partner airline (JetBlue in my case) and it's imposible to get an AA boarding pass for the AA segments. Forced to get seat assignments at the gate, no access to flagship lounge until talking to customer service ... very messy ...  reservations blamed the app.
title: Partner airlines take over reservations

review:
Most airline apps these days give you updates as to when your flight is boarding and bag status. Maybe I’m missing a setting somewhere but this app doesn’t seem to provide such options. Seems odd to me. 

Logging in to anything AA.com related is a nightmare (including app) because at least with Apple devices, the third LAST NAME login field confuses the autofill/password feature which makes for a stressful log in process. 

If I’m wrong about any of this I’d be thrilled to be corrected, sadly there is no customer service option under app support, just a lame FAQ. I like American but it’s time to improve both the app and website.
title: Missing functionality - no flight departure notifications?

review:
Used the app to scan our boarding pass. It came up as… not me… and not-me was on the no-fly list. The dude scanning threw a big fit about it, and I kept explaining that it was not me. I showed my ID and he finally settled down. 
Super annoying.

We give you our $ upfront. 

Thanks!

Jill Lenhart

review: Also, no face ID?
title: App is basically like AA.com web site…

review:
As a frequent flyer on the other airlines  - I continue to be perplexed at the difficulties of the AA app. When it says ‘click here for boarding  passes’ -  no passes appear. There is no easy way to upgrade a flight, ‘what is the current status’ etc. 

I’m sure if I spent a half hour I could sort it out -but on the other majors website-it is easy and intuitive to sort this all out. 

I had an important conference call so I decided to go in the admirals club in Charlotte.Despite the diligent work of the front desk staff no one could figure out how to connect me to the Internet. 

When we landed-the unfortunate minimum wage people who operated the Jet bridge could not sort it out-after 15 minutesWe were forced to use the tiny stairs.

 I traveled internationally frequently-And even second tier global airlines are easier to sort through. I tried with multiple gate agents to figure out how to get boarding passes to show up on the and they were all stymied. The app ‘looks’ pretty-but even for a passenger with 5,000,000 miles of flights -it is a challenge every time. Having said that the service on the flights and with the gate agents was excellent.They could not have been more helpful
title: Worst app of the majors

review: My family and friends (16) of us all flew American Airlines to Luis Muñoz airport from Charleston, Charlotte and Houston on 12/1-12/5 to celebrate my 50th birthday. We all had the worst experience with American Airlines, and chose to never use their airlines again. I am an Advantage member which made me more disappointed! The American Airlines customer service at the Luis Muniz airport in San Juan Puerto Rico was poor! The representatives did not smile and we're certainly not eager to assist me without being nasty and rude. We arrived at the airport in time to make our flight since we checked in online, they would not let me check in even though the plane didn't leave for another 45 minutes. I pleaded with them that I did not want to miss my aunt's funeral. They did not try to accommodate me, instead booked me on a flight for 6 hours later! I am a big critic when it comes to customer service expecially since I'm a nurse. The flight attendents on Flight AA1852 were rude, didn't smile and could not even say you're welcome when several of us said thank you! The flight crew present when boarding and exiting were amazingly greeting everyone! Thank you guys for your service. My departure flight during rebooking was an absolute nightmare. We've decided Not to ever fly American Airlines again! I totally understand some changes during this Pandemic, but I won't make any excuses for the lack of customer service. I work in Healthcare, which is just as stressful as the airline industry, but it will Never prevent me from going above and beyond my means to provide remarkable customer service to All of my patient's! American Airlines you failed my entire party this past weekend 😪
title: Puerto Rico vacation with friends and family!

review:
Executive Platinum here - it is mind blowing to me how far behind AA is in their app development. It needs a complete overhaul, not minor tweaks here and there. Reimagined from the ground up - but this is AA we’re talking about, so it won’t be. Too expensive.

Nothing is intuitive. Nothing is just 1 click away. And when irregular operations hit? Good luck! Need a flight change? Pain in the butt. Want to see seat maps of other flights on your route to make quick decisions? Also a pain. It’s amazing how much better United’s app is. MILES better. Somehow AA continues to be stuck in 2013 while the rest of the airline industry leaves them behind with modern technology and intuitive solutions.
title: Unbelievable how far behind AA is

review:
I had to cancel a flight therefore returning the credit to “my wallet.” Within the last year I have tried to use this credit. 
( keep in mind when you call in they ENCOURAGE you to use the website for booking as they are always on extended wait time-58 min.average)
Every time I went to use the credit it would say “error”……NO WHERE ON THE WEBSITE DOES IT STATE “IN ORDER TO USE THE CREDIT YOU “MUST BOOK THROUGH AN AGENT.”
Mixed signals….. 
After waiting on hold for 58 minutes and speaking with the TWO MOST RUDEST agents who-
- couldn’t allow me to use the credit to upgrade to first class
- couldn’t help me with submitting the credit for a refund; told me I could do it but they couldn’t assist me in applying for the refund.
- gave me no support in how to use the credit or how to apply for the refund.
AGENTS NAME: TAYLOR RTU

review: Today, July 7, 2021, I had the privilege of being a passenger on flight number 1752 from DFW to PHL under the command of Captain Felix. What a great experience. Before pushing back from the gate, Captain Felix walked the entire cabin and welcomed every passenger. What an experience that was. All the years that I have flown, I never once experienced a captain coming out of the cockpit before push back to personally welcome the passengers as they settled into their seats. This man is a true gentleman and what a privilege it was having him as our trusted captain.I certainly hope that he is the captain on one of my future flights with American Airlines.Please see that Captain Felix gets this message.
